fields.description: Give an ally +3|+0 or +0|+3 this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +3|+0 or +0|+3 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Never fear change. It will question you, test your limits. It is our greatest teacher." - Karma
fields.name: Twin Disciplines

fields.description: Give an ally +0|+3 this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +0|+3 this round.
fields.name: Discipline of Fortitude

fields.description: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
fields.name: Discipline of Force

fields.description: When you <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy, I deal 2 to it.
fields.description_raw: When you Stun or Recall an enemy, I deal 2 to it.
fields.flavor_text: "Death is like the wind..."
fields.name: Yasuo

fields.description: When you <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy, I strike it.
fields.description_raw: When you Stun or Recall an enemy, I strike it.
fields.flavor_text: "...always by my side."
fields.name: Yasuo

fields.description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an attacking enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Yasuo</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Stun an attacking enemy.
Create a Yasuo in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Hasagi!" - Yasuo
fields.name: Yasuo's Steel Tempest

fields.description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+0 this round.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "On this day, yours will become the face of discipline, training, humility, and balance. Today, you become Kinkou."
fields.name: Keeper of Masks

fields.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Support: Give my supported ally Lifesteal this round.
fields.flavor_text:
"During winter's reign, we heard the tread of
Footsteps 'cross the snowy floor. 
In its wake, new vine and leaf emerged to rearrange
The forest floor and herald season's change."
- Shon-Xan poem
fields.name: Herald of Spring

fields.description: When you <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit, grant me +2|+0.
fields.description_raw: When you Stun or Recall a unit, grant me +2|+0.
fields.flavor_text: "Oh, so you think I'm 'cute'? 'Fuzzy'?? Let's see how 'adorable' you find THIS!"
fields.name: Fae Bladetwirler

fields.flavor_text: "Once, this place held our schools, our temples, our homes. Now, we are left to skulk about its shadow-infested ruins. Zed's Order has defiled the legacy of this sacred place--I will be sure they regret it."
fields.name: Kinkou Lifeblade

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Create in hand a spell from your regions.
fields.description_raw: Round End: Create in hand a spell from your regions.
fields.flavor_text: "Through reflection, we can focus the mind, and find a path around any obstacle."
fields.name: Karma

fields.description: When you play a spell, cast it again on the same targets.
fields.description_raw: When you play a spell, cast it again on the same targets.
fields.flavor_text: "We'll bring peace to Ionia, whatever the cost."
fields.name: Karma

fields.description:
Create in hand another spell from your regions.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Create 2 instead.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Karma</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Create in hand another spell from your regions.
Enlightened: Create 2 instead.
Create a Karma in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma
fields.name: Karma's Insight of Ages

fields.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally.
fields.description_raw: Recall an ally.
fields.flavor_text: The wise combatant knows not only tenacity, but restraint. A successful retreat guarantees a chance to fight a better fight.
fields.name: Recall

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> with my stats.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Summon an attacking Living Shadow with my stats.
fields.level_up_description: I've seen myself or my shadows <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> the enemy Nexus twice<style=Variable></style>.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I've seen myself or my shadows strike the enemy Nexus twice.
fields.flavor_text: "Balance is a fool's master. The shadows have shown me true power."
fields.name: Zed

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> with my stats and keywords.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Summon an attacking Living Shadow with my stats and keywords.
fields.flavor_text: "Few men think to look back at their shadow. It is their last mistake."
fields.name: Zed

fields.description:
<link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> in its place.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Zed</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Recall an ally to summon a Living Shadow in its place.
Create a Zed in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?
fields.name: Zed's Shadowshift

fields.flavor_text: A blade of shadow is as sharp as one of steel.
fields.name: Living Shadow

fields.description: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in hand +1|+1.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in hand +1|+1.
fields.flavor_text: Ionian knowledge is outlined in the written word, but it is the tales and teachings of Ionia's venerated elders that give ancient text new life.
fields.name: Greenglade Elder

fields.flavor_text: "This might sound crazy, but the last thing I remember was a... fuzzy sensation...?" - Navori Brigand
fields.name: Nimble Poro

fields.description: To play me, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally.
fields.description_raw: To play me, Recall an ally.
fields.flavor_text: "C'mon, we gotta get out of here! My name? I'll explain on the way, I promise...."
fields.name: Navori Conspirator

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally in hand +3|+3.
fields.description_raw: Play: Grant an ally in hand +3|+3.
fields.flavor_text:
"In times of conflict, villagers sought the ancient guardian of Autumn Valley. Those who swayed her heart were granted blessings that could turn the tide of battle."
- Saga of the First Lands
fields.name: Jeweled Protector

fields.description: Grant all allies in hand +1|+0.
fields.description_raw: Grant all allies in hand +1|+0.
fields.flavor_text: "Not just seeds, younglings. The legacy of the land itself, promises for our prosperous future." - Karma
fields.name: Sown Seeds

fields.description: Remove <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> from an ally to grant it to an enemy.
fields.description_raw: Remove Ephemeral from an ally to grant it to an enemy.
fields.flavor_text: "I am the blade in the darkness." - Zed
fields.name: Death Mark

fields.description: Grant ALL battling followers <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Grant ALL battling followers Ephemeral.
fields.flavor_text: When the flows of magic are diverted from their balanced state, they surge from the spirit world into the mortal realm--often with startling results.
fields.name: Shadow Flare

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally in hand +1|+0.
fields.description_raw: Play: Grant an ally in hand +1|+0.
fields.flavor_text: “Took years to cultivate this deadly physique! Tireless days of spotting birds, describing clouds, and lifting tray after tray of sweet buns! Who else has such dedication?”
fields.name: Inspiring Mentor

fields.description: Summon 2 exact copies of an ally. They're <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Summon 2 exact copies of an ally. They're Ephemeral.
fields.flavor_text: "Shen is one man caught between the perils of two worlds, he will fail them both. I devote myself to Ionia alone." - Zed
fields.name: Dawn and Dusk

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant me +3|+0 or +0|+3.
fields.description_raw: Play: Grant me +3|+0 or +0|+3.
fields.flavor_text: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.
fields.name: Scaled Snapper

fields.description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
fields.flavor_text:
Gracefully she glides
Noiseless steps in the shadows
Claws the only trace.
fields.name: Shadow Assassin

fields.flavor_text: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.
fields.name: Scaled Snapper

fields.flavor_text: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.
fields.name: Scaled Snapper

fields.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Support: Give my supported ally Barrier this round.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I've seen allies gain Barrier 4+ times.
fields.flavor_text: "Like hands clasped, the mortal and spirit realms intertwine..."
fields.name: Shen

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
When an ally gets <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link>, give it +3|+0 this round.
fields.description_raw:
Support: Give my supported ally Barrier this round.
When an ally gets Barrier, give it +3|+0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "...Their actions exist in harmony, and under my watch, neither shall overtake the other."
fields.name: Shen

fields.description:
Swap 2 allies. Give them <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Shen</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Swap 2 allies. Give them Barrier this round.
Create a Shen in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "With balanced steps, I go." - Shen
fields.name: Shen's Stand United

fields.flavor_text: "What would you sacrifice for power? Your path begins with an oath, and ends only when it has taken all you have to give." - Zed
fields.name: Shadow Fiend

fields.description: Give an ally +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +1|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
fields.flavor_text: Combat is merely a race to take the life of another before they take yours.
fields.name: Rush

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
fields.description_raw: Play: Stun 2 enemies.
fields.flavor_text: "When I was a child, I asked my brother: 'Does the wind flee, or does it follow?' He followed me then for guidance. I follow him now for justice."
fields.name: Yone, Windchaser

fields.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
fields.description_raw: Stun 2 enemies.
fields.flavor_text: "Stand aside. I have come for the Unforgiven." - Yone, Windchaser
fields.name: Staggering Strikes

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create an exact copy of a card in hand other than <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Zephyr Sage</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Play: Create an exact copy of a card in hand other than Zephyr Sage.
fields.flavor_text:
"As the warrior wept for his loss, the elder consoled him: 'Seek the sage of the skies. Only he can return that which is lost to this world, but still held in memory.'"
- Saga of the First Lands
fields.name: Zephyr Sage

fields.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Reduce the cost of the most expensive unit in your hand by 1.
fields.description_raw: Strike: Reduce the cost of the most expensive unit in your hand by 1.
fields.flavor_text: "Patrol, we've one... no... TWO massive furry creatures coming our way! Call for ba--Oh. Hold on. Scope's wrong way 'round again..."
fields.name: Greenglade Lookout

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> 3 enemies.
fields.description_raw: Play: Recall 3 enemies.
fields.flavor_text: "There we were, tearing across the meadow and suddenly, this KID just leaps out from nowhere and BAM, BAM, BAM--knocks the wind right outta us!" - Navori Brigand
fields.name: Minah Swiftfoot

fields.description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 7. Draw 1.
fields.description_raw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 7. Draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: "Only when the mind is elevated can the body be made whole." - Karma
fields.name: Ritual of Renewal

fields.description: Swap 2 allies. Give them <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Swap 2 allies. Give them Barrier this round.
fields.flavor_text: "With balanced steps, I go." - Shen
fields.name: Stand United

fields.description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally Elusive this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Stay hidden, and do not return until your task is finished." - Zed
fields.name: Ghost

fields.description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +2|+2 this round.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +2|+2 this round.
fields.flavor_text:
"Spring blooms first on Ionia's cliffsides, where the beating of newly formed wings bathes the land in the season's gentle breezes."
- Saga of the First Lands
fields.name: Windfarer Hatchling

fields.description:
Create in hand another spell from your regions.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Create 2 instead.
fields.description_raw:
Create in hand another spell from your regions.
Enlightened: Create 2 instead.
fields.flavor_text: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma
fields.name: Insight of Ages

fields.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a copy of me in hand.
fields.description_raw: Nexus Strike: Create a copy of me in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Flesh is untrustworthy. Fragile. Delicate as the borders between light and shadow."
fields.name: Silent Shadowseer

fields.description: Your <link=keyword.Burst><sprite name=Burst><style=Keyword>Burst</style></link> and <link=keyword.Focus><sprite name=Focus><style=Keyword>Focus</style></link> spells cost 1 less.
fields.description_raw: Your Burst and Focus spells cost 1 less.
fields.flavor_text: Its songs could be heard from the villages--long, low waves of sound rippling from sky to hillside, each as formless and strange as the afternoon clouds.
fields.name: Cloud Drinker

fields.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit.
fields.description_raw: Recall a unit.
fields.flavor_text: When invaders first set foot on Ionian soil, they found that conquering the land's inhabitants alone would not be enough.
fields.name: Will of Ionia

fields.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> 3 enemies.
fields.description_raw: Recall 3 enemies.
fields.flavor_text: "We go FLYING and next thing I know I'm flat on my back!" - Navori Brigand
fields.name: Skyward Strikes

fields.description: When I'm summoned, give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, give me Elusive this round.
fields.flavor_text: "I'll get the drop on him, no problem. Get me outta there and I'll split the loot with you, make it more than worth your while!"
fields.name: Navori Bladescout

fields.description: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
fields.description_raw: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "What's the point of fighting if there's no one to see your moves?"
fields.name: Sparring Student

fields.description: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
fields.description_raw: When you summon an ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
fields.flavor_text:
"Hey, watch those branches! Left, LEFT!" 
"When I'm on YOUR shoulders, Fuzzball, we can go wherever you want. 'Til then, I got this!"
fields.name: Greenglade Duo

fields.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon two 1 cost allies from your deck.
fields.description_raw: Allegiance: Summon two 1 cost allies from your deck.
fields.flavor_text: Wherever she goes, she ensures that others can follow.
fields.name: Kinkou Wayfinder

fields.flavor_text: "Your order has thrust us from our lands. You've proved your power, Master Zed. Now let me prove that I too am worthy of your teachings."
fields.name: Yusari

fields.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Shadow Fiend</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Strike: Create a Shadow Fiend in hand.
fields.flavor_text: “Run. Fight. Cower. It matters not, the shadows have come for you.”
fields.name: Ren Shadowblade

fields.description: <link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: I have +4|+4.
fields.description_raw: Enlightened: I have +4|+4.
fields.flavor_text: "War is fostered by our basest instincts. But instinct has no power over our highest virtues: trust, patience, and contemplation."
fields.name: Emerald Awakener

fields.description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
fields.description_raw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
fields.flavor_text: Every generation, region, and family has its own home remedy--though some are undeniably more effective than others.
fields.name: Health Potion

fields.description: Stop a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spell, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skill</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Stop a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill.
fields.flavor_text: No.
fields.name: Deny

fields.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Navori Brigand</style></link> with my stats.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon a Navori Brigand with my stats.
fields.flavor_text: “I was a traveling musician, known in every village 'ere to the Placidium--until the Noxians came. Now I'm scraping by on stolen coin. Mother was right, should've been a healer... ”
fields.name: Navori Highwayman

fields.flavor_text: A bandit on the road means more in the brush.
fields.name: Navori Brigand

fields.flavor_text: "The sky itself heaved as coils of clouds and powerful winds flattened our brigade. We tried to follow it, but who can chase the wind?" - Legion General
fields.name: The Empyrean

fields.description: When an ally gets <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link>, grant me +2|+0.
fields.description_raw: When an ally gets Barrier, grant me +2|+0.
fields.flavor_text: "The glade protects its own. And you--you are not from here..."
fields.name: Greenglade Caretaker

fields.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an attacking enemy.
fields.description_raw: Stun an attacking enemy.
fields.flavor_text: "Hasagi!" - Yasuo
fields.name: Steel Tempest

fields.description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> and <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally Barrier and Lifesteal this round.
fields.flavor_text: "This blade was once my father's. May it bring you the strength that I once lacked." - Shen
fields.name: Spirit's Refuge

fields.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Draw a spell.
fields.description_raw: Strike: Draw a spell.
fields.flavor_text: "We are proud children of the First Lands, and the streams of her magic flow through our vastayan blood as they do through our realm."
fields.name: Rivershaper

fields.description: When I'm summoned, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> all other allies.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, Recall all other allies.
fields.flavor_text: "Reflex and instinct are the only company I desire."
fields.name: Solitary Monk

fields.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Living Shadow</style></link> in its place.
fields.description_raw: Recall an ally to summon a Living Shadow in its place.
fields.flavor_text: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?
fields.name: Shadowshift

fields.description:
Grant <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> to an ally in hand. 
Draw 1.
fields.description_raw:
Grant Barrier to an ally in hand. 
Draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: "Those who keep the balance shall know the protection of the Kinkou." - Shen
fields.name: Ki Guardian

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spinning Axe</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Play or Strike: Create a Spinning Axe in hand.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I've struck with two total Spinning Axes.
fields.flavor_text: "You want an autograph? Get in line, pal."
fields.name: Draven

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> or <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Spinning Axes</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Play or Strike: Create 2 Spinning Axes in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "WHAT'S MY NAME?"
fields.name: Draven

fields.description:
A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a battling enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Draven</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
A battling ally strikes a battling enemy.
Create a Draven in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "I have the best job." - Draven
fields.name: Draven's Whirling Death

fields.description:
To play, discard 1.
Give an ally +1|+0 this round.
fields.description_raw:
To play, discard 1.
Give an ally +1|+0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Yeah, his brother'd win one-on-one, but you see those axes spiraling... it's art, it is. Art." - Arena regular
fields.name: Spinning Axe

fields.description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Attack: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text:
Vicious. Cold. Cruel. Intriguing. Perceptive. Charming.
Irresistible...
fields.name: Vladimir

fields.description: For each attacking ally on <link=card.vlad><style=AssociatedCard>Vladimir</style></link>'s right, deal 1 to it and <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: For each attacking ally on Vladimir's right, deal 1 to it and drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Delicious." - Vladimir
fields.name: Crimson Pact

fields.description: For each attacking ally on <link=card.vlad><style=AssociatedCard>Vladimir</style></link>'s right, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: For each attacking ally on Vladimir's right, deal 1 to it and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Delicious." - Vladimir
fields.name: Crimson Pact

fields.description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Attack: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Do you find my little fête banal, darling? Then let me give you a real show."
fields.name: Vladimir

fields.description:
Deal 1 to an ally and give another ally +2|+2 this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Vladimir</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Deal 1 to an ally and give another ally +2|+2 this round.
Create a Vladimir in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir
fields.name: Vladimir's Transfusion

fields.description: Kill a unit with 3 or less Power.
fields.description_raw: Kill a unit with 3 or less Power.
fields.flavor_text: Everyone dies. The weak just die faster.
fields.name: Culling Strike

fields.description: When I survive damage, create a random Crimson unit in your hand.
fields.description_raw: When I survive damage, create a random Crimson unit in your hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Beloved companions!" "Were you? Well I received an invitation." "--Reveler's Ball! Yes!" "Then we must! I shall present my family." "Starters before dessert, my dear. And you, Kye? Will you attend?"
fields.name: Crimson Curator

fields.level_up_description: I see the enemy Nexus has 10 or less Health.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I see the enemy Nexus has 10 or less Health.
fields.flavor_text: "An iron will and a titan's strength. There is no finer general to lead the Trifarian Legion." - Swain
fields.name: Darius

fields.description: When I'm summoned, grant other Spider allies +2|+0.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant other Spider allies +2|+0.
fields.flavor_text: A single glance and you're hers. A single bite and you're theirs.
fields.name: Arachnoid Host

fields.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Give all allies +2|+0 this round.
fields.description_raw: Stun an enemy. Give all allies +2|+0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Any fool can throw overwhelming force at the enemy. It takes vision to conceal that force until the decisive moment." - Swain
fields.name: Decisive Maneuver

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
fields.description_raw: Play: Stun an enemy.
fields.flavor_text: "Oh, how she captivates me! Her endless legs, voice of paralyzing sweetness, and eyes red as the rose. To think, she chose to dine with me tonight!" - Hapless Aristocrat
fields.name: Arachnoid Sentry

fields.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
fields.description_raw: Stun an enemy.
fields.flavor_text: It was not the kiss he had in mind.
fields.name: Paralyzing Bite

fields.description: Deal 1 to an ally to give another ally +2|+2 this round.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to an ally to give another ally +2|+2 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir
fields.name: Transfusion

fields.description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Our Shieldbreakers can split a man in two. But the Legion has other talents at its disposal when it requires a more... discreet touch." - Swain
fields.name: Legion Saboteur

fields.flavor_text: "Stand in our way and I'll cut you down myself!"
fields.name: Darius

fields.description:
Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Darius</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a Darius in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius
fields.name: Darius's Decimate

fields.description: Grant 2 allies +2|+0.
fields.description_raw: Grant 2 allies +2|+0.
fields.flavor_text: "Bonds forged in war are just as strong as those of kinship. Indeed, blood is shared in both." - Legion Veteran
fields.name: Brothers' Bond

fields.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Spiderling</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon a Spiderling.
fields.flavor_text: "My spiders love company. Shame that company never feels the same." - Elise
fields.name: House Spider

fields.description: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Edvin! There you are, handsome. I was just thinking of you!" "Each of us can go, now…" "Escort me. I'll make it fun." "Or nothing at all?"
fields.name: Crimson Disciple

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other attacking allies +1|+0 this round.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Give other attacking allies +1|+0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: He roared with glee. For a moment, the heart of the arena pulsed in time with his and the excitement of the assembled masses was clutched in his triumphant hand.
fields.name: Arena Battlecaster

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant allied Legion Marauders <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Grant allied Legion Marauders everywhere +1|+1.
fields.flavor_text: The Trifarian Legion is trailed by opportunistic brigands who prey on the weak and injured in its wake.
fields.name: Legion Marauder

fields.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other ally you have.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other ally you have.
fields.flavor_text: Some reckoners are adored for their charisma. Others, for their swift technique. Vessid possesses neither, but no one turns a rival to splatter with more efficiency.
fields.name: Crowd Favorite

fields.description: A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a battling enemy.
fields.description_raw: A battling ally strikes a battling enemy.
fields.flavor_text: "I have the best job." - Draven
fields.name: Whirling Death

fields.description: If you have a 5+ Power ally, kill ALL units with 4 or less Power.
fields.description_raw: If you have a 5+ Power ally, kill ALL units with 4 or less Power.
fields.flavor_text: "WHO'S READY TO REEEEEECKONNNNNN?!" - Arena Battlecaster
fields.name: Reckoning

fields.description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Boom." - Legion Saboteur
fields.name: Sabotage

fields.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> all enemies with 4 or less Power.
fields.description_raw: Stun all enemies with 4 or less Power.
fields.flavor_text: “He’s taking a deep breath - we might get a - yes, there we have it, folks! That’s Thunder’s famous war cry! We’re all shaking in our boots out here, Thuuuunder!” - Arena Battlecaster
fields.name: Intimidating Roar

fields.description: When another ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0.
fields.description_raw: When another ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0.
fields.flavor_text: He returned from the war on the brink of death, restored only by his husband's touch and the apothecary's balms. Noxus spared no expense to ensure his expert counsel, long after his fighting years.
fields.name: Legion Veteran

fields.description: I deal double damage to the Nexus.
fields.description_raw: I deal double damage to the Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "He said what?! That man has bricks for brains. Can't fault those shoulders, though..."
fields.name: Shiraza the Blade

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Blade's Edge</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Play: Create a Fleeting Blade's Edge in hand.
fields.level_up_description: I've <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> once. When I level up, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I've struck once. When I level up, Recall me.
fields.flavor_text: "Nothing like a little Demacian target practice to sharpen the senses..."
fields.name: Katarina

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
fields.description_raw:
Play: Rally.
Strike: Recall me.
fields.flavor_text: "No sir! Just a flash of red. Next thing I know, I look up and it... it was like a slaughterhouse in there." - Demacian border guard
fields.name: Katarina

fields.description:
Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Katarina</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
Create a Katarina in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Dance with me!" - Katarina
fields.name: Katarina's Death Lotus

fields.description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Decimates</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create 2 Decimates in hand.
fields.flavor_text: Deep in Zaun's Sump, young Benn Farron was labeled a menace. Unstable. Unacceptable. In the ranks of Noxus he was embraced. Awarded. Unstoppable.
fields.name: Captain Farron

fields.flavor_text: In Noxus, where soldiers are revered for their audacity on the battlefield, rearguard duty is nothing short of a punishment.
fields.name: Legion Rearguard

fields.description: Deal 1 to anything.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to anything.
fields.flavor_text: "In the right hands, a blade can cut through anything... and I do mean anything." - Katarina
fields.name: Blade's Edge

fields.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Last Breath: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: Every Noxian is taught that a life spent in service to the empire is well spent, but few spend their lives as spectacularly as the Legion's grenadiers.
fields.name: Legion Grenadier

fields.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link> or <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each unit you've Stunned or Recalled this game.
fields.flavor_text: All Noxians know the three Principles of Strength, but if a soldier is to rise through the ranks, they must learn to master them.
fields.name: Legion General

fields.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Support: Give my supported ally Quick Attack this round.
fields.flavor_text: The Legion spread the empire's reach with every beat of her drum. Nothing could stop them. Nothing did.
fields.name: Legion Drummer

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Discard your lowest cost card to draw 1.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Discard your lowest cost card to draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: "...you bet on Shiraza as SOLE SURVIVOR, and that Ionian kid--sure he's missing an arm--but he ain't dead. Makes him a survivor, see? 'Course, you could always double down..."
fields.name: Arena Bookie

fields.description: When cast or discarded, grant all allies +1|+0.
fields.description_raw: When cast or discarded, grant all allies +1|+0.
fields.flavor_text: "Those who cannot see the future have no place in it." - Jericho Swain
fields.name: Vision

fields.flavor_text: "I don't have the patience for a siege. Send the Shieldbreakers." - Darius
fields.name: Trifarian Shieldbreaker

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemy.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Stun the Weakest enemy.
fields.flavor_text: "I don't care who wronged you or what they did. You need me to make it right in the pit, you pay up front. There's no discount for sad stories."
fields.name: Minotaur Reckoner

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +4|+0.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Grant me +4|+0.
fields.flavor_text:
"Sir, they're refusing to open their gates. They've demanded to speak with Darius, but he's two days' ride away. Should we send riders?"
"Oh, that won't be necessary."
fields.name: Battering Ram

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally and grant it +2|+0.
fields.description_raw: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and grant it +2|+0.
fields.flavor_text: "Ah, you too? To the Reveler's B--" "How am I to tolerate mine?" "Respectfully, my dear, my father would disown me. ...perhaps we should wear matching dresses."
fields.name: Crimson Aristocrat

fields.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +2|+0 if you have another Noxus ally.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant me +2|+0 if you have another Noxus ally.
fields.flavor_text: "You'll earn the title when your axe is blunt with battle and your boots're sopped with blood." - Legion Veteran
fields.name: Trifarian Hopeful

fields.description: Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
fields.flavor_text: "When I say subtlety is overrated, that doesn't mean it isn't good. It's just overrated." - Darius
fields.name: Might

fields.flavor_text: She loves them all. She just loves this one more.
fields.name: Precious Pet

fields.description: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
fields.flavor_text: "Dance with me!" - Katarina
fields.name: Death Lotus

fields.description: Deal 2 to an enemy, then <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Deal 2 to an enemy, then Rally.
fields.flavor_text: By the time you've seen the blade, it's far too late.
fields.name: Shunpo

fields.description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
fields.flavor_text: "It takes a ruthlessly discerning eye to select those worthy enough to become part of the Trifarian Legion, but she can sort the wolves from the sheep a mile away." - Legion General
fields.name: Trifarian Assessor

fields.description: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
fields.flavor_text: Nothing is messier than a hemomancer's first lesson.
fields.name: Blood for Blood

fields.flavor_text: "Next up, CLAWS! Last time was a BLOODY takedown versus the Psycho Five... now the Psycho Three. Allllright! Takin' bets on today's victim! Four to one!" - Karl, Arena Bookie
fields.name: Savage Reckoner

fields.flavor_text: Earning a place in the Trifarian Legion is good enough for most, but not all.
fields.name: Trifarian Gloryseeker

fields.description: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius
fields.name: Decimate

fields.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Allegiance: Grant me +1|+1 and Overwhelm.
fields.flavor_text: This particular unit does use horses, just not for riding. The beasts find them delicious.
fields.name: Basilisk Rider

fields.flavor_text: "Noxus has no room for... for weakn--Will someone get this DAMNED THING OFF ME?!" - Darius
fields.name: Affectionate Poro

fields.description: When I'm summoned, move <link=card.dravenRef><style=AssociatedCard>Draven</style></link> to the top of your deck if you don't have him in hand or in play.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, move Draven to the top of your deck if you don't have him in hand or in play.
fields.flavor_text: "You want an autograph? Get... Get in line, pal!"
fields.name: Draven's Biggest Fan

fields.flavor_text: "Recklessness is a fault. Tempered by the Legion, it becomes a tool." - Swain
fields.name: Reckless Trifarian

fields.description: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
fields.flavor_text:
"When the open hand is declined, there's always the fist."
- Noxian axiom
fields.name: Elixir of Wrath

fields.description: Kill a damaged unit to create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Noxian Guillotine</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Kill a damaged unit to create a Fleeting Noxian Guillotine in hand.
fields.flavor_text: To Darius, mercy is a deft blow.
fields.name: Noxian Guillotine

fields.description: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
fields.flavor_text: "Even if I said 'no', you'd drag me along. So... sure."
fields.name: Crimson Awakener

fields.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Support: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Shiraza is a great girlfriend--I mean friend--and we are in no way dating. But if we were, I would like her to know that I wish her a happy anniversary. Thank you, no more questions."
fields.name: Kato The Arm

fields.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
fields.description_raw: Stun an enemy.
fields.flavor_text: "Allow your enemies enough rope to hang themselves and you'll save yourself the effort." - LeBlanc
fields.name: Guile

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Grant other allies +1|+1 if an ally died this round.
fields.description_raw: Round End: Grant other allies +1|+1 if an ally died this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Evil has taken the hour, but it will not win the day. Remember our fallen, and wear their memories like armor!"
fields.name: Dawnspeakers

fields.level_up_description: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied <link=card.senna><style=AssociatedCard>Senna, Sentinel of Light</style></link> die<style=Variable></style>.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I've seen 4+ allies or an allied Senna, Sentinel of Light die.
fields.flavor_text: "I'll be alright, Senna, long as I've got you."
fields.name: Lucian

fields.description: Reduce the cost of all allies in hand by 1.
fields.description_raw: Reduce the cost of all allies in hand by 1.
fields.flavor_text: "From the fields to the front in a fortnight. This is what we expect from each and every able body in Demacia." - Garen
fields.name: Mobilize

fields.level_up_description: I've seen you cast 6+ mana of spells<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, create a <link=card.warcry><style=AssociatedCard>Final Spark</style></link> in hand.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I've seen you cast 6+ mana of spells. When I level up, create a Final Spark in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "I've always known there's something different about me... a light from within. I'm not sure what it is, but I have to find out!"
fields.name: Lux

fields.description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lux</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Give an ally Barrier this round.
Create a Lux in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux
fields.name: Lux's Prismatic Barrier

fields.description: When you cast 6+ mana of spells, create a <link=card.warcry><style=AssociatedCard>Final Spark</style></link> in hand. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: When you cast 6+ mana of spells, create a Final Spark in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "No more holding back!"
fields.name: Lux

fields.description: Deal 4 to an enemy.
fields.description_raw: Deal 4 to an enemy.
fields.flavor_text: "I've hidden my light for my whole life. What would happen if they knew... if *I* knew what I could really do?" - Lux
fields.name: Final Spark

fields.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a random Elite in hand.
fields.description_raw: Last Breath: Create a random Elite in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "It takes a bold heart to trust their life to a silverwing, locked in combat far above solid ground. Bold, and highly durable." - Garen
fields.name: Swiftwing Lancer

fields.flavor_text: "We didn't know who or what those creatures were. But we knew the faces of our fellow soldiers by our sides, and that was all we needed."
fields.name: Vanguard Defender

fields.description: When you summon an Elite, grant it +1|+1.
fields.description_raw: When you summon an Elite, grant it +1|+1.
fields.flavor_text: Wars are won in the forge.
fields.name: Battlesmith

fields.description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, Rally.
fields.flavor_text: “Our House has bled for this realm. You’ll not throw away this family’s honor for a few tricks of light.”
fields.name: Tianna Crownguard

fields.flavor_text: Training and resilience are the way of a soldier. Even in the face of great peril, we will not falter.
fields.name: Garen

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Rally.
fields.flavor_text: "You think me rigid. Single-minded. Predictable. I am rigid, for nothing can sway me. I am single-minded, for I believe in Demacia. And I am predictable, for I will surely defeat you.”
fields.name: Garen

fields.description:
A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> all battling enemies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Garen</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
A battling ally strikes all battling enemies.
Create a Garen in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: Justice always comes full circle.
fields.name: Garen's Judgment

fields.description: If you have exactly 1 ally, grant it +3|+3.
fields.description_raw: If you have exactly 1 ally, grant it +3|+3.
fields.flavor_text: When others fail, it falls upon the shoulders of a true hero to find a path to victory.
fields.name: Stand Alone

fields.flavor_text: "From arena to tournament, training ground to battleground, I long for a worthy opponent. I will not rest until I know I am the greatest."
fields.name: Fiora

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give all allies <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Play or Attack: Give all allies Barrier this round.
fields.flavor_text: "This formation is the basis of our tactics. It requires the faith of each soldier in their shield, and in the shields of their companions. So long as they stand, so too shall our realm." - Garen
fields.name: Brightsteel Formation

fields.description: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Rally.
fields.flavor_text: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian
fields.name: Relentless Pursuit

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Rally.
Create a Lucian in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian
fields.name: Lucian's Relentless Pursuit

fields.description: Each round, the first time an ally dies, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Each round, the first time an ally dies, Rally.
fields.flavor_text: "World's full of monsters. If you're lucky, they're the ones you can see. The worst are the ones that stay under your skin."
fields.name: Lucian

fields.description: An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> a unit.
fields.description_raw: An ally Captures a unit.
fields.flavor_text: "Submit to us. We are the law and you are its subject. There is nothing more." - Mageseeker Persuader
fields.name: Detain

fields.description: A battling ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> all battling enemies.
fields.description_raw: A battling ally strikes all battling enemies.
fields.flavor_text: Justice always comes full circle.
fields.name: Judgment

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Play: Give an ally Challenger this round.
fields.flavor_text: "He seemed a preening fop with an expensive blade--turns out he really knew how to swing that sword! I'd demand a rematch, but I missed his name with that ridiculous accent." - Demacian ensign
fields.name: Laurent Duelist

fields.description: Grant me +2|+2 once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
fields.description_raw: Grant me +2|+2 once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
fields.flavor_text: "Long ago, the wild magicks of the Rune Wars brought all Runeterra to its knees. Thus, our order was created to protect our kingdom by ridding it of magic, whether abroad or within." - Mageseeker's Handbook
fields.name: Mageseeker Inciter

fields.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Grant other allies +1|+1.
fields.description_raw: Allegiance: Grant other allies +1|+1.
fields.flavor_text: "You must understand the weight of our banner. It flies for our king, our houses, our citizens. It is our unwavering belief in Demacia itself. Hold it high. Show them our pride." - Tianna Crownguard
fields.name: Vanguard Bannerman

fields.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +1|+1 this round.
fields.description_raw: Support: Give my supported ally +1|+1 this round.
fields.flavor_text: No one in the Demacian army should be trifled with.
fields.name: War Chefs

fields.flavor_text: "New recruit has the kind of endurance and courage shown by our finest soldiers. Will he make it to the Vanguard someday? He's... smaller than the rest, but we'll see." - Vanguard Sergeant
fields.name: Plucky Poro

fields.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create in hand another <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> follower from your regions.
fields.description_raw: Strike: Create in hand another Challenger follower from your regions.
fields.flavor_text: "...Good grief." - Fiora
fields.name: Laurent Chevalier

fields.description: Costs 1 less for each ally that died this round. Summon a random 5 cost follower from Demacia.
fields.description_raw: Costs 1 less for each ally that died this round. Summon a random 5 cost follower from Demacia.
fields.flavor_text: "Today we rise to right the injustices that felled those before us. The sacrifices of our comrades were not in vain." - Radiant Guardian
fields.name: Remembrance

fields.description: When I've killed 4 enemies and survived, you win the game. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: When I've killed 4 enemies and survived, you win the game.
fields.flavor_text: "... and now I know."
fields.name: Fiora

fields.description:
Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Fiora</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Give an ally +3|+0 and Barrier this round.
Create a Fiora in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora
fields.name: Fiora's Riposte

fields.description: Fully heal an ally, then double its Power and Health.
fields.description_raw: Fully heal an ally, then double its Power and Health.
fields.flavor_text: In Demacia, to be as good as two of the enemy isn't just a boast.
fields.name: Redoubled Valor

fields.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create in hand a 6+ cost spell from a region other than Demacia.
fields.description_raw: Last Breath: Create in hand a 6+ cost spell from a region other than Demacia.
fields.flavor_text:
"Arcane items have undeniable intrigue. But these objects of power are best left to the capable hands of our experts, and away from the well-meaning ignorance of our citizens."
- Mageseeker's Handbook
fields.name: Mageseeker Conservator

fields.description: When I'm summoned, summon an exact copy of me.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon an exact copy of me.
fields.flavor_text: They fell from the clouds like silvery bolts of lightning, swift and sure as they dove toward their targets. Then, as suddenly as they appeared, they were gone.
fields.name: Silverwing Vanguard

fields.flavor_text: "He did WHAT? I entrusted him with Pierre de Guillard's priceless dual-balanced sabre! He said it was only to be used for training!" - Laurent Bladekeeper
fields.name: Laurent Protege

fields.description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguard</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Summon a Dauntless Vanguard.
fields.flavor_text: Vestments of the Dauntless Vanguard are handed down from one soldier to the next, so that new recruits may feel the weight and pride of their responsibilities.
fields.name: Succession

fields.flavor_text: Just because it's quiet doesn't mean it's safe.
fields.name: Vanguard Lookout

fields.description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a follower.
fields.description_raw: Silence a follower.
fields.flavor_text:
"Your petricite Graymark is your primary safeguard against magic, a symbol of our responsibilities, and a reminder to others of our authority. Honor it above all else."
- The Mageseekers' Handbook
fields.name: Purify

fields.flavor_text: The Dauntless Vanguard are Demacia's most elite warriors, each a legend in their village or shire. But all of them seek to have their names known throughout the realm.
fields.name: Dauntless Vanguard

fields.description: Grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
fields.description_raw: Grant me +1|+1 and Challenger once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
fields.flavor_text: "Citizens of Demacia, it is my honor to keep you safe. But we must demand your unwavering support, for even within our high walls, mages still walk among us!"
fields.name: Mageseeker Persuader

fields.description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
fields.description_raw: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
fields.flavor_text: "Everyone I met, every journey I took taught me something new. But the more I learned and the stronger I became, the more I realized I had much further to go..." - Cithria, Vanguard Squire
fields.name: Vanguard Squire

fields.description: Give an ally +3|+0 and <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +3|+0 and Barrier this round.
fields.flavor_text: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora
fields.name: Riposte

fields.description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguards</style></link>, then grant Elite allies +1|+1.
fields.description_raw: Summon 2 Dauntless Vanguards, then grant Elite allies +1|+1.
fields.flavor_text:
"Our rivals know that to strike at any of us is to strike at all of us."
- The Vanguard's Code
fields.name: Reinforcements

fields.description: When I'm summoned, grant me <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> if an ally died this round.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant me Lifesteal and Tough if an ally died this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Waves of cold undead hands pulled down her companions. Only she remained, a gleaming beacon of justice whose blade seemed to sing the names of the fallen with every swing." - Demacian ensign
fields.name: Radiant Guardian

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally +2|+2.
fields.description_raw: Play: Grant an ally +2|+2.
fields.flavor_text: "Yes, they are beautiful. But like any fine instrument, they only reveal their true beauty in the hands of a master."
fields.name: Laurent Bladekeeper

fields.description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
fields.description_raw: An ally and an enemy strike each other.
fields.flavor_text: "Save your words; we speak with blades." - Fiora
fields.name: Single Combat

fields.description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally Barrier this round.
fields.flavor_text: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux
fields.name: Prismatic Barrier

fields.description: Give all allies <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Give all allies Challenger this round.
fields.flavor_text: "There's not a Demacian alive who would refuse a Laurent's lesson in swordsmanship. Or survived one, for that matter." - Fiora
fields.name: En Garde

fields.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>For Demacia!</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create a For Demacia! in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "He leads our drills from morning to night, and he's the first to head into the fray. Hard as steel, steady as stone--couldn't choose a finer leader." - Demacian ensign
fields.name: Vanguard Sergeant

fields.description: The first time an allied <link=card.luc1><style=AssociatedCard>Lucian</style></link> dies, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: The first time an allied Lucian dies, grant me +1|+1 and Double Attack.
fields.flavor_text: "Our Sentinels are the first line of defense between the tide of restless undead and the realms of man. We hit first, hit hard, and NEVER back down when the lives of our companions are on the line."
fields.name: Senna, Sentinel of Light

fields.description: Give 2 allies +3|+3 this round.
fields.description_raw: Give 2 allies +3|+3 this round.
fields.flavor_text:
"Cover me, I'm going in!"
"Funny, I was about to say the same to you."
- Lorn and Dax of the Eastern Battalion
fields.name: Back to Back

fields.description: Give all allies +3|+3 this round.
fields.description_raw: Give all allies +3|+3 this round.
fields.flavor_text: “It is our homes, our families, our comrades in arms. It is our pride, our honor, our strength. And so, today, as we fight for its defense and its very existence, let us shout its name: DEMACIA!" - Vanguard Sergeant
fields.name: For Demacia!

fields.description: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Undead fight like they've got no tomorrow. We'll make sure they won’t get one." - Lucian
fields.name: Radiant Strike

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Play: Give an ally Barrier this round.
fields.flavor_text: "We are a prosperous nation because each warrior's fate is a coin we will never be content to spend." - King Jarvan III
fields.name: Brightsteel Protector

fields.flavor_text: "Each night before bed, my mother would tell me stories of Demacia's greatest heroes as she sharpened her sword. My dreams were full of adventures, and today I'll begin a story all my own."
fields.name: Cithria of Cloudfield

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +2|+2.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Grant me +2|+2.
fields.flavor_text: The battle cry sounds, and my feet are already turning over the soil. I need nothing but my lady's order to know my destiny and enact her will.
fields.name: Vanguard Firstblade

fields.description: When you summon another ally, grant me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When you summon another ally, grant me Challenger.
fields.flavor_text: These relatives of the silverwing raptors have the predatory instincts of their cousins alongside a dogged unfamiliarity with their own comparatively diminutive size.
fields.name: Fleetfeather Tracker

fields.flavor_text: The Vanguard needed no drums, no music to keep time in their advance. Only the steady, even beat of hooves against soil.
fields.name: Vanguard Cavalry

fields.description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Grant an ally Tough.
fields.flavor_text: Demacian steel is known throughout the world for its superior strength. Its forging requires smiths of equal strength and repute.
fields.name: Chain Vest

fields.description: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Detain</style></link> in hand once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
fields.description_raw: Create a Detain in hand once you've cast a 6+ cost spell this game.
fields.flavor_text: "Forgive the intrusion, but we will require your full cooperation. We have been notified of some... 'unusual happenings'..."
fields.name: Mageseeker Investigator

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other attacking allies +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Give other attacking allies +1|+1 and Fearsome this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Legends, tales--they were never just fiction to me. They were adventure calling my name. I left Cloudfield to discover my own adventure, only to find I would have many. And they’re just beginning.”
fields.name: Cithria the Bold

fields.description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit if an ally died this round.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, draw a unit if an ally died this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Our fallen shall be remembered in every battle cry, in every swing of our swords, and every crash of our shields! Today, we shall be victorious!"
fields.name: Vanguard Redeemer

fields.flavor_text: Arrows rained down from the fortress walls in droves, but none could touch that fleck of silver darting through the sky.
fields.name: Silverwing Diver

fields.level_up_description: I see your hand is empty.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I see your hand is empty.
fields.flavor_text:
"What'samatter, Fishbones?"
"I'm worried about you, Jinx! Every time you get bored, you..."
"...want to blow something up! Great idea, Fishbones!"
fields.name: Jinx

fields.description:
To play, discard 1. Deal 3 to anything.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jinx</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
To play, discard 1. Deal 3 to anything.
Create a Jinx in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "FIRE IN THE CABOODLE!" - Jinx
fields.name: Jinx's Get Excited!

fields.description: Deal 4 to the enemy nexus and 1 to all enemies.
fields.description_raw: Deal 4 to the enemy nexus and 1 to all enemies.
fields.flavor_text: "See ya!" - Jinx
fields.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!

fields.description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Draw 1.
Each round, the first time you empty your hand, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Super Mega Death Rocket!</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw:
Round Start: Draw 1.
Each round, the first time you empty your hand, create a Super Mega Death Rocket! in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "It's all just fun and games until something gets blown up - then it's a PARTY!"
fields.name: Jinx

fields.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
fields.description_raw: Nexus Strike: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Bandle Scout Rule 154: Never fear the unknown! Rule 276: Denizens of the woodlands are our friends! Rule 354: If it's fuzzy, it might be safe to pet but certainly isn't safe to eat! Rule 417..."
fields.name: Teemo

fields.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Double the <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> in the enemy deck.
fields.description_raw: Nexus Strike: Double the Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
fields.flavor_text: "... make sure you're out of the blast zone!"
fields.name: Teemo

fields.description:
Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Teemo</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
Create a Teemo in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: First, the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...
fields.name: Teemo's Mushroom Cloud

fields.description: When you cast a spell, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> Turret in hand with equal cost. It costs 0 this round.
fields.description_raw: When you cast a spell, create a Fleeting Turret in hand with equal cost. It costs 0 this round.
fields.level_up_description: I've seen you summon 12+ Power of Turrets<style=Variable></style>.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I've seen you summon 12+ Power of Turrets.
fields.flavor_text: "Mad scientist? Pft! I'm clearly a very-stable-if-slightly-disorganized-and-eclectic scientist, thank you very much!"
fields.name: Heimerdinger

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
fields.description_raw: Play: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
fields.flavor_text: His dreams cost him his hands, yet he persisted. Nothing would stand in his way.
fields.name: Augmented Experimenter

fields.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Create 4 copies of the supported ally in your deck.
fields.description_raw: Support: Create 4 copies of the supported ally in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: The boom of the cannons drew crowds toward the plaza, eager to see the show. It would take them weeks to wash the last of the confetti from their hair.
fields.name: Parade Electrorig

fields.description: When you cast a spell, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> Turret in hand with equal cost. Grant it +1|+1 and it costs 0 this round.
fields.description_raw: When you cast a spell, create a Fleeting Turret in hand with equal cost. Grant it +1|+1 and it costs 0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "PROGRESSSSS!"
fields.name: Heimerdinger

fields.flavor_text:
"Safety precautions for the laboratory! Recent postings have mentioned young Jayce's workshop was raided by thieves. Ha--local intruders, beware!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 2
fields.name: Mk2: Evolution Turret

fields.flavor_text:
"PROGRESS CONTINUES! I have finally found a way to combine the raw power of hexenergy with my ball tosser! I present, the STORMLOBBER! Now to sleep."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 4
fields.name: Mk4: Stormlobber

fields.description:
Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Heimerdinger</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
Create a Heimerdinger in your deck.
fields.flavor_text:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!
fields.name: Heimerdinger's Progress Day!

fields.flavor_text:
"Ah, the sweet smell of science! I have successfully upgraded my turrets! I must say... this model's appearance sends hypothermic waves through my vertebrae! Brr!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 3
fields.name: Mk3: Apex Turret

fields.flavor_text:
"After a few production issues--propulsion and guidance, predominantly--I am ready to unveil my PROPELLED COMBUSTIBLES! ...must work on a better name."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 5
fields.name: Mk5: Rocket Blaster

fields.flavor_text:
"I dreamt of a great mechanical beast, obeying my every command! I MUST realize this vision. First, stability tests, then ordnance and armor evaluation..."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 7
fields.name: Mk7: Armored Stomper

fields.flavor_text:
"TODAY I EMBARK UPON A NEW SCIENTIFIC ADVENTURE: AUTOMATONS! As the saying goes, it takes a great mind to create great things! Who said that, you ask? Why, ME!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Preface
fields.name: Mk0: Windup Shredder

fields.flavor_text:
"It occurred to me earlier that--with only two hands--I can only maximally operate two wrenches! My solution: MORE HANDS. Oho! I jest. A WRENCHBOT!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 1
fields.name: Mk1: Wrenchbot

fields.flavor_text:
"I seem to have misplaced my latest work. And my mezzanine. I'm concerned about my bot, but the shrieking from the ceramics research laboratory gives me hope!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 6
fields.name: Mk6: Floor-B-Gone

fields.flavor_text: How does she aim? That's an excellent question.
fields.name: Academy Prodigy

fields.description: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana.
fields.flavor_text: Not everyone is cut out to further progress in Piltover immediately. Some need a little guidance--those who look at invention through the wrong lens, for instance.
fields.name: Eager Apprentice

fields.description: When you cast a spell, plant 3 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
fields.description_raw: When you cast a spell, plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
fields.flavor_text:
"These any good?"
"Of course! They're all top notch! Spoke to them myself!"
"Okay hand em--wait what?"
"Mmhmm! Getting married, this one!"
"How many have you had...?"
"--to a barnacle!"
fields.name: Puffcap Peddler

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
fields.description_raw: Play: Obliterate the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
fields.flavor_text: "The narrow-minded Piltovans know only gears and metal, and cannot appreciate the delicate art in every stem, every petal, every cell of my cultivair. I will craft them an undeservedly graceful doom."
fields.name: Corina Veraza

fields.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
fields.description_raw: Obliterate the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
fields.flavor_text: "I told them that every achievement had its cost. I didn't tell them who would pay it." - Corina Veraza
fields.name: Magnum Opus

fields.flavor_text: Everyone tries to chase it down. Poor little thing just wants to play in puddles!
fields.name: Scrap Scuttler

fields.flavor_text:
"IT'S FINALLY COMPLETE! SIX-HUNDRED AND FIFTY-TWO FEET OF ROTARY-TEMPERED, HEX-PLATED, QUADRANIUM-CELL-POWERED STOMPING!!! My finest work, if I daresaysomyself."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 8
fields.name: T-Hex

fields.description: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
fields.flavor_text:
"Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Ow ow ow, ow ow ow!
Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Down we go, down we go!"
- Zaunite nursery rhyme
fields.name: Poison Puffcap

fields.description: When cast or discarded, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Scrap Scuttler</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When cast or discarded, summon a Scrap Scuttler.
fields.flavor_text: With a handful of scrap and mere moments left, the young inventor recalled an unusual source of inspiration: a creature she once saw scuttling along the rivers of a distant jungle.
fields.name: Jury-Rig

fields.description: Give an ally +4|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +4|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
fields.flavor_text: "It kinda tickles when it starts to glow. That's normal... right?" - Ezreal
fields.name: Rising Spell Force

fields.description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text:
"You sure about this?"
"Nope."
"You were supposed to say 'yes'."
"You weren't supposed to ask."
fields.name: Boomcrew Rookie

fields.description: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Time to go!" - Boomcrew Rookie
fields.name: Undermine

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
fields.description_raw: Play: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
fields.flavor_text: "Hello, fellow Chem-Barons!"
fields.name: Shady Character

fields.description: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
fields.description_raw: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
fields.flavor_text: Definitely not a pair of yordles in a suit.
fields.name: Impersonate

fields.description: When I'm summoned, summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Caustic Casks</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon 2 Caustic Casks.
fields.flavor_text: "Ziel sent ya? I told him, what's his is his. Can't refund somethin' I ain't ever seen before, can I? But, as it happens, I just received a batch of new casks I could be persuaded to part with..."
fields.name: Used Cask Salesman

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard a card to draw 1.
fields.description_raw: Play: Discard a card to draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: In the Sump, waste is never wasted.
fields.name: Sump Dredger

fields.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mystic Shot</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Nexus Strike: Create a Fleeting Mystic Shot in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Goggles? Check. Scarf? Check. Awesome gauntlet-with-magical-properties-that-I-totally understand? Check, check, aaaand check!"
fields.name: Ezreal

fields.description:
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mystic Shot</style></link> in hand.
When you cast a spell, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. If it targeted an enemy, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
fields.description_raw:
Nexus Strike: Create a Fleeting Mystic Shot in hand.
When you cast a spell, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. If it targeted an enemy, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
fields.flavor_text: "Impossible is my favorite kind of possible!"
fields.name: Ezreal

fields.description:
Deal 2 to anything.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ezreal</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Deal 2 to anything.
Create an Ezreal in your deck.
