fields.name: Dreg Dredgers

fields.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon a Powder Keg.
fields.flavor_text: "Aye, we could fight 'em at dawn, when their crew's awake and their cannons are primed. Or we could leave 'em a gift tonight, nice and quiet-like..."
fields.name: Dreadway Deckhand

fields.description:
Double all damage dealt by your skills, spells and allies.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Gangplank</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
Double all damage dealt by your skills, spells and allies.
Play: Draw a Gangplank.
fields.flavor_text:
"Ohhhh, best say yer farewells and draw down the sails,
For the Dreadway's a-comin'.
We're off to the deep, where graves're replete,
'Cuz the Dreadway's a-comin'!" - "The Dreadway's a-Comin'"
fields.name: The Dreadway

fields.description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant me +0|+1 for each card you drew last round, then shuffle my stats.
<style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Grant me +0|+1 for each card you drew last round, then shuffle my stats.
fields.flavor_text: One prototype spun three bombs and then exploded. Later models had this early "feature" removed.
fields.name: Slotbot

fields.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Golden Narwhal</style></link> for your opponent.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon a Golden Narwhal for your opponent.
fields.flavor_text: The gold that glitters beneath the waves is neither coin nor ingot, but the lustrous horn of the Slaughter Fleet captain's clever adversary.
fields.name: Hunting Fleet

fields.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Reduce the cost of allies in your hand and deck by 2.
fields.description_raw: Plunder: Reduce the cost of allies in your hand and deck by 2.
fields.flavor_text: "Come with us on a musical journey! Enjoy tunes from across Runeterra! Just remember--coin's required for entry, and tips are deeply appreciated..." - Show promoter
fields.name: Smooth Soloist

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Miss Fortune</style></link>.
While I'm attacking, all your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
fields.description_raw:
Play: Draw a Miss Fortune.
While I'm attacking, all your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
fields.flavor_text: There's no mistaking the Syren. Her broad pearly sails and polished woodwork leave her as sleek and decorated as the captain at her helm.
fields.name: The Syren

fields.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant me 2 random keywords.
fields.description_raw: Plunder: Grant me 2 random keywords.
fields.flavor_text: "His picture's been on the Bounty Board longer'n most, for he's a greedy, ruthless devil that won't let anyone or anything stand in his way. Worst of all? He's... He's cute, damn it." - Gangplank
fields.name: Plunder Poro

fields.description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link> and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, draw 1 at the next Round Start and give it Fleeting.
fields.flavor_text: "It don't make no sense to me. I was knocking 'em in easy, but the last one just... wouldn't go. Not my day, I s'pose..." - Brash Gambler
fields.name: Pool Shark

fields.description: When I'm summoned, grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant the Strongest enemy Vulnerable.
fields.flavor_text: "This your picture? Oof, you're even rougher on the eyes than advertised--let's hope your head's worth my while."
fields.name: Hired Gun

fields.description: When I'm summoned, create a random Sea Monster in hand.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create a random Sea Monster in hand.
fields.flavor_text: The lure of fortune pulls countless crews out beyond the shallows. Those poor souls soon discover how terrifying the waters can be, and why so few return.
fields.name: Jaull Hunters

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Transform an ally into a random 5 cost follower.
fields.description_raw: Play: Transform an ally into a random 5 cost follower.
fields.flavor_text:
"Marvolio? Where... Where are my hands?"
"I will-a now make-a them appear! Tadaa! Ahem. Ta... daa...!"
"...WHERE ARE MY HANDS?!"
"OKAY, TIME-A TO GO! THANK-A YOU ALL SO VERY MUCH!"
fields.name: Mystifying Magician

fields.flavor_text: Legends say a pale, horned whale once stole from the Bearded Lady. As punishment, the Lady covered the greedy creature in glittering gold, so it would forever tempt the avarice of others.
fields.name: Golden Narwhal

fields.description:
When you draw an enemy card, reduce its cost by 1.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
fields.description_raw:
When you draw an enemy card, reduce its cost by 1.
Plunder: Nab 1.
fields.flavor_text: "If you want it, I've got it! Even got some 'special stock'.... Just remember, you didn't get it from me!"
fields.name: Black Market Merchant

fields.description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Captain's orders: bullet to the face!" - Crackshot Corsair
fields.name: Crackshot

fields.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon a Powder Keg.
fields.level_up_description: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds<style=Variable></style>.
fields.level_up_description_raw: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds.
fields.flavor_text: "Don't stare too long, lest he catches you lookin'. And don't speak ill of him, for he hears all Bilgewater's whispers. Here he comes. Chin low. Eyes lower." - Dreadway deckhand
fields.name: Gangplank

fields.description:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Gangplank</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a Gangplank in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.
fields.name: Gangplank's Parrrley

fields.description:
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Keg</style></link>.
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Summon a Powder Keg.
Attack: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Seen his eyes enough to know. Ain't nothin' but pure anger there. Someday, the boss'll do to Bilgewater what it did to him." - Petty Officer
fields.name: Gangplank

fields.description:
Powder Kegs stack.
All of your spells and skills deal <style=Variable>1</style> extra damage.
Destroy me when your spell or skill damages enemies or the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw:
Powder Kegs stack.
All of your spells and skills deal 1 extra damage.
Destroy me when your spell or skill damages enemies or the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Where there's a keg, there's a way." - Bilgewater saying
fields.name: Powder Keg

fields.description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Blow 'em to the depths!" - Gangplank
fields.name: Powderful Explosion

fields.description: When allies attack, deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: When allies attack, deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "'Miss' Fortune? Out here, you call me 'Captain'."
fields.name: Miss Fortune

fields.description:
Deal 1 three times among different randomly targeted enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Miss Fortune</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Deal 1 three times among different randomly targeted enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Create a Miss Fortune in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Guns blazin'!" - Miss Fortune
fields.name: Miss Fortune's Make it Rain

fields.description: When allies attack, deal 1 three times to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: When allies attack, deal 1 three times to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Most people don't get close enough to see the craftsmanship on these guns. Lucky you."
fields.name: Miss Fortune

fields.description: Deal 1 three times to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 three times to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: Even if you fail to hear the bawdy cries of her crew, there's no way you'll miss her laughter...
fields.name: Bullet Time

fields.description: Deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "A little something to remember me by." - Miss Fortune
fields.name: Love Tap

fields.description: When you cast a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: When you cast a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me Elusive this round.
fields.flavor_text: Of all Bilgewater's legendary figures, Fizz is the most mercurial. Some sailors curse him for the countless brutal wrecks littering the coast...
fields.name: Fizz

fields.description:
When you cast a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Chum the Waters</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw:
When you cast a spell, stop all enemy spells and skills targeting me and give me Elusive this round.
Nexus Strike: Create a Chum the Waters in hand.
fields.flavor_text: ...while others insist he's just a playful child who safeguards others on their journeys home.
fields.name: Fizz

fields.flavor_text: Though there may be ambiguity surrounding Fizz's temperament and intentions, there's absolutely none when it comes to Longtooth.
fields.name: Longtooth

fields.description:
Remove an attacking ally from combat to <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Fizz</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Remove an attacking ally from combat to Rally.
Create a Fizz in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "One jump ahead of you!" - Fizz
fields.name: Fizz's Playful Trickster

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Play a Destiny Card.
fields.description_raw: Play: Play a Destiny Card.
fields.flavor_text: "Now, watch the hands, count the cards, and try to keep up. And just remember..."
fields.name: Twisted Fate

fields.description: Deal 2 and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
fields.description_raw: Deal 2 and Stun the Strongest enemy.
fields.flavor_text: "All that glitters..." - Twisted Fate
fields.name: Gold Card

fields.description: Each round, the first 3 times you play a card, I play a Destiny Card.
fields.description_raw: Each round, the first 3 times you play a card, I play a Destiny Card.
fields.flavor_text: "...it ain't gamblin' if you can't lose."
fields.name: Twisted Fate

fields.description:
Place a card from hand into your deck to draw 3 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. Give them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Twisted Fate</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Place a card from hand into your deck to draw 3 at the next Round Start. Give them Fleeting.
Create a Twisted Fate in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate
fields.name: Twisted Fate's Pick a Card

fields.description:
Refill 1 spell mana.
Draw 1.
fields.description_raw:
Refill 1 spell mana.
Draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: "Blue as the Serpentine." - Twisted Fate
fields.name: Blue Card

fields.description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Somethin' for everyone." - Twisted Fate
fields.name: Red Card

fields.description: When I Level Up, copy <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link> allies that cost 4+ into your deck.
fields.description_raw: When I Level Up, copy Tossed allies that cost 4+ into your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "'Twas an anchor what broke the Rancour. Pulled Finn down, an' all. Just a handful of us left now, but night's coming... and the cold. I'm sorry, Ma. You were right. The Titan lives." - Recovered note
fields.name: Nautilus

fields.description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a <link=card.champCheck><style=AssociatedCard>Nautilus</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nautilus</style></link> into your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Stun an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a Nautilus.
Create a Nautilus into your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Drag them down..." - Nautilus
fields.name: Nautilus's Riptide

fields.description: Sea Monster allies cost 4 less.
fields.description_raw: Sea Monster allies cost 4 less.
fields.flavor_text: All pay the tithe, one way or another.
fields.name: Nautilus

fields.description:
When drawn, costs 1 less this round.
Grant an ally +2|+1.
fields.description_raw:
When drawn, costs 1 less this round.
Grant an ally +2|+1.
fields.flavor_text: "Ain't nothin' like a hot streak to keep the chips comin'." - Twisted Fate
fields.name: Pocket Aces

fields.description: Summon 2 random 1 cost followers.
fields.description_raw: Summon 2 random 1 cost followers.
fields.flavor_text:
"Oi, Gav--ain't that the fella we're after? Looks like he found a friend."
"Is that... Is that a shark-man, Baz?"
"It's also a bunch more gold, mate. Come on..." - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
fields.name: Double Trouble

fields.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Place a follower in play into your hand.
fields.description_raw: Plunder: Place a follower in play into your hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Yer workin' fer us now!" - Petty Officer
fields.name: Strong-arm

fields.description: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Longtooth</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and summon Longtooth.
fields.flavor_text: "Shark!" - Fizz
fields.name: Chum the Waters

fields.description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Kegs</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Summon 2 Powder Kegs.
fields.flavor_text: "Barrel!" - Gangplank
fields.name: More Powder!

fields.description:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.
fields.name: Parrrley

fields.description: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
fields.description_raw: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
fields.flavor_text:
"Whatcha think, Baz? He don't look so tough."
"Ya sure, Gav? He broke out of prison..."
"Means he's wily, not tough. Come on!" - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters
fields.name: Jailbreak

fields.description: Place a card from hand into your deck to draw 3 at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. Give them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Place a card from hand into your deck to draw 3 at the next Round Start. Give them Fleeting.
fields.flavor_text: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate
fields.name: Pick a Card

fields.description: Remove an attacking ally from combat to <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Remove an attacking ally from combat to Rally.
fields.flavor_text: "One jump ahead of you!" - Fizz
fields.name: Playful Trickster

fields.description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a <link=card.champCheck><style=AssociatedCard>Nautilus</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
Stun an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a Nautilus.
fields.flavor_text: "Drag them down..." - Nautilus
fields.name: Riptide

fields.description: This round, grow all allies' Power and Health to the number of spells you've cast this game. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: This round, grow all allies' Power and Health to the number of spells you've cast this game.
fields.flavor_text: The currents and tides around Bilgewater are rightly feared for their strength and sudden turns. But no sailor knows the true power within those waters.
fields.name: Mind Meld

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
Deal 7 to a unit.
fields.description_raw:
Toss 3.
Deal 7 to a unit.
fields.flavor_text: "If it sinks 'em, it was worth it." - Bilgewater saying
fields.name: Scrapshot

fields.description:
Reduce the cost of Sea Monster allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> by 1.
Draw a Sea Monster.
fields.description_raw:
Reduce the cost of Sea Monster allies everywhere by 1.
Draw a Sea Monster.
fields.flavor_text: Sailors speak in hushed tones of dark days to come; when the seas churn and boil, and unspeakable horrors rise from the waves.
fields.name: Lure of the Depths

fields.description:
Deal 2 to an enemy.
If this kills it, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw:
Deal 2 to an enemy.
If this kills it, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "I always shoot first." - Miss Fortune
fields.name: Double Up

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2.
Draw 2.
fields.description_raw:
Toss 2.
Draw 2.
fields.flavor_text: Flotsam doesn't stay afloat for long. Any seafarer worth their salt has to be able to quickly discern valuable cargo from common junk before all's lost to the deep.
fields.name: Salvage

fields.description:
<link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1 more.
fields.description_raw:
Nab 1.
Plunder: Nab 1 more.
fields.flavor_text: What's mine is mine, and what's yours is... also mine.
fields.name: Pilfered Goods

fields.description: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round. If it dies this round, draw 1.
fields.description_raw: Give an enemy Vulnerable this round. If it dies this round, draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: "Keep yer chin up and yer spirits high, boy! If the cap'n sees ya saggin', he'll hoist ya up, cut y'open, an' feed ya to the gulls. Now, move yer arse!" - Dreadway deckhand
fields.name: Ye Been Warned

fields.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Draw a random non-champion from the enemy hand.
fields.description_raw: Plunder: Draw a random non-champion from the enemy hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Cards ain't about luck. It's about people. You get the folks across the table to doubt themselves? Might as well take all they've got there and then." - Twisted Fate
fields.name: Sleight of Hand

fields.description: Deal 1 three times among different randomly targeted enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 three times among different randomly targeted enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Guns blazin'!" - Miss Fortune
fields.name: Make it Rain

fields.description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Yer supposed to fire w' the rest of us, lad! That's what a salvo is!" - Petty Officer
fields.name: Warning Shot

fields.description: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 4.
fields.description_raw: Toss 4.
fields.flavor_text: "If it ain't worth its weight, it goes over. Same goes for you lot, 'n all. Now back ta work!" - Petty Officer
fields.name: Jettison

fields.description: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower and grant it <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower and grant it Scout.
fields.flavor_text:
"Lift the light from Mother Serpent
To the clouds, up from the waves.
The sky looks down, with gray eyes earnest,
A calm reflection of her gaze.
She smiles, is at peace..."
- prayer to Nagakaborous
fields.name: Island Navigator

fields.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Get an empty mana gem.
fields.description_raw: Plunder: Get an empty mana gem.
fields.flavor_text: The young riders of the Winter's Claw are given a wolf pup the moment they can hold a weapon. Their upbringing is devoted entirely to battle--the wolf trained to savage and maim, and the rider to pillage and steal.
fields.name: Wolfrider

fields.description: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
fields.flavor_text: "These warmbloods wouldn't last a single day in the Freljord!" - Sejuani
fields.name: Caught in the Cold

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Play: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
fields.level_up_description: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds<style=Variable></style>.
fields.level_up_description_raw: You've damaged the enemy Nexus in 5 different rounds.
fields.flavor_text: While her flail of True Ice is formidable, Sejuani herself is the weapon--forged in the bitter cold of the Freljord and tested against the freezing climes.
fields.name: Sejuani

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
fields.flavor_text:
"They will till their fruitful fields,
They will weakly sow their seeds.
We will set 'most all aflame, 
Winter's Claw takes what it please!" - a Winter's Claw children's rhyme
fields.name: Ember Maiden

fields.description: <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: I transform into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Stormclaw Ursine</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Plunder: I transform into Stormclaw Ursine.
fields.flavor_text: The Ursine begin as humans, but give up the familiar trappings of their mortal lives for the feral, savage power granted by the great spirit of the Volibear.
fields.name: Ursine Spiritwalker

fields.description: Other allies with 5+ Power have <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Other allies with 5+ Power have Overwhelm.
fields.flavor_text: Fully unleashed, the Ursine shed their humanity and take on the power of the storm. They tear across the frozen steppes, their roars echoing like peals of thunder.
fields.name: Stormclaw Ursine

fields.description:
Grant the top 3 units in your deck +1|+1.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Draw 1 of them.
fields.description_raw:
Grant the top 3 units in your deck +1|+1.
Plunder: Draw 1 of them.
fields.flavor_text: "Share and share alike." - Ruthless Raider
fields.name: Shared Spoils

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Double the Power and Health of allies in your deck.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Sejuani</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
Plunder: Double the Power and Health of allies in your deck.
Play: Draw a Sejuani.
fields.flavor_text: "When Spring brings weather just warm enough for us to plant, it also brings longboats... and the grain that started plentiful grows sparse." - Avarosan Hearthguard
fields.name: The Tuskraider

fields.description:
Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Sejuani</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
Create a Sejuani in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Embrace the beast within!" - Sejuani
fields.name: Sejuani's Fury of the North

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an enemy <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
Each round, the first time you damage the enemy Nexus, <link=keyword.Frostbite><sprite name=Frostbite><style=Keyword>Frostbite</style></link> all enemies.
fields.description_raw:
Play: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
Each round, the first time you damage the enemy Nexus, Frostbite all enemies.
fields.flavor_text: "Lay them low! Show them the Freljord belongs to the Winter's Claw!"
fields.name: Sejuani

fields.description: Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Embrace the beast within!" - Sejuani
fields.name: Fury of the North

fields.flavor_text: The Winter's Claw has no equal in the Freljord, and all know the ferocity of these merciless raiders. Once their bloodlust takes over, one can only pray for a quick death.
fields.name: Ruthless Raider

fields.description: Create 2 random Poros and 2 <link=card.snaxRef><style=AssociatedCard>Poro Snax</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Create 2 random Poros and 2 Poro Snax in hand.
fields.flavor_text:
"When you wish upon a poro,
An' look at da night sky,
You'll see da snax among da stars,
All sparkly in our eyes" - Ingvar the Younger
fields.name: Aurora Porealis

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Swain</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus 3 times.
fields.description_raw:
Play: Draw a Swain.
Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus 3 times.
fields.flavor_text: When the Ionian locals saw it looming on the horizon, they thought it a monster. They were not far from the truth--the steel warship is terrifying, the greatest feat of Noxian naval engineering yet.
fields.name: The Leviathan

fields.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Nexus Strike: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "A power beyond mortal understanding gave me the vision to see what most cannot. I peer through the darkness others fear."
fields.name: Swain

fields.description:
When you deal non-combat damage to the enemy Nexus, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> backrow enemy.
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal 3 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw:
When you deal non-combat damage to the enemy Nexus, Stun the Strongest backrow enemy.
Nexus Strike: Deal 3 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "No sacrifice is too great to see my vision for Noxus fulfilled."
fields.name: Swain

fields.description:
Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Swain</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or Stunned.
Create a Swain in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.
fields.name: Swain's Ravenous Flock

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: The elder’s voice was surprisingly calm. “What, pray tell,” he inquired, “is the point of gathering stones to build higher walls, when the Noxians always manage to toss them back over?”
fields.name: Citybreaker

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> all damaged enemies.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Stun all damaged enemies.
fields.flavor_text: “For generations, we have been subjugated. It was not until Noxus took our lands that we finally understood true freedom. That is why I fight for the empire.”
fields.name: Aurok Glinthorn

fields.description: Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or Stunned.
fields.flavor_text: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.
fields.name: Ravenous Flock

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Play: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Quick and quiet, 'til the boom."
fields.name: Imperial Demolitionist

fields.description: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to anything.
fields.description_raw: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to anything.
fields.flavor_text: "Sacrifices must be made." - Jericho Swain
fields.name: Noxian Fervor

fields.description: Enemies with 4 or less Power cannot damage me.
fields.description_raw: Enemies with 4 or less Power cannot damage me.
fields.flavor_text: "There's no stopping a warbeast once it's in motion--best just to get out of the way." - Basilisk Rider
fields.name: Armored Tuskrider

fields.description: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: The hazards of using black powder are a small price to pay for tactical victory.
fields.name: Black Powder Grenade

fields.description: Deal 2 to an enemy and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 2 to an enemy and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Try to die with dignity." - Swain
fields.name: Death's Hand

fields.flavor_text: "A siege is easy, if you've the tools. The 'breakers bring 'em out, and the ballistae bring 'em down." - Siege Engineer
fields.name: Iron Ballista

fields.flavor_text: It's true what they say--pets look like their owners.
fields.name: Loyal Badgerbear

fields.flavor_text: A ranger recruit spends months in the forest with their companions, learning to predict their stag's every move. They must be patient, but once the two have bonded, nothing can come between them.
fields.name: Greathorn Companion

fields.flavor_text: "I swore an oath to protect this forest, and all who seek shelter within it."
fields.name: Greenfang Warden

fields.description: When I'm summoned, summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon Valor.
fields.flavor_text: "She's always been a fearless ranger-knight, our Quinn--and with Valor by her side and in the skies, the two are unstoppable." - Genevieve Elmheart, ranger-knight
fields.name: Quinn

fields.description:
Summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Quinn</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Summon Valor.
Create a Quinn in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder
fields.name: Quinn's Blinding Assault

fields.flavor_text: Those who meet him swear they see a glimmer of something more in those sharp eyes, a shrewd intelligence that far surpasses any ordinary bird of prey.
fields.name: Valor

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link> <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Summon Valor Challenging the Strongest enemy.
fields.flavor_text: "I'll follow your lead, Valor!"
fields.name: Quinn

fields.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Loyal Badgerbear</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Last Breath: Summon a Loyal Badgerbear.
fields.flavor_text: Betrand got his start in the Bandle Scouts. He got all the badges except for 'Cheerful Demeanor'."
fields.name: Grizzled Ranger

fields.description: Grant an ally "I can't take damage or die".
fields.description_raw: Grant an ally "I can't take damage or die".
fields.flavor_text: Ignoring the pain of her wounded leg, the ranger stood once more, sword aloft. It was not just her own resolve that kept her standing, but the resolve of Demacia itself.
fields.name: Unyielding Spirit

fields.description: Summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Valor</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Summon Valor.
fields.flavor_text: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder
fields.name: Blinding Assault

fields.description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
fields.flavor_text: To see the rangers of Demacia in battle is inspiring. They fight as one--human and animal, side by side, fiercely determined and utterly inseparable.
fields.name: Genevieve Elmheart

fields.description: Give all allies <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Give all allies Tough this round.
fields.flavor_text: "When the enemy draws near, do not let fear into your hearts, for the trees themselves protect us." - Greenfang Warden
fields.name: Ranger's Resolve

fields.description: Pick an enemy. 2 allies <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> it.
fields.description_raw: Pick an enemy. 2 allies strike it.
fields.flavor_text: "With me, as one!" - Greenfang Warden
fields.name: Concerted Strike

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
Heal all allies 3.
fields.description_raw:
Toss 3.
Heal all allies 3.
fields.flavor_text: "These Isles will be cleansed." - Maokai
fields.name: Sap Magic

fields.description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, Toss 3.
fields.flavor_text: "The great treant has continued showing... creatures. This one... to spread life as she wanders... remarkable such... here. These are Blessed Isles indeed!" - Recovered journal
fields.name: Deadbloom Wanderer

fields.description: Each round, the first time you play another ally, <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2 and summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Each round, the first time you play another ally, Toss 2 and summon a Sapling.
fields.level_up_description: Your units have died or your cards have been <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Tossed</style></link> 25 times.<style=Variable></style>
fields.level_up_description_raw: Your units have died or your cards have been Tossed 25 times.
fields.flavor_text: These cursed lands would not break Maokai. The treant's commitment ran too deep, and his fury burned too bright, for anything to stand in his way.
fields.name: Maokai

fields.flavor_text: "Life here… so effortless. Verdant forests... to sprout overnight… quite exquisite. What a treasure this land is. Must preserve… generations." - Recovered journal
fields.name: Sapling

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 3.
Heal all allies 3.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Maokai</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Toss 3.
Heal all allies 3.
Create a Maokai in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "These Isles will be cleansed." - Maokai
fields.name: Maokai's Sap Magic

fields.description:
When I Level Up, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> the enemy deck, leaving 4 non-champions.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
When I Level Up, Obliterate the enemy deck, leaving 4 non-champions.
Round Start: Summon a Sapling.
fields.flavor_text: He would destroy the blight within these isles, and restore its long-lost life.
fields.name: Maokai

fields.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 2 and heal your Nexus 2.
fields.description_raw: Last Breath: Toss 2 and heal your Nexus 2.
fields.flavor_text: "...remarkable species… same creature I found as a child... not a day older! I wonder… next town. Perhaps these wonderful fellows will live forever!" - Recovered journal
fields.name: Thorny Toad

fields.description:
Sea Monster allies have <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>. 
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
<style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw:
Sea Monster allies have Fearsome. 
Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: They realized the danger too late. The titanic beast opened its gaping maw and surged toward them. The hunters could only wait for death as the endless teeth slowly crunched through their ship.
fields.name: Terror of the Tides

fields.description: When another ally dies, <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: When another ally dies, Drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Bumped into Niven this... the new ferryman! He rowed us... to... He can certainly hold a tune! Before... must invite him to supper soon." - Recovered journal
fields.name: Neverglade Collector

fields.description: When you summon a follower, kill it to summon an <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Overgrown Snapvine</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When you summon a follower, kill it to summon an Overgrown Snapvine.
fields.flavor_text:
"Today... another remarkable... surfaced around... children quite scared. But... posed no threat. Nuzzled... quite a trusting creature. Must forage them more berries!"
- Recovered journal
fields.name: Overgrown Snapvine

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Saplings</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Play: Kill an ally to summon 2 Saplings.
fields.flavor_text: "Every heart is a garden where roots may take hold!"
fields.name: Blighted Caretaker

fields.description: The first time an ally dies, grant me +2|+2.
fields.description_raw: The first time an ally dies, grant me +2|+2.
fields.flavor_text: The creatures of the Shadow Isles shed sentimentality long ago. They all must eat.
fields.name: Barkbeast

fields.description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sapling</style></link> at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Summon a Sapling at the next Round Start.
fields.flavor_text: "Wheeeeeeee!" - Sapling
fields.name: Sapling Toss

fields.description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.secondSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Resonating Strike</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw:
Give an ally Challenger this round.
Create a Fleeting Resonating Strike in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Master yourself..." - Lee Sin
fields.name: Sonic Wave

fields.description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "...master the enemy." - Lee Sin
fields.name: Resonating Strike

fields.description: When I'm <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link>, transform me into <link=card.cardRef><style=AssociatedCard>Concussive Palm</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm Recalled, transform me into Concussive Palm.
fields.flavor_text: "A student must move with grace, for the Dragon's breath created the wind and waves which brought motion to our world." - Teachings of the Dragon
fields.name: Tail of the Dragon

fields.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Dragon's Protection</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create a Dragon's Protection in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "A student must act with compassion, for the Dragon nurtured the First Lands, and graced them with warmth and life." - Teachings of the Dragon
fields.name: Scales of the Dragon

fields.description: Grant an ally +0|+3.
fields.description_raw: Grant an ally +0|+3.
fields.flavor_text: "The Dragon will keep you safe." - Scales of the Dragon
fields.name: Dragon's Protection

fields.description:
When you cast a spell, give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
If you cast another, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw:
When you cast a spell, give me Challenger this round.
If you cast another, give me Barrier this round.
fields.flavor_text: "The Dragon aids the worthy. To the weary, it gives vigor. To the sick, comfort. To the lost, light. To the shaken, balance..."
fields.name: Lee Sin

fields.description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.secondSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Resonating Strike</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lee Sin</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Give an ally Challenger this round.
Create a Fleeting Resonating Strike in hand.
Create a Lee Sin in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Master yourself..." - Lee Sin
fields.name: Lee Sin's Sonic Wave

fields.description:
When you cast a spell, give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
If you cast another, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
I <link=card.attackSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Dragon's Rage</style></link> enemies that I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
When you cast a spell, give me Challenger this round.
If you cast another, give me Barrier this round.
I Dragon's Rage enemies that I Challenge.
fields.flavor_text: "...But for the tyrant, the Dragon breathes fire."
fields.name: Lee Sin

fields.description:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>striking</style></link> both.
If the enemy survives, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> it.
fields.description_raw:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, striking both.
If the enemy survives, Recall it.
fields.flavor_text: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin
fields.name: Dragon's Rage

fields.flavor_text: "A student must strive with all their might, for the Dragon pulled the earth from beneath the waves, and gave us a land to call home." - Teachings of the Dragon
fields.name: Horns of the Dragon

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dragonling</style></link> if you cast 2+ spells last round<style=Variable></style>.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Summon a Dragonling if you cast 2+ spells last round.
fields.flavor_text:
"A student must think with clarity, for the Dragon draws the sun across our skies, and reveals the world around us."
- Teachings of the Dragon
fields.name: Eye of the Dragon

fields.description: Summon me from hand once you've played 2 spells this round.
fields.description_raw: Summon me from hand once you've played 2 spells this round.
fields.flavor_text: "A student must listen with focus, for the Dragon roared the first sounds, and blessed our young spirits with the gift of magic." - Teachings of the Dragon
fields.name: Claws of the Dragon

fields.flavor_text: "The spirit gives to those who listen." - Eye of the Dragon
fields.name: Dragonling

fields.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy to summon a <link=card.cardRef><style=AssociatedCard>Tail of the Dragon</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Stun an enemy to summon a Tail of the Dragon.
fields.flavor_text: "You did not see me leave, nor will you see me return." - Tail of the Dragon
fields.name: Concussive Palm

fields.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.secondSpell><style=AssociatedCard>Return</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Recall an ally to create a Fleeting Return in hand.
fields.flavor_text: The first Noxians to set foot on the Ionian beaches found a weak and unprepared enemy. Countless were slaughtered, but a handful managed to make their way to safety...
fields.name: Retreat

fields.description:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>striking</style></link> both.
If the enemy survives, <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> it.
fields.description_raw:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, striking both.
If the enemy survives, Recall it.
fields.flavor_text: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin
fields.name: Dragon's Rage

fields.description: Summon an ally that costs 3 or less from hand.
fields.description_raw: Summon an ally that costs 3 or less from hand.
fields.flavor_text: ...and how they rallied. The survivors soon gathered their forces, found their center, and showed the invaders the resilient spirit of the First Lands.
fields.name: Return

fields.description:
Costs 2 less if you cast 2+ spells last round.
Draw 2 other spells.
fields.description_raw:
Costs 2 less if you cast 2+ spells last round.
Draw 2 other spells.
fields.flavor_text: Meditation is a journey with no destination--a path that can only be followed by getting lost along the way.
fields.name: Deep Meditation

fields.description: Your opponent discards the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> follower from hand.
fields.description_raw: Your opponent discards the Weakest follower from hand.
fields.flavor_text: "The frail have no place in this world. Each day brings them new torment, another turn of the vise. I do not deal in death, I deal in mercy." - Arrel the Tracker
fields.name: Hunt the Weak

fields.description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy. If it has <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, deal excess damage to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: An ally strikes an enemy. If it has Overwhelm, deal excess damage to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Oooh the wildman's looking EXTRA savage today! Stay clear of those claws, folks!" - Arena Battlecaster
fields.name: Wild Claws

fields.description: When you gain the attack token, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When you gain the attack token, Reforge.
fields.level_up_description: I see <link=card.blade><style=AssociatedCard>Blade of the Exile</style></link> in your hand.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I see Blade of the Exile in your hand.
fields.flavor_text: "I will not run from what I was. I made a promise to mend what I have broken..."
fields.name: Riven

fields.description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
<style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Give an ally Overwhelm this round.
fields.flavor_text: "A warrior must know the weight of their weapon, burdened heavy with guilt." - Riven
fields.name: Heavy Blade Fragment

fields.description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round. <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Riven</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round. Reforge.
Create a Riven in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "To know your enemy, first know their weapon. It will tell you how they move, how they think, when they'll strike. It is the purest expression of its wielder." - Arrel the Tracker
fields.name: Riven's Weapon Hilt

fields.description: Grant an ally +2|+0, <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Grant an ally +2|+0, Overwhelm, and Quick Attack.
fields.flavor_text: "But a warrior is more than their weapon alone. They must know power, but also consequence, forgiveness, and redemption." -  Riven
fields.name: Blade of the Exile

fields.description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
<style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Give an ally Quick Attack this round.
fields.flavor_text: "A warrior must know the sharpness of their blade, an edge that cuts both friends and foes." - Riven
fields.name: Keen Blade Fragment

fields.description:
When you gain the attack token, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
When my Power is increased for the first time each round, increase it by twice as much.
fields.description_raw:
When you gain the attack token, Reforge.
When my Power is increased for the first time each round, increase it by twice as much.
fields.flavor_text: "...and I will not run from those who would break me."
fields.name: Riven

fields.description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
<style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "A warrior must know their weapon's history... every bloody piece." - Riven
fields.name: Glinting Blade Fragment

fields.description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. Reforge.
fields.flavor_text: "To know your enemy, first know their weapon. It will tell you how they move, how they think, when they'll strike. It is the purest expression of its wielder." - Arrel the Tracker
fields.name: Weapon Hilt

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If you cast a spell on me this round, I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemy.
fields.description_raw: Round End: If you cast a spell on me this round, I strike the Weakest enemy.
fields.flavor_text:
"Hide, we will find you. 
Breathe, we will hear you.
Run, we will kill you."
fields.name: Arrel the Tracker

fields.description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
If you have a <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Darius</style></link>, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
Stun an enemy.
If you have a Darius, Rally.
fields.flavor_text: "I'll handle this myself." - Darius
fields.name: Apprehend

fields.flavor_text: "There is nothing like hunting another soldier. To track them, you must think and feel as they do. To catch them, you must fear them as they fear you. It is a bond that few will know, but one I savor above all others."
fields.name: Wrathful Rider

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
fields.description_raw: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
fields.flavor_text: The basilisk trainers withhold live food from the beasts in the days leading up to battle. By the time the creatures are unleashed, they do not distinguish friend from foe, and are utterly indomitable.
fields.name: Basilisk Bloodseeker

fields.description: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
fields.flavor_text: "It's not the sharpness of the claws you've got to look out for, it's the appetite of the beast that's grown 'em." - Basilisk trainer
fields.name: Gouge

fields.description:
Allies can't drop below 1 health this round.
When discarded, your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> ally can't drop below 1 health this round.
fields.description_raw:
Allies can't drop below 1 health this round.
When discarded, your Strongest ally can't drop below 1 health this round.
fields.flavor_text: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker
fields.name: Survival Skills

fields.description: Give an ally +3|+2 this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +3|+2 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Yeah, I'll mend your weapons, and tend to the mounts, and cook your bloody food. What else am I good for, eh?" - Erath, Blade Squire
fields.name: Sharpened Resolve

fields.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Last Breath: Reforge.
fields.flavor_text: "Like the huntresses said--a hundred days and nights. A hundred blisters on these feet, a hundred bugs in my breakfast, a hundred 'blade'-this and 'vengeance' that. And well more than a hundred brow-beatings from those three, I'll tell you..."
fields.name: Blade Squire

fields.description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Reforge><style=Vocab>Reforge</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, Reforge.
fields.flavor_text: "Most weapons are crude tools, no better than the hands that wield them. But a weapon infused with runic magic is so much more than mere steel."
fields.name: Runeweaver

fields.description: When I'm summoned, give me <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, give me Quick Attack this round.
fields.flavor_text: "There you are. We KNEW you wouldn't come without a fight! Or so we hoped."
fields.name: Brutal Hunter

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sleep with the Fishes</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Create a Sleep with the Fishes in hand.
fields.flavor_text: Years in the boxing ring taught Jack valuable lessons. He learned that if his opponent can bleed, they can fear. He learned the power of a silent stare. He learned the power of uncontrolled violence.
fields.name: Jack, the Winner

fields.description: An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
fields.description_raw: An ally Captures another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
fields.flavor_text: "Step inside, friend, and all that you desire shall be yours in perpetuity." - Tahm Kench
fields.name: Bayou Brunch

fields.description: Place a unit or landmark into its deck.
fields.description_raw: Place a unit or landmark into its deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Now, I delivered to you exactly what you wanted, friend. I never said it would last forever." - Tahm Kench
fields.name: Sunk Cost

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>An Acquired Taste</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Create a An Acquired Taste in hand.
fields.level_up_description: I've <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captured</style></link> 3+ units<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> my <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captured</style></link> enemies and release my allies.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I've Captured 3+ units. When I level up, Obliterate my Captured enemies and release my allies.
fields.flavor_text: "My friend, I know that expression. I can see you feelin' like the cards you're holdin' ain't the ones you deserve. You got a desire for the finer things, don'tcha? Perhaps you'll allow me to satisfy your hunger, let you savor all that you ever desired. All I need is your name, scratched on my paper... and you, my friend, will be satisfied for life."
fields.name: Tahm Kench

fields.description: <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tahm Kench</style></link> swallows an enemy unit. It <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> him, then he <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> it.
fields.description_raw: Tahm Kench swallows an enemy unit. It strikes him, then he Captures it.
fields.flavor_text: "You had a chance to walk away. Instead, you're the fool who let me in..." - Tahm Kench
fields.name: An Acquired Taste

fields.description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>An Acquired Taste</style></link> in hand.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> my <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captured</style></link> enemies and release my allies.
fields.description_raw:
Round Start: Create a An Acquired Taste in hand.
Attack: Obliterate my Captured enemies and release my allies.
fields.flavor_text: "You struck a deal, my friend, and though you will undoubtedly bask in its benefits, remember... there will be a time when I get my fill, too."
fields.name: Tahm Kench

fields.description:
An ally <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Captures</style></link> another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tahm Kench</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
An ally Captures another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
Create a Tahm Kench in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Step inside, friend, and all that you desire shall be yours in perpetuity." - Tahm Kench
fields.name: Tahm Kench's Bayou Brunch

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 2 to me.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Deal 2 to me.
fields.flavor_text: "Ah, people are stupid! Give them cold drink and warm chair, and they tell all kinds of secrets to friendly faces. And who has friendlier face than young Leonard, hmm?" - Fortune Croaker
fields.name: Lounging Lizard

fields.description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Summon another at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
Summon a Powder Monkey.
Plunder: Summon another at the next Round Start.
fields.flavor_text: "Aw... d'ye think they're cute? WELL, THEY'RE NOT. They get into everything, they're messier than a seasick courier, an' THEY WON'T BLOODY SHUT UP. NO MONKEYS ON THE SHIP. THAT'S THE END OF IT." - Petty Officer
fields.name: Monkey Business

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 3 to me.
fields.description_raw: Play: Deal 3 to me.
fields.flavor_text: "Sure, Pablo might be in a bit of a 'dry patch'--heh--and, yeah, he's taken his fair share of punches... but ya know what? Ain't nobody else around here getting octokills, pal." - Wise Fry
fields.name: Boxtopus

fields.description: Deal 2 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 2 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "Daub 'em with your blood, and set the sharks loose." - Jack, the Winner
fields.name: Sleep with the Fishes

fields.description:
Deal 1 to a unit.
Then summon <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Kegs</style></link> equal to the amount of damage dealt.
fields.description_raw:
Deal 1 to a unit.
Then summon Powder Kegs equal to the amount of damage dealt.
fields.flavor_text: "Young Gerent raised the alarm right afore the first one blew. Our hull rocked, the jib caught flame, but the Jilldaw held. Thought that was that, but as I followed Gerent's gaze out to sea, I saw me four more rowboats comin' our way, all loaded with powder." - Jilldaw survivor
fields.name: Boomship

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 1. If you are <link=keyword.Deep><sprite name=Deep><style=Keyword>Deep</style></link>, destroy me to summon a random Sea Monster. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Toss 1. If you are Deep, destroy me to summon a random Sea Monster.
fields.flavor_text: Every day, locals wander through the Slaughter Docks to see the horrors Bilgewater's hunters have hauled up from the depths. The beasts are usually dead. Usually.
fields.name: The Slaughter Docks

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 2 to me.
fields.description_raw: Play: Deal 2 to me.
fields.flavor_text: "RING THE BELL, WILL YA?! AH'LL SHOW THAT POINTY FART WHY AH'VE GOT ALL MA NICKNAMES, AYE. 'EIGHT PUNCH PABLO', 'THE CRACKIN' KRAKEN', 'THE TENTACLED TERROR'! YOUR WEE STINGER'S GONNA BE CRYING FOR YA MAMMIE BY THE TIME AH'M DONE WI' YA!" - Boxtopus
fields.name: Crusty Codger

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to all other allies and grant me +1|+0 for each of them.
fields.description_raw: Play: Deal 1 to all other allies and grant me +1|+0 for each of them.
fields.flavor_text: The rise to power is often a violent business... but it's not normally this freakin' sloppy.
fields.name: Wise Fry

fields.description:
Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
When I'm summoned, create in hand a 1 cost spell from your regions.
fields.description_raw:
Reduce my cost by 1 for each spell you've cast this game.
When I'm summoned, create in hand a 1 cost spell from your regions.
fields.flavor_text: "Stand stwait, noobie! Your mishun is to infiltrate behind emenee lines, plant as many bubbels as you can, an' tell us evewythin' you SEE! E-VE-WEE-THIN'. DO YOU UNNASTAN'?!" - Admiwal Shelly, Shellshocker
fields.name: Wiggly Burblefish

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Deal 1 to me and an ally to draw 1.
fields.description_raw: Play: Deal 1 to me and an ally to draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: "Ol' Babs has had a few mishaps. Killed a few locals in her time, but I s'pose it helps lend her an air of authenticity." - Lounging Lizard
fields.name: Fortune Croaker

fields.description: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Powder Monkey</style></link> and give a random enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round for each time you've activated <link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Summon a Powder Monkey and give a random enemy Vulnerable this round for each time you've activated Plunder this game.
fields.flavor_text: "Oh, those little sootballs aren't so bad. Here's a tip for you--they like fireworks. So, you take out an enemy's gunpowder stores, and the monkeys, well, they'll do the rest." - Miss Fortune
fields.name: Powder Pandemonium

fields.description: Deal 2 to an ally to grant 2 enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Deal 2 to an ally to grant 2 enemies Vulnerable.
fields.flavor_text: "You gonna tell me where you got those 'extra kegs', Slim? Huh? Otherwise, we could play a lil' tug-of-war between your tongue and Jimbo's arm. And buddy... I ain't bettin' on you." - Wise Fry
fields.name: Shakedown

fields.description: When an ally is summoned, give it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: When an ally is summoned, give it +1|+0 and Challenger this round.
fields.flavor_text: Tianna looked out over the assembly, assessing the gathered ranks. The only sound in the square was her banner snapping in the breeze. She gave a curt nod of approval, then lifted the banner with a shout. "Who among you is ready to fight for Demacia?" The resounding cry from all those assembled shook the very mountains.
fields.name: The Grand Plaza

fields.description: Draw a landmark or destroy a landmark.
fields.description_raw: Draw a landmark or destroy a landmark.
fields.flavor_text: Targon is a capricious place, where the unbreakable is broken, and the broken made whole.
fields.name: Divergent Paths

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create in hand a random level 2 champion that's not in your hand, deck, or play.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Create in hand a random level 2 champion that's not in your hand, deck, or play.
fields.flavor_text: Heroes come to the bridge, called to it by something from the unknown. They brave its bitter cold and crumbling deck to see what lies beyond--victory, or death.
fields.name: The Howling Abyss

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you can, kill your most expensive ally to summon an ally from your deck that costs 1 more.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: If you can, kill your most expensive ally to summon an ally from your deck that costs 1 more.
fields.flavor_text: What could better lure a soul to this wretched place than the promise of eternal life, and endless riches?
fields.name: Vaults of Helia

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Heal damaged allies 1. Then, once I've seen you heal 22+ damage from allies, win the game. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Round End: Heal damaged allies 1. Then, once I've seen you heal 22+ damage from allies, win the game.
fields.flavor_text:
"Up to the sacred falling flow,
Deep into pools, the healing springs
Shining light, water all aglow,
Listen to how the river sings,
High on the crystal mountain."
- Ottrani verse
fields.name: Star Spring

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sanctuary</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Create a Sanctuary in hand.
fields.flavor_text: The Ionian mountains hide a handful of sanctuaries for those looking to center themselves and gather their spirits.
fields.name: Monastery of Hirana

fields.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally.
fields.description_raw: Recall an ally.
fields.flavor_text: "The monastery welcomes all who seek refuge." - Elder Souma
fields.name: Sanctuary

fields.description: Kill a damaged unit or destroy a landmark.
fields.description_raw: Kill a damaged unit or destroy a landmark.
fields.flavor_text: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker
fields.name: Scorched Earth

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> ally and the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
fields.description_raw: Round End: Your Strongest ally and the Weakest enemy strike each other.
fields.flavor_text: "Hey there, rrrrreckoner fans, are you ready for a night of scorchin' hot THRILLS in the RING OF FIRE?! Wuh-oh, looks like Tiny Trik drew the SHORT straw today. He's up against the mighty, fight-y, GRANAAAAK the Great! Get those medics ringside, it's gonna be a quick one!" - Arena Battlecaster
fields.name: Noxkraya Arena

fields.description: Destroy a landmark.
fields.description_raw: Destroy a landmark.
fields.flavor_text: Each summit gave way before them, emboldening their climb and filling their hearts with determination. They would scale Targon.
fields.name: Path of Destruction

fields.description: Draw a landmark.
fields.description_raw: Draw a landmark.
fields.flavor_text: Beyond each summit loomed yet another, but their spirits pushed them onward. They would surmount the peaks of Targon.
fields.name: Path of Discovery

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Capture</style></link> a unit or landmark.
fields.description_raw: Play: Capture a unit or landmark.
fields.flavor_text: As a child, Arrika saw firsthand the devastation Noxus could inflict as it laid waste to her home. When she enlisted in the military, she vowed never to let the Noxian flag fly over Demacian land, or leave another child orphaned.
fields.name: Captain Arrika

fields.description: <link=keyword.Capture><sprite name=Capture><style=Keyword>Capture</style></link> a unit or landmark.
fields.description_raw: Capture a unit or landmark.
fields.flavor_text: "Take back what is ours!" - Captain Arrika
fields.name: Claim

fields.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally unit or landmark to <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an enemy unit or landmark.
fields.description_raw: Recall an ally unit or landmark to Recall an enemy unit or landmark.
fields.flavor_text: "Trevvvvorrrrrr, come baaaack..." - Trevor's house
fields.name: Homecoming

fields.description: Kill an ally to kill a unit or destroy a landmark.
fields.description_raw: Kill an ally to kill a unit or destroy a landmark.
fields.flavor_text: Nothing lasts on these haunted isles. All will end.
fields.name: Crumble

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Reduce the cost of a random card in each player's hand to 0 this round.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Reduce the cost of a random card in each player's hand to 0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: Standing watch at the gate to the Celestial Realm is Targon's crystalline guardian. Things fall away in it's presence - hope, doubt, fear. Its trials strip all mortal concerns, and lays bare the essence of the climber's soul. It is on this that they are judged, for the guardian is the great arbiter.
fields.name: Targon's Peak

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Discard your hand. Create 3 random cards in hand and grant them <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Discard your hand. Create 3 random cards in hand and grant them Fleeting.
fields.flavor_text: The inventions of Professor Cecil B. Heimerdinger made him famous, but it was his animated lectures and notoriously unpredictable classroom demonstrations that earned him a lasting impression on Piltover's brightest minds.
fields.name: The University of Piltover

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> ALL landmarks or deal 2 to ALL other units.
fields.description_raw: Play: Obliterate ALL landmarks or deal 2 to ALL other units.
fields.flavor_text: "There was no time to gather our things or warn the others. We could only run for the forest and watch as it leveled our homes." - Avarosan Hearthguard
fields.name: It That Stares

fields.description: Deal 2 to ALL other units.
fields.description_raw: Deal 2 to ALL other units.
fields.flavor_text: The people shall perish.
fields.name: Extinguishing Ray

fields.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> ALL landmarks.
fields.description_raw: Obliterate ALL landmarks.
fields.flavor_text: The earth shall break.
fields.name: Destructive Ray

fields.description: I cost 2 less if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial.
fields.description_raw: I cost 2 less if you Behold a Celestial.
fields.flavor_text: "Adults are LAME. The only cool kids around here are Zoe and her buddies. I learn a lot from them, y'know? Not like that stupid high radiance priestess lady. I mean UGHHHH."
fields.name: Starry Scamp

fields.description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Invoke.
fields.flavor_text: The heavens hang over you, a tapestry of black lit with twinkling stars. You are small and dim against its vastness. Where will you turn your gaze first?
fields.name: Behold the Infinite

fields.description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
fields.flavor_text:
"As leaves unfurl from barren branches, the Lady of Spring sends her messenger to inform the Lord of Winter of the changing season. The messenger's bark startles the stars into new places in the sky, while his loyal heart warms the land." 
- Song of the Seasons
fields.name: The Messenger

fields.flavor_text:
"During Targon's first equinox, the people of the mountain attempted their first truce. But as their leaders laid their weapons down, one suddenly cried out in pain! Soldiers drew their spears, and all thoughts of peace were lost. Little did they know the true betrayer was a serpent hidden beneath their feet, forevermore a sign of violent times." 
- Targonian folk tale
fields.name: The Serpent

fields.description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
The first time I would die, fully heal me instead.
fields.description_raw:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. 
The first time I would die, fully heal me instead.
fields.flavor_text: "For ages, the Immortal Fire flew alone, till one day she saw a young bird with fiery golden wings like hers. She rejoiced, for she had never known another like herself. But as years passed, the young bird grew old and flickered out. The Immortal Fire grieved, for she had never known death. And so she wept sparks and sighed herself ablaze, till she emerged, renewed in body but burdened with knowledge." - Shuriman folk tale
fields.name: The Immortal Fire

fields.description: Reduce the cost of a card in hand by 1.
fields.description_raw: Reduce the cost of a card in hand by 1.
fields.flavor_text: "Each full moon bathes our world in Her silver glow, revealing paths not yet trod, stories not yet told." - Lunari Priestess
fields.name: Moonsilver

fields.description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other allies +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. 
Attack: Give other allies +2|+2 and Overwhelm this round.
fields.flavor_text: Legends speak of a Scourge that lurks at the furthest reaches of the Celestial Realm. Here, it awaits the time-at-the-end-of-time, when it will wield the power of the stars to shatter the foundations of the world.
fields.name: The Scourge

fields.description: When I'm summoned, summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>The Silver Sister</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon The Silver Sister.
fields.flavor_text:
"From the heavens
Two beings came:
One was robed in silver's glow,
The other clad in golden flame..."
- Hymn of the Hours
fields.name: The Golden Sister

fields.description: Grant an ally +0|+2 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Grant an ally +0|+2 and SpellShield.
fields.flavor_text: "Bathe in Her gentle glow and receive Her blessing." - Lunari Priestess
fields.name: Moonglow

fields.description: Draw a champion. Reduce its cost by 1 and grant it +2|+2.
fields.description_raw: Draw a champion. Reduce its cost by 1 and grant it +2|+2.
fields.flavor_text: "The vastness of the night sky represents the gulf between humanity below and the divine above. But there are some mortals who strive to achieve a higher purpose, and if the mountain deems them worthy, they may rise to become one with the stars themselves." - Mountain Scryer
fields.name: Written in Stars

fields.description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> 2 enemy units or landmarks.
fields.description_raw: If you Behold a Celestial card, Obliterate 2 enemy units or landmarks.
fields.flavor_text: Dying stars create explosions so bright and powerful that even other stars, still lively and burning, are easily outshone.
fields.name: Supernova

fields.description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, grant allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
