fields.description_raw: If you Behold a Celestial card, grant allies everywhere +2|+2.
fields.flavor_text: "Look to the night sky. Take in the stars' brilliance, and let them suffuse you with their healing light." - Soraka
fields.name: Cosmic Inspiration

fields.description: Fill your hand with random <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> Celestial cards. Refill your mana to full.
fields.description_raw: Fill your hand with random Fleeting Celestial cards. Refill your mana to full.
fields.flavor_text: "They say that some constellations were once mortals whose exceptional exploits earned them a place amongst the stars." - Mountain Scryer
fields.name: Living Legends

fields.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game.
fields.flavor_text: "To safeguard the spaces between land and sky, a horned guardian was placed in the stars over the mountains. Sturdy and swift, it traverses the night sky in search of intruders, whom it greets with an impact that sends shudders through earth and sky alike." - The Minotaur Histories
fields.name: The Destroyer

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Play: Invoke.
fields.flavor_text: "We were always one and the same--we were separated only by the mountain, the journey, and a sea of stars."
fields.name: The Traveler

fields.description: Deal 4 to an enemy and 1 to another.
fields.description_raw: Deal 4 to an enemy and 1 to another.
fields.flavor_text: "Forging stars is a messy business, I'm afraid. You never know where those little rocks will land. I am so terribly, terribly sorry if they happen to fall on you. And crush you. Oh so violently." - Aurelion Sol
fields.name: Meteor Shower

fields.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy unit or landmark.
fields.description_raw: Obliterate an enemy unit or landmark.
fields.flavor_text: "I will drive the stars themselves through this insufferable place. It will be GLORIOUS." - Aurelion Sol
fields.name: Falling Comet

fields.description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. <style=Variable></style>
I am a Dragon.
fields.description_raw:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. 
I am a Dragon.
fields.flavor_text: "Oh yes, my favorite constellation. I like to think it will be the first to rain down upon this forsaken mountain." - Aurelion Sol
fields.name: The Great Beyond

fields.description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> enemies with 3 or less Power.
fields.description_raw: If you Behold a Celestial card, Obliterate enemies with 3 or less Power.
fields.flavor_text: In the dark beginning, a spark of creation rippled through the universe. What sound it made, what light it shone, we will never know, for there were not yet then words to describe, nor yet ears or eyes to perceive it.
fields.name: Cosmic Rays

fields.description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a follower.
fields.description_raw: Silence a follower.
fields.flavor_text: In the space between the stars, there is absolute silence.
fields.name: Equinox

fields.flavor_text: The strongest star in the night's sky, they say, is that of the warrior. An ancient being, thought immortal, who descends from the stars to prove his worth in combat. Never has he been beaten, but all stories must end, and all stars must die.
fields.name: The Warrior

fields.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> 2 enemies.
fields.description_raw: Stun 2 enemies.
fields.flavor_text: "Even the moon's glow can be blinding." - Diana
fields.name: Crescent Strike

fields.flavor_text: "So, there I was going 'bout my day, when in struts this fella packed to the gills with gold. Easy mark, eh? I sidle over, amp up the charm, and amp up the price. It's only when I put my coins away I realize the little scamp's paid me with my OWN money! The Trickster was shining bright that night, I tell ya." - Yordle Grifter
fields.name: The Trickster

fields.flavor_text:
"...Though both were formed of cosmic light,
They fought, for they were too alike.
And so these two split night from day,
So each could always have their way..."
- Hymn of the Hours
fields.name: The Silver Sister

fields.flavor_text: "The gold of the sun adorns his horns, and its fire lights his heart. Let the thunder of our shields ring out like the thunder of his hooves across the horizon!" - Solari battle prayer
fields.name: The Charger

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
fields.description_raw: Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
fields.flavor_text:
"Mother Moon, show me the way,
Tear the sky open,
Show me beyond."
- Lunari Prayer
fields.name: The Fangs

fields.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Duskpetal Dust</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create a Duskpetal Dust in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Duskpetals bloom at night, and then only under a full moon. A proud symbol of the Lunari, we have used their dust for centuries, as only we know how to harvest them safely."
fields.name: Lunari Duskbringer

fields.description: The next unit with <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> you play this round costs 1 less.
fields.description_raw: The next unit with Nightfall you play this round costs 1 less.
fields.flavor_text: The fragrance of the duskpetal is like none other. Sweet and strange, but fleeting, it is delicate as moonlight itself.
fields.name: Duskpetal Dust

fields.description:
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, create the <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phased</style></link> Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.<style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw:
Nightfall: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, create the Phased Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.
fields.flavor_text: "With every conflict, we show the Solari we are worthy of respect. We have taught them that the moon's light is equal to their sun's, we have taught them not to disregard that which they did not know. And of the lessons they are yet to learn..." - Lunari wanespeaker
fields.name: Aphelios

fields.description: Summon a two cost follower from your deck. If it has <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>, activate it. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Calibrum><style=AssociatedCard>Calibrum</style></link> or <link=card.Severum><style=AssociatedCard>Severum</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Summon a two cost follower from your deck. If it has Nightfall, activate it. Phase Calibrum or Severum.
fields.flavor_text: "A crescent path opens before us." - Alune
fields.name: Crescendum

fields.description: Give an ally +2|+1 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Crescendum><style=AssociatedCard>Crescendum</style></link> or <link=card.Calibrum><style=AssociatedCard>Calibrum</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +2|+1 and Overwhelm this round. Phase Crescendum or Calibrum.
fields.flavor_text: "The moon grows in flame." - Alune
fields.name: Infernum

fields.description:
Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aphelios</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Create an Aphelios in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Reach out, Aphelios..." - Alune
fields.name: Aphelios' Gifts From Beyond

fields.description: Give an ally +1|+2 and <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Gravitum><style=AssociatedCard>Gravitum</style></link> or <link=card.Infernum><style=AssociatedCard>Infernum</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +1|+2 and Lifesteal this round. Phase Gravitum or Infernum.
fields.flavor_text: "From darkness, light." - Alune
fields.name: Severum

fields.description: Deal 3 to a follower. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Severum><style=AssociatedCard>Severum</style></link> or <link=card.Gravitum><style=AssociatedCard>Gravitum</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Deal 3 to a follower. Phase Severum or Gravitum.
fields.flavor_text: "Move sure as the moon, Brother." - Alune
fields.name: Calibrum

fields.description:
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create the <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phased</style></link> Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.<style=Variable></style>
Your Moon Weapons cost 1 less.
fields.description_raw:
Nightfall: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards or Round Start: Create the Phased Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.
Your Moon Weapons cost 1 less.
fields.flavor_text: "...it is Aphelios and Alune who will best teach them.." - Lunari wanespeaker
fields.name: Aphelios

fields.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. If it's a follower, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it again at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>. <link=vocab.Phase><style=Vocab>Phase</style></link> <link=card.Infernum><style=AssociatedCard>Infernum</style></link> or <link=card.Crescendum><style=AssociatedCard>Crescendum</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start. Phase Infernum or Crescendum.
fields.flavor_text: "Doubt weighs heavy on their minds." - Alune
fields.name: Gravitum

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> enemies with 2 or less Power.
fields.description_raw: Play: Stun enemies with 2 or less Power.
fields.flavor_text: Through the crystalline silence of the mountainside came the tinkling sounds of falling ice and, far above them, what the travelers could have sworn was... laughter.
fields.name: Sneaky Zeebles

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Heal your Nexus 3. Deal damage to me equal to the amount healed.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Heal your Nexus 3. Deal damage to me equal to the amount healed.
fields.flavor_text: "Nobody knows the paths of Targon like I do, so I get stuck with some of the, uh, willful stellacorns. Good thing they've got me to look after them!"
fields.name: Broadbacked Protector

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant 2 allies +0|+4.
fields.description_raw: Play: Grant 2 allies +0|+4.
fields.flavor_text: "Listen, Osu. Do you hear that? Bells! Grandfather's back!" - Illi, Star Shepherd
fields.name: Grandfather Rumul

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick 2 enemies.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> them.
fields.description_raw:
Play: Pick 2 enemies.
Round Start: Stun them.
fields.flavor_text: Travelers who lock eyes with the creature are said to be struck by a knowledge so profound, an insight so awesome, that their minds crumble beneath its gaze.
fields.name: The Infinite Mindsplitter

fields.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Nightfall: Give me Challenger this round.
fields.flavor_text: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in silver and blue, her eyes like stars. As the moon rose and shone down on her, each of the Lunari gathered there closed their eyes in silent prayer for her safety, and in gratitude.
fields.name: Diana

fields.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> or when you activate another <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Nightfall or when you activate another Nightfall: Give me +2|+0 and Challenger this round.
fields.flavor_text: Diana raced down the mountain, sword drawn and coated with duskpetal dust. She knew Leona would find her--she was counting on it. Her heart fluttered with anxious anticipation, and she breathed deeply to still it. This time upon their meeting, she would have the upper hand; this time, she would face her old friend head-on.
fields.name: Diana

fields.description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Draw 1.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Diana</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
Nightfall: Draw 1.
Create a Diana in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Under cover of night, watched over by a pale moon." - Diana
fields.name: Diana's Pale Cascade

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Play: Grant an ally Overwhelm.
fields.flavor_text: Those seeking to scale Targon would do well to befriend the local fauna. No creature is more familiar with Targon's perilous gauntlet, and none can travel more swiftly across its icy terrain.
fields.name: Crystal Ibex

fields.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Strike: Create a Gem in hand.
fields.flavor_text: The goats of Mount Targon are even more dangerous than their ordinary cousins, for the gems that make up their horns embed painful shards upon impact.
fields.name: Mountain Goat

fields.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Heal me and my supported ally 4.
fields.description_raw: Support: Heal me and my supported ally 4.
fields.flavor_text: "Healing is, by its very essence, selfless. You need not draw the power from them; they give it willingly. Show them compassion, and you will see how they shine."
fields.name: Soraka

fields.description:
The first time you heal a damaged ally each round, draw 1.
<link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Fully heal me and my supported ally.
fields.description_raw:
The first time you heal a damaged ally each round, draw 1.
Support: Fully heal me and my supported ally.
fields.flavor_text: "What you give of yourself to help others will be returned to you a hundredfold. This is the power of giving. Generosity is a gift that heals the giver as well, in mind, body, and spirit."
fields.name: Soraka

fields.description:
Fully heal damaged allies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Soraka</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Fully heal damaged allies.
Create a Soraka in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "For life!" - Soraka
fields.name: Soraka's Wish

fields.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create a Gem in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "They say the Protector blessed these gems. Wear them, and he shall be with you in spirit."
fields.name: Gift Giver

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Play: Invoke.
fields.flavor_text: "Look at all our friends out in the sky tonight! See that extra bright star? That's the Messenger's eye staring down at us! That dim cluster way out there? It is the Trickster hiding behind clouds! And that one over--KULUN, SHH! You cannot paw those down...!"
fields.name: Moondreamer

fields.description: When an ally with <link=keyword.Fury><sprite name=Fury><style=Keyword>Fury</style></link> kills an enemy for the first time each round, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
fields.description_raw: When an ally with Fury kills an enemy for the first time each round, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Look to the heavens, and see as I do! First the signals, for by night they shine. Then the fury, for by day all burns. You will see! We will all see!" - Herald of Dragons
fields.name: Inviolus Vox

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
fields.description_raw: Daybreak: Stun the Strongest enemy.
fields.flavor_text: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in crimson and gold, her eyes like embers. As the rising sun crowned her head in light, each Solari present lowered their eyes, not in shame, but in deference to their shining leader.
fields.name: Leona

fields.description:
Give allies +2|+2 this round. Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Leona</style></link> in your deck.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Activate all ally <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> effects at once.
fields.description_raw:
Give allies +2|+2 this round. Create a Leona in your deck.
Daybreak: Activate all ally Daybreak effects at once.
fields.flavor_text:
"She is our unflinching leader in the heavens, the blinding flash of our weapons at noon, and the unquenchable fire that burns in our hearts." 
- Solari Priestess
fields.name: Leona's Morning Light

fields.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
fields.description_raw: Stun the Strongest enemy.
fields.flavor_text: "The closer they stretch toward the heavens, the more the sun will burn them." - Leona
fields.name: Solar Flare

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> or when you activate another <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
fields.description_raw: Daybreak or when you activate another Daybreak: Stun the Strongest enemy.
fields.flavor_text: This was what Leona had prepared for. She knew she would find Diana fleeing down the mountain, retreating before the light of the sun. She breathed deeply to still her fluttering heartbeat, willing it silent with grim resolve. This time upon their meeting, she had the upper hand; this time, she would face her old friend head-on.
fields.name: Leona

fields.description: Dragon allies cost 1 less.
fields.description_raw: Dragon allies cost 1 less.
fields.flavor_text: The clouds twisted around their massive forms, and the sky itself seemed to shake with their keening wails. She knew what was to come, and yet felt not fear but the warm embrace of destiny.
fields.name: Herald of Dragons

fields.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give me and my supported ally <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link> this round. Copy the last spell you cast on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
fields.description_raw: Support: Give me and my supported ally Tough this round. Copy the last spell you cast on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
fields.level_up_description: I've seen you target or <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>support</style></link> allies 7+ times<style=Variable></style>.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I've seen you target or support allies 7+ times.
fields.flavor_text: "Taric's gentle kindness inspires all who meet him, galvanizing them to find the warmth within to bolster themselves on even the coldest of nights." - Mountain Scryer
fields.name: Taric

fields.description: Grant an ally +0|+2.
fields.description_raw: Grant an ally +0|+2.
fields.flavor_text: "Our shield is our conviction, our resolve, our trust in the light!" - Solari Shieldbearer
fields.name: Sunblessed Vigor

fields.flavor_text: "Hope is a delicate thing that flies ever higher, and should never be caught." - Lunari Priestess
fields.name: Sparklefly

fields.description: <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> a unit this round.
fields.description_raw: Silence a unit this round.
fields.flavor_text: "They will know serenity." - Soraka
fields.name: Hush

fields.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> enemies with 2 or less Power.
fields.description_raw: Stun enemies with 2 or less Power.
fields.flavor_text: "Hahahaha, lookit 'em GO!  They're just. So. Fast! Is your head spinning too?!" - Zoe
fields.name: Mischief

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. If it's a follower, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it again at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Nightfall: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start.
fields.flavor_text:
"Mother Moon, our night is set,
May we halt those who would harm us,
And teach them regret."
- Lunari Prayer
fields.name: The Cloven Way

fields.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Nightfall: Invoke.
fields.flavor_text: "Oh, stars above, journeying like many pilgrims through the night's expanse--stay with us a moment, tell us what you've seen." - The Paeans of Evening
fields.name: Lunari Priestess

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Heal an ally and your Nexus 3.
fields.description_raw: Play: Heal an ally and your Nexus 3.
fields.flavor_text: "See that star moving across the night sky? That's a grown stellacorn. While the young ones lend us their healing magic until they can be returned to the sky, grown stellacorns can wield that power on their own. It is considered very lucky to see one and know it for what it is. Luckier still to care for one." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars
fields.name: Resplendent Stellacorn

fields.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +0|+2.
fields.description_raw: Support: Grant my supported ally +0|+2.
fields.flavor_text: In traveling, you must be open to the journey, which will inevitably change you. In traveling, you take something new with you... and you leave something of your old self behind.
fields.name: Tyari the Traveler

fields.description:
Deal 15 to all enemies.
Costs 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have.
fields.description_raw:
Deal 15 to all enemies.
Costs 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have.
fields.flavor_text: "When the time comes, I think I'll make an example of Runeterra. Perhaps I'll drag its smoldering husk around with me for all eternity. Like a toy. A dead, worthless toy. I don't know. I've not really thought about it much." - Aurelion Sol
fields.name: The Skies Descend

fields.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Supercool Starchart</style></link> in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
fields.description_raw: Nexus Strike: Create a Supercool Starchart in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
fields.level_up_description: I've seen you play 10 cards with different names<style=Variable></style>.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I've seen you play 10 cards with different names.
fields.flavor_text: "Hey hiiiiiii! Whatcha doin'? Is that a CARD GAME? Can I play too? What?! I'M in YOUR game? Ha! What a silly dimension..."
fields.name: Zoe

fields.description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Paddle Star</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Zoe</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Stun an enemy. Create a Fleeting Paddle Star in hand.
Create a Zoe in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Naptime for you! One sparklefly, twoooo sparklefly, thre-- Hey, what'sthatoverthere?!" - Zoe
fields.name: Zoe's Sleepy Trouble Bubble

fields.description:
When I level up, grant your Nexus "When you summon an ally, grant its keywords to all allies."
<link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Behold the Infinite </style></link> that costs 0 in hand.
fields.description_raw:
When I level up, grant your Nexus "When you summon an ally, grant its keywords to all allies."
Nexus Strike: Create a Behold the Infinite  that costs 0 in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Ah, the vastness of space and a myriad realities stretched, squished, and squeezed out before us! Maaaaaybe we'll even see my favorite space doggy!"
fields.name: Zoe

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard a card to <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
fields.description_raw: Play: Discard a card to Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
fields.flavor_text: "This one's my favorite! I call it 'Metaphysical Identity of the Conscious Psyche'. Unless you tilt your head like this... then it kinda looks like two spoons."
fields.name: Spacey Sketcher

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
fields.description_raw:
Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
Round Start: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
fields.level_up_description: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Your allies have 25+ total Power<style=Variable></style>.
fields.level_up_description_raw: Round End: Your allies have 25+ total Power.
fields.flavor_text: "I don't care what you write about me, you middling creature! Just make sure I'm described as handsome. And magnificent. And also very, very intelligent. Can you spell that?"
fields.name: Aurelion Sol

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
Your Celestial cards cost 0.
fields.description_raw:
Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
Round Start: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
Your Celestial cards cost 0.
fields.flavor_text: Aurelion Sol is handsome. And magnificent. And also very, very inteligent.
fields.name: Aurelion Sol

fields.description:
Deal 15 to all enemies.
Costs 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Aurelion Sol</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Deal 15 to all enemies.
Costs 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have.
Create an Aurelion Sol in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "When the time comes, I think I'll make an example of Runeterra. Perhaps I'll drag its smoldering husk around with me for all eternity. Like a toy. A dead, worthless toy. I don't know. I've not really thought about it much." - Aurelion Sol
fields.name: Aurelion Sol's The Skies Descend

fields.description: Grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Grant an ally +1|+1 and SpellShield.
fields.flavor_text: "Honor the mountain." - Taric
fields.name: Bastion

fields.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Draw 1 and shuffle me into the top 3 cards of your deck.
fields.description_raw: Nexus Strike: Draw 1 and shuffle me into the top 3 cards of your deck.
fields.flavor_text:
"Mother Moon, gift me confidence,
Fill me with The Flight's conviction,
Set me on my path."
- Lunari Prayer
fields.name: The Flight

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> 2 enemy units this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: They can't block this round.
fields.description_raw:
Silence 2 enemy units this round.
Nightfall: They can't block this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Those unaccustomed to the moonlight must learn to see by it, or they will see nothing at all." - Diana
fields.name: Moonlight Affliction

fields.description: Fully heal damaged allies.
fields.description_raw: Fully heal damaged allies.
fields.flavor_text: "For life!" - Soraka
fields.name: Wish

fields.description:
Deal 6 to a unit.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Instead, <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it this round and deal 6 to it.
fields.description_raw:
Deal 6 to a unit.
Daybreak: Instead, Silence it this round and deal 6 to it.
fields.flavor_text: Few things survive a gaze as unflinching as the sun's.
fields.name: Sunburst

fields.description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 4, 5, or 6.
fields.description_raw: Daybreak: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 4, 5, or 6.
fields.flavor_text: The Solari look to the stars for guidance as much as any other Targonian, for the star dearest to their faith is the sun.
fields.name: Solari Priestess

fields.description: Heal an ally 4 and grant it +0|+4.
fields.description_raw: Heal an ally 4 and grant it +0|+4.
fields.flavor_text: "You thought you'd beaten us? Ha! We're just getting started." - Broadbacked Protector
fields.name: Astral Protection

fields.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.spell><style=AssociatedCard>Spring Gifts</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create a Spring Gifts in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Mostly, I mind the springs, but a shepherd's responsibility is first and foremost to their flock. Priorities have been known to collide."
fields.name: Spring Guardian

fields.description: Fully heal an ally.
fields.description_raw: Fully heal an ally.
fields.flavor_text: "Let the springs soothe that which ails you." - Spring Guardian
fields.name: Spring Gifts

fields.description: Pick 1 of 3 enemy spells played this game and create a copy in hand.
fields.description_raw: Pick 1 of 3 enemy spells played this game and create a copy in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Oh, that was uh-MAZING! But how much better would it be if I did it instead? 'Kaythanksbyeeee!" - Zoe
fields.name: Spell Thief

fields.description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Daybreak: Give me Lifesteal this round.
fields.flavor_text: The Sunforger held up his focus as light streamed into the room. The Solari artifact harnessed the sun's brilliant rays into a powerful enchantment for his weapon.
fields.name: Solari Sunforger

fields.description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
fields.description_raw: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
fields.flavor_text: "And these three EXTRA sparkly stars I call... 'The Celestial Jump Rope'! Or is it more of an upside down happy face?" - Zoe
fields.name: Supercool Starchart

fields.description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +4|+4 this round.
fields.description_raw: Daybreak: Give me +4|+4 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Shining guardian, your wrath burns like the noonday sun. Come forth and punish those who would trespass on this sacred place." - Sun Guardian's inscription
fields.name: Sun Guardian

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +2|+2.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create 3 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gems</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw:
Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+2.
Last Breath: Create 3 Gems in hand.
fields.flavor_text:
"Did you catch anything he said in there?"
"Not a word. Seemed nice, though."
- Emir and Haley, Mountain Sojourners
fields.name: Mentor of the Stones

fields.description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +0|+4 this round.
fields.description_raw: Daybreak: Give me +0|+4 this round.
fields.flavor_text:
"Foolish, not to come under the cover of night." The Shieldbearer straightened. "Lay down your arms, and come peacefully."
The Lunari crouched in silence, readying her curved blades once more. 
So be it. 
The Solari readied herself in turn, lifting her shield to reflect the rays of the rising sun.
fields.name: Solari Shieldbearer

fields.flavor_text: Countless challenges await those climbing Mount Targon. Some, like the endless ascent, slowly sap the aspirants' strength. Others are much more immediate.
fields.name: Fused Firebrand

fields.description: Fill your hand with <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gems</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Fill your hand with Gems.
fields.flavor_text: "Turn a gem just so, and it glimmers in the light. Like mortal lives, each has its own inner fire." - Taric
fields.name: Shards of the Mountain

fields.description: Create 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>The Messengers</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw: Create 5 The Messengers in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Time passes, skies turn--the Serpent moves aside and the Messenger takes its place overhead. A season of abundance awaits..." - Lunari Priestess
fields.name: Messenger's Sigil

fields.description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2. Draw 1.
fields.description_raw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2. Draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: Stellacorns shine brightest when they are happy.
fields.name: Guiding Touch

fields.description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time you've targeted or supported allies this game.
fields.description_raw: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time you've targeted or supported allies this game.
fields.flavor_text: The Arbiter is the mountain's final test, for only the guardian sees beyond the climber's deeds, and into their spirit.
fields.name: Arbiter of the Peak

fields.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Nightfall: Grant me Elusive.
fields.flavor_text: "Let us cast our eyes toward the heavens, toward the sun, toward our lady's li-- Wait... What...? What is that...?" - Solari Priest
fields.name: Lunari Shadestalker

fields.description:
Your Celestial cards cost 1 less.
<link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
Your Celestial cards cost 1 less.
Allegiance: Invoke.
fields.flavor_text: "There is much to learn from the stars, from their guidance. For us, they are a constant, a way to chart our path."
fields.name: Mountain Scryer

fields.description: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
fields.description_raw: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Reach out, Aphelios..." - Alune
fields.name: Gifts From Beyond

fields.description:
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: The next Dragon or Celestial unit you play costs 2 less.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a random Dragon follower and Celestial follower in hand.
fields.description_raw:
Daybreak: The next Dragon or Celestial unit you play costs 2 less.
Nightfall: Create a random Dragon follower and Celestial follower in hand.
fields.flavor_text:
Dragon scale (Eclipse Dragon, Draco Obscuratus)
Notes: Scale has incredible optical properties. Highly reflective under direct sunlight.
Scribbled: IT ALSO GLOWS AT NIGHT!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
fields.name: Eclipse Dragon

fields.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: My supported ally and I can't take damage or die this round. Copy the last spell you cast on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
fields.description_raw: Support: My supported ally and I can't take damage or die this round. Copy the last spell you cast on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
fields.flavor_text: "Why should Taric show his fellow man kindness? Well, he came to Targon a broken man, intent on climbing the mountain to atone for his sins... and he succeeded. Nobody knows better that all broken things can be made beautiful again." - Mountain Scryer
fields.name: Taric

fields.description:
Grant an ally +3|+3.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Taric</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Grant an ally +3|+3.
Create a Taric in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "A little something from Targon." - Taric
fields.name: Taric's Blessing of Targon

fields.description: When you heal a damaged ally, grant me +2|+0.
fields.description_raw: When you heal a damaged ally, grant me +2|+0.
fields.flavor_text: "Ever since I first saw one streak across the night sky, I've loved stellacorns. If only I'd known then that I'd meet so many!"
fields.name: Star Shepherd

fields.description: Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, refill 2 mana and grant your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally +1|+1. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, refill 2 mana and grant your strongest ally +1|+1.
fields.flavor_text: It is here, in the Spirit Realm, that Alune communes with her brother Aphelios. It is she who speaks words of comfort to the silent assassin, and who reaches through the veil to hand him his weapons of retribution.
fields.name: The Veiled Temple

fields.description: Heal an ally 1 and grant it +1|+0.
fields.description_raw: Heal an ally 1 and grant it +1|+0.
fields.flavor_text: "You don't need to see to believe. Just have a little faith." - Tyari the Traveler
fields.name: Gem

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Celestial card, grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Play: If you Behold a Celestial card, grant an ally +1|+1 and SpellShield.
fields.flavor_text: "...and then a sparklefly is like stardust that falls down to the ground and then flies back up and they're amazing and I saw one last night that was so pretty and I'm hungry and it flew up all the way to the STARS and then..."
fields.name: Giddy Sparkleologist

fields.description:
Give allies +2|+2 this round.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Activate all ally <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> effects at once.
fields.description_raw:
Give allies +2|+2 this round.
Daybreak: Activate all ally Daybreak effects at once.
fields.flavor_text: "We rise with the dawn! March into the light!" - Leona
fields.name: Morning Light

fields.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me and an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Nightfall: Give me and an ally Elusive this round.
fields.flavor_text: The Lunari waited for nightfall and the safety it assured. The path ahead seemed deserted, but Cygnus knew the Solari camp lay just beyond. He gestured, and the others quietly fell in line behind him.
fields.name: Cygnus the Moonstalker

fields.flavor_text: It was the children of Targon who first befriended the younger, more peaceful dragons. Perhaps these juvenile creatures could sense the children's innocent curiosity, and chose, instead of causing them harm, to offer them protection.
fields.name: Whiteflame Protector

fields.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Grant my supported ally +2|+2. If it has <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>, grant its supported ally +2|+2 and continue for each supported ally in succession.
fields.description_raw: Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+2. If it has Support, grant its supported ally +2|+2 and continue for each supported ally in succession.
fields.flavor_text: Every person who braves Mount Targon has their reason to climb. Some do it to prove themselves in the eyes of their peers. Others, to prove something to themselves.
fields.name: Mountain Sojourners

fields.flavor_text: "Like any fledgling, young stellacorns must eventually take their first faltering flight. In this, they are just like other stars in the night sky, for they fall just as readily. Luckily, we are here to catch them, and when they are ready, return them." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars
fields.name: Fledgling Stellacorn

fields.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. If it's a follower, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it again at the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start.
fields.flavor_text: The Solari did not believe that another light could blind--a lesson the Lunari would readily teach.
fields.name: Sky Charge

fields.description: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>behold</style></link> a <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> card.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana if you behold a Nightfall card.
fields.flavor_text:
"Mother Moon, allow me to remember,
That though I stand in solitude,
Your children dance above,
And I am not alone."
- Lunari Prayer
fields.name: The Sky Shadows

fields.description:
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Create a random non-champion <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link> card in hand.
It's always Day for us.
fields.description_raw:
Daybreak: Create a random non-champion Daybreak card in hand.
It's always Day for us.
fields.flavor_text: "Keep your faith, Ra-Horak, and our light shall never falter!"
fields.name: Rahvun, Daylight's Spear

fields.description: Deal 4 to an enemy that attacked this round or is <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stunned</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Deal 4 to an enemy that attacked this round or is Stunned.
fields.flavor_text: "KaBOOMey!" - Zoe
fields.name: Paddle Star

fields.description: For the rest of the game, allied buffs (except Barrier) are permanent. Draw 1.
fields.description_raw: For the rest of the game, allied buffs (except Barrier) are permanent. Draw 1.
fields.flavor_text:
"You know I mean everything that I say
When you see me coming get out of the way
I came to slay I came to slay
Back and I’m better and ready to stay."
- Kai'Sa, 'THE BADDEST'
fields.name: Out Of The Way

fields.description: Draw 2 different Dragons or grant Dragon allies +1|+1.
fields.description_raw: Draw 2 different Dragons or grant Dragon allies +1|+1.
fields.flavor_text: "Their cry sounds like a raspy cat. If you ever hear it, you're to turn tail, and find the nearest guard. You hear? Because where there's dragon eggs, there's dragons." - Targonian forager
fields.name: Dragon's Clutch

fields.description: When you heal a damaged ally, give it <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: When you heal a damaged ally, give it Elusive this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Stars stay with us for only so long. Once they have been tended to, I return them to the sky in a sudden blaze of starlight... and flailing hooves."
fields.name: Stargazer

fields.description: <link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Give me +1|+1 this round.
fields.description_raw: Daybreak: Give me +1|+1 this round.
fields.flavor_text: As the sun warmed him, he stood watch at the heretic's prison, ignoring the soft pleas that quickly turned to bitter silence.
fields.name: Solari Soldier

fields.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant me +2|+0.
fields.description_raw: Nightfall: Grant me +2|+0.
fields.flavor_text: "Stoic guardian, the gentle touch of the full moon restores your strength. Awaken and safeguard us from those who would trespass upon this sacred place." - Crescent Guardian's inscription
fields.name: Crescent Guardian

fields.description:
Grant an ally +1|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>.
<link=keyword.Daybreak><style=Keyword>Daybreak</style></link>: Draw a <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Zenith Blade</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
Grant an ally +1|+2 and Overwhelm.
Daybreak: Draw a Zenith Blade.
fields.flavor_text: "Let the sun imbue you with Her strength!" - Solari Priest
fields.name: Zenith Blade

fields.description: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>behold</style></link> <link=card.behold><style=AssociatedCard>The Messenger</style></link>, grant Celestial allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
fields.description_raw: If you behold The Messenger, grant Celestial allies everywhere +1|+1.
fields.flavor_text:
"May the Messenger play,
And with his joy,
Light the stars."
- Lunari Prayer
fields.name: Starbone

fields.description: <link=keyword.Invoke><style=Keyword>Invoke</style></link> a Celestial card that costs 7 or more, then heal an ally or your Nexus 5.
fields.description_raw: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more, then heal an ally or your Nexus 5.
fields.flavor_text: "Look to the stars. If you're lucky, I'll look back." - Aurelion Sol
fields.name: Starshaping

fields.flavor_text: "Aww, big Stomper don't wanna go through the wittle portal? That's okay, we can-- HAHAHAHA! Just kidding. OUTYOUGO!" - Zoe
fields.name: Startled Stomper

fields.description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy. Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Paddle Star</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Stun an enemy. Create a Fleeting Paddle Star in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Naptime for you! One sparklefly, twoooo sparklefly, thre-- Hey, what'sthatoverthere?!" - Zoe
fields.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble

fields.description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Draw 1.
fields.description_raw:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
Nightfall: Draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: "Under cover of night, watched over by a pale moon." - Diana
fields.name: Pale Cascade

fields.description: Draw 2 different Dragons.
fields.description_raw: Draw 2 different Dragons.
fields.flavor_text:
Dragon egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco murmurationis)
Notes: Shell weakened on last turning. Increased movement inside. Cracks on surface superficial?
Scribbled Notes: EGG HATCHING!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
fields.name: Hatched Egg

fields.description: Grant Dragon allies +1|+1.
fields.description_raw: Grant Dragon allies +1|+1.
fields.flavor_text:
Dragon egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco murmurationis)
Notes: Shell weakened on last turning. Increased movement inside. Cracks on surface superficial?
Scribbled Notes: EGG HATCHING!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
fields.name: Crushed Egg

fields.description: Grant an ally +3|+3.
fields.description_raw: Grant an ally +3|+3.
fields.flavor_text: "A little something from Targon." - Taric
fields.name: Blessing of Targon

fields.flavor_text: In space, no one can hear you squee.
fields.name: Porofly

fields.description: While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
fields.description_raw: While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
fields.flavor_text: It's not quite as cuddly as the real thing, but it IS just as cute.
fields.name: Patched Porobot

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Ignition</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: Create a Ignition in hand.
fields.flavor_text:
Subject requested that we keep only his mind intact, stating "That's where I've stored all my grudges."
- Augmentor's log, entry 1011
fields.name: Ballistic Bot

fields.description: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Death Ray - Mk 2</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 2 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
fields.flavor_text:
"Today, I have successfully demonstrated that radiant energy can be focused into a single powerful beam! With the right improvements, this ray could be a tool of unmatched precision, but there is still much to do."
- Viktor's design annotations
fields.name: Death Ray - Mk 1

fields.description: Deal 3 to a unit.
fields.description_raw: Deal 3 to a unit.
fields.flavor_text:
"The beam melts flesh and metal alike with exceptional speed! I have since eagerly integrated it onto my machine body. To see, feel, and dissect the world with such CLARITY... This is the great potential of the human mind unburdened by flesh! A truly glorious evolution!" 
- Viktor's design annotations
fields.name: Death Ray - Mk 3

fields.description: Deal 2 to a unit. Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Death Ray - Mk 3</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
fields.description_raw: Deal 2 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 3 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
fields.flavor_text:
"Altered beam transmission medium, adjusted lenses to optimal focal distances, internal mirrors polished and positioned. Intensity increased tenfold. But it must improve. I MUST IMPROVE!"
- Viktor's design annotations
fields.name: Death Ray - Mk 2

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Hex Core Upgrade</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Play or Round Start: Create a Hex Core Upgrade in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Zaun, you have seen your share of tragedies, and the time has come for change. And, as with all great advancements, it must start within you."
fields.name: Viktor

fields.description:
Your created cards cost 1 less.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Hex Core Upgrade</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw:
Your created cards cost 1 less.
Play or Round Start: Create a Hex Core Upgrade in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Ah, Piltover. As a boy, I looked up to you, the shining 'City of Progress'. But as a man, I see its corrupt foundations, built atop the suffering of our home, Zaun. Today, we herald a new era of Zaunite innovation--and you will be the first to witness our rise!"
fields.name: Viktor

fields.description:
Deal 1 to a unit. Create a <link=card.upgrade><style=AssociatedCard>Death Ray - Mk 2</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Viktor</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 2 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
Create a Viktor in your deck.
fields.flavor_text:
"Today, I have successfully demonstrated that radiant energy can be focused into a single powerful beam! With the right improvements, this ray could be a tool of unmatched precision, but there is still much to do."
- Viktor's design annotations
fields.name: Viktor's Death Ray - Mk 1

fields.description: Grant <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Viktor</style></link> a random keyword.
fields.description_raw: Grant Viktor a random keyword.
fields.flavor_text: Humanity is destined to break free from the confines of flesh. We must become more. We must augment. We must evolve!" - Viktor
fields.name: Hex Core Upgrade

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me all keywords on allies.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Grant me all keywords on allies.
fields.flavor_text: "I'm just like you, only better."
fields.name: Mechanized Mimic

fields.description:
Raise all allies' Power and Health to the highest Power or Health among allies.
Grant all allies allied keywords.
fields.description_raw:
Raise all allies' Power and Health to the highest Power or Health among allies.
Grant all allies allied keywords.
fields.flavor_text:
"I know I know
You want some more
If you ready let’s go
Giving it all"
- Seraphine, 'MORE'
fields.name: Give It All

fields.description: Create a <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Armed Gearhead</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Ballistic Bot</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Nyandroid</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Create a Armed Gearhead, Ballistic Bot, or Nyandroid in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Rationality and choice separate humanity from its base animal instincts." - Viktor
fields.name: Calculated Creations

fields.description: Pick a follower. Create a copy of it in hand with +1|+1.
fields.description_raw: Pick a follower. Create a copy of it in hand with +1|+1.
fields.flavor_text: "Self-improvement is a game where you are the hero and the villain. You will struggle. You may even think you've won. But in the end, you will always be left standing in your own way." - Mechanized Mimic
fields.name: Iterative Improvement

fields.description: Remove <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> from all cards in hand. When I'm discarded, draw 1 <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Remove Fleeting from all cards in hand. When I'm discarded, draw 1 Fleeting.
fields.flavor_text: "It's simple stuff, really. I replaced the steel frame with a more durable alloy I invented, and rerouted the circuitry away from the hinges to stop the systems from shorting out. Easy peasy." - Chief Mechanist Zevi
fields.name: Stress Testing

fields.flavor_text: "Alright! New arm! Always wanted one of those. What've we got next? Gravwheels for legs? Electrobelts? METAL TEETH? Actually, leave my face. I like my face."
fields.name: Armed Gearhead

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: ALL players draw 1.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: ALL players draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: "Let them say what they will about my methods. They cannot deny progress--the light of my knowledge is shining like a beacon through the darkness of ignorance!" - Viktor
fields.name: Hexcore Foundry

fields.description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text:
"If they do not choose to add metal to their bodies, I will deliver metal to them instead. That was a humorous remark. Ha."
- Ballistic Bot
fields.name: Ignition

fields.flavor_text: "I clawed my way through years of Piltovan academia only to have my technologies deemed 'too dangerous' and my very presence dismissed as 'too cute'! Meow to Zaun, where I know at least one great mind shares my ambitions..."
fields.name: Nyandroid

fields.description: Deal 3 to anything or destroy a landmark.
fields.description_raw: Deal 3 to anything or destroy a landmark.
fields.flavor_text: "This ray of light will guide our march to Piltover. Nothing will stand in the way of our Glorious Evolution!" - Viktor
fields.name: Aftershock

fields.description: Deal 1 to a unit. Summon a random <style=Variable>1</style> cost follower. While I'm in hand, increase both by 1 when you play a 3 cost card.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to a unit. Summon a random 1 cost follower. While I'm in hand, increase both by 1 when you play a 3 cost card.
fields.flavor_text: "...and in one, two, and THREE!!! Oh. Oh, my word... Yet another unforeseen outcome?!" - Heimerdinger
fields.name: Tri-beam Improbulator

fields.description:
To play, discard 1.
Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Daring Poros</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw:
To play, discard 1.
Create 2 Daring Poros in hand.
fields.flavor_text: Two downy shapes arced gracefully over the adoring crowd, leaving a cloud of fluff and the faint scent of baked goods in their wake.
fields.name: Poro Cannon

fields.description:
Pick a follower from the top 4 cards in your deck.
Draw it, place the rest into your deck, then create an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy in hand.
fields.description_raw:
Pick a follower from the top 4 cards in your deck.
Draw it, place the rest into your deck, then create an exact Ephemeral copy in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Go... surround them..." - Nocturne
fields.name: Stalking Shadows

fields.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a copy of me in hand.
fields.description_raw: Nightfall: Create a copy of me in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "It was just a pair of eyes at first, and a lone voice chittering in the shadows. More every time I looked back. Angrier. Louder. Soon as I saw the Tooth, I ran." - Whale's Tooth looter
fields.name: Evershade Stalker

fields.description: Kill an ally with <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link> to summon a follower from your deck that costs 1 more.
fields.description_raw: Kill an ally with Last Breath to summon a follower from your deck that costs 1 more.
fields.flavor_text: "SUPPAH TIIIIME!" - Ravenous Butcher
fields.name: Gluttony

fields.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> all units that were summoned, but not played, this round.
fields.description_raw: Obliterate all units that were summoned, but not played, this round.
fields.flavor_text:
"Of course, death is present in Demacia. We see it take our loved ones and know that, someday, it will come for us. But on these isles... I can almost taste death. I feel it in my lungs as I breathe, I hear it whisper in my ear. It is not some abstract notion. It sits with me here. Now. And it will have us all."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
fields.name: Passage Unearned

fields.description: Grant ALL allies in deck and hand +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Grant ALL allies in deck and hand +2|+2 and Ephemeral.
fields.flavor_text:
"Mind or body, I fear that the nightmares of the Shadow Isles will break us all eventually, and insanity will reign forever."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
fields.name: Encroaching Shadows

fields.description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from a unit and create 2 copies of me in your deck. Once you've cast me <style=Variable>3</style> times, transform all copies of me <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Pack Your Bags</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Drain 1 from a unit and create 2 copies of me in your deck. Once you've cast me 3 times, transform all copies of me everywhere into Pack Your Bags.
fields.flavor_text:
"We go hard, 'til we get it, get it
We go hard, we so in it, in it
We Pop Stars (Pop Stars), only winning, winning now
Ain't nobody bringing us down, down, down, down"
- Evelynn, 'POP/STARS'
fields.name: Go Hard

fields.description: Deal 5 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus. Transform all copies of me <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> back to <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Go Hard</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Deal 5 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus. Transform all copies of me everywhere back to Go Hard.
fields.flavor_text:
"Sorry for the bad news sorry I’m so bad
Only took a minute for me to get all you had
Sorry for the bad news know it makes you sad
I’ll be here for a minute baby you should pack your bags"
- Evelynn, 'THE BADDEST'
fields.name: Pack Your Bags

fields.description: The next time you summon an ally this round, give it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: The next time you summon an ally this round, give it +1|+0 and SpellShield this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Soon as you step outside the Tooth, you'll feel 'em. Fingertips on your nape, light as rain. Them creatures don't budge when you come at 'em, neither. Ain't afraid of my blade or my torch. Nothin'. Awful things." - Whale's Tooth looter
fields.name: Shroud of Darkness

fields.description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraith</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Summon a Mistwraith.
fields.flavor_text: The mistwraiths move through planes unseen by mortal eyes, appear without warning, and inflict misery on all they encounter.
fields.name: Risen Mists

fields.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> and give enemies <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> this round.
fields.description_raw: Nightfall: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and give enemies -1|-0 this round.
fields.flavor_text:
"It appears that, once enough souls have been shaken, it breaches our world. Only hope can send the monstrosity back to its realm... but hope died here long ago, on a queen's final breath, and with a king's eternal scream."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
fields.name: Nocturne

fields.description:
<link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from anything. Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nocturne</style></link> in your deck.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a random non-champion <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> card in hand.
fields.description_raw:
Drain 1 from anything. Create a Nocturne in your deck.
Nightfall: Create a random non-champion Nightfall card in hand.
fields.flavor_text:
"Every passing day saps my spirit, pulls from me the vigor that compelled me to find this place. The Whale's Tooth is full of haggard folk, seemingly lost to all endeavor, and I fear the longer I stay, the more like them I become."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
fields.name: Nocturne's Unspeakable Horror

fields.description:
Other allies have <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>.
When you play a unit, give enemies <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> this round.
fields.description_raw:
Other allies have Fearsome.
When you play a unit, give enemies -1|-0 this round.
fields.flavor_text:
"My dreams grow more vivid with each passing night. I see a creature of pure evil, writhing in the dark, twisting its way toward me. Though I was to be stationed here for another week, I have just paid for transport to Fossbarrow this evening. Plainly, I cannot stand this place."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
fields.name: Nocturne

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link><link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 2 from the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Nightfall: Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: With each passing night, the travelers grew more weary. Their slumber was restless, and their dreams vivid. Sleep no longer gave respite, and instead pulled the life from their bones.
fields.name: Doombeast

fields.description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create 2 copies of me in the enemy deck.
fields.description_raw: Last Breath: Create 2 copies of me in the enemy deck.
fields.flavor_text: Most of the spirits on the Shadow Isles are utterly terrifying and morbid creatures. A small handful are... well... just really, really annoying.
fields.name: Pesky Specter

fields.description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 2 from the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: What knows you better than your own mind? What can torment you more exquisitely than your own dreams?
fields.name: Torment

fields.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Give me +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Nightfall: Give me +2|+0 and Fearsome this round.
fields.flavor_text: As the sun melts into pitch, the terrors of this place wake, watch, and wait.
fields.name: Stygian Onlooker

fields.description:
<link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 1 from anything.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Create a random non-champion <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> card in hand.
fields.description_raw:
Drain 1 from anything.
Nightfall: Create a random non-champion Nightfall card in hand.
fields.flavor_text:
"Every passing day saps my spirit, pulls from me the vigor that compelled me to find this place. The Whale's Tooth is full of haggard folk, seemingly lost to all endeavor, and I fear the longer I stay, the more like them I become."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian
fields.name: Unspeakable Horror

fields.description: <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Grant me +1|+0 for each time we've activated <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> this game. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Nightfall: Grant me +1|+0 for each time we've activated Nightfall this game.
fields.flavor_text: With every setting sun, the night unfurls its dark wings, and blots out the day's last remnants of hope.
fields.name: Duskrider

fields.description: Grant an ally +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>. If it already has it, grant it <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link> instead.
fields.description_raw: Grant an ally +1|+0 and Quick Attack. If it already has it, grant it Double Attack instead.
fields.flavor_text: "Hit often, hit fast, and hit hard." - Horns of the Dragon
fields.name: Flurry of Fists

fields.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +2|+1 this round.
fields.description_raw: Support: Give my supported ally +2|+1 this round.
fields.flavor_text:
"Pix is AWESOME, he's small and cool and wholesome,
His favorite things are possums, and he likes to... hrmhmhmhrmthrossom!" - Lulu
fields.name: Pix!

fields.description: Transform a follower into a 1|1 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Squirrel</style></link> and <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it this round.
fields.description_raw: Transform a follower into a 1|1 Squirrel and Silence it this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Adoribus!" - Lulu
fields.name: Whimsy!

fields.flavor_text: A fae flash knocked him to the floor! Newly keen ears heard a yordle's fading laughter, and he looked down to see furry paws, attached to furry arms...
fields.name: Squirrel

fields.description: When I'm supported, grant me +2|+0.
fields.description_raw: When I'm supported, grant me +2|+0.
fields.flavor_text: Everyone wants a familiar, but no one's prepared for the responsibility. You've gotta take them on walkies, make sure they're eating a balanced diet... house-train them. It's a lot of work.
fields.name: Flower Child

fields.description: Pick an ally. <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> ALL other units and landmarks.
fields.description_raw: Pick an ally. Recall ALL other units and landmarks.
fields.flavor_text: "I walk my path alone." - Solitary Monk
fields.name: Singular Will

fields.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: My supported ally grows up to 4|4 this round.
fields.description_raw: Support: My supported ally grows up to 4|4 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Don't you worry, Pix! We're gonna get outta the Glade, and we're gonna adoribus ALL THE THINGS! Are you ready?!"
fields.name: Lulu

fields.description: Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> or an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally Barrier or an enemy Vulnerable this round.
fields.flavor_text: Pix protec... or Pix attac...?
fields.name: Help, Pix!

fields.description: Transform a follower into a 1|1 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Squirrel</style></link> and <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it this round. Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lulu</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw: Transform a follower into a 1|1 Squirrel and Silence it this round. Create a Lulu in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Adoribus!" - Lulu
fields.name: Lulu's Whimsy!

fields.description:
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Help, Pix!</style></link> in hand.
<link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: My supported ally grows up to 5|5 this round.
fields.description_raw:
Round Start: Create a Fleeting Help, Pix! in hand.
Support: My supported ally grows up to 5|5 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Oooh! Look, Pix! It's a whole different world out here! Now let's give it lots of colors!"
fields.name: Lulu

fields.description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Double my Power.
fields.description_raw: Strike: Double my Power.
fields.flavor_text: His secret is acorn powder shakes, four times a day.
fields.name: Swole Squirrel

fields.flavor_text: Energy: 104kJ (25 kcal), Carbohydrates: 5.88g, Sugars: 3.53g, Dietary Fiber: 3g, Fat: 0.18g, Protein: 0.98g, Water: 92g...
fields.name: Tasty Faefolk

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Play: Grant an ally Elusive.
fields.flavor_text: "Shh! This way! We've gotta make a sharp left after the walking treehouse, then go straight past the talking flowers. Lu, you listening to me? Lu? Lu! LULU! Do. NOT. Feed them. Do not do that."
fields.name: Fae Guide

fields.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Create an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mumblesprite</style></link> with my supported ally's stats.
fields.description_raw: Support: Create an attacking Mumblesprite with my supported ally's stats.
fields.flavor_text: You're supposed to follow your dreams, not manifest them through inadvertent muttered conjuration as you sleep-float through an ancient magical forest. I mean SHEESH.
fields.name: Trevor Snoozebottom

fields.flavor_text: Another mumblesprite burst out, its eyes full of devilish mischief. "No more cheese for Trevor!" Bri announced. The others all nodded.
fields.name: Mumblesprite

fields.description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> and +1|+0 this round.
fields.description_raw: Support: Give my supported ally Quick Attack and +1|+0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: Sir Ribery Montague left home hoping to complete some great quest or curry favor with a notable house. But fate led him to a hidden bandlewood, where young Bri quickly transformed Sir Ribery into a frog, and yanked him off on HER adventures. Poor Rib!
fields.name: Young Witch

fields.description: Stop a <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> or <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spell that costs 3 or less.
fields.description_raw: Stop a Fast or Slow spell that costs 3 or less.
fields.flavor_text: "Don't do that, you silly smufflefloof! You might hurt the antylopes!" - Lulu
fields.name: Nopeify!

fields.description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy in its place. Reduce its cost to 0 this round.
fields.description_raw: Recall an ally to summon an exact Ephemeral copy in its place. Reduce its cost to 0 this round.
fields.flavor_text:
"More
Know I got it,
So here you go,
You look like you could use some more."
- Akali, 'MORE'
fields.name: Go Get It

fields.description:
When I'm supported, give me +0|+3 this round.
<link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +3|+0 this round.
fields.description_raw:
When I'm supported, give me +0|+3 this round.
Support: Give my supported ally +3|+0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: The purple faefolk are sweet little creatures, and cared for by all those who encounter them. Well, almost all.
fields.name: Fuzzy Caretaker

fields.description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Dragon, grant me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold a Dragon, grant me Challenger.
fields.flavor_text: "When I lost my comrades in arms at Wrenwall, I thought I had also lost my resolve... but it turns out there is nothing that a fight can't stir up in an old soldier."
fields.name: Dragonguard Lieutenant

fields.description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Grant an ally Challenger.
fields.flavor_text: "None shall escape us!" - Shyvana
fields.name: Confront

fields.description: ALL spells cost 1 more.
fields.description_raw: ALL spells cost 1 more.
fields.flavor_text: What begins as a shapeless, rough-hewn block of petricite quickly becomes something more under the clever hands of its sculptor. That is when a piece truly starts to come to life.
fields.name: Stony Suppressor

fields.flavor_text: All creatures are fiercely protective of their young, but few are as well equipped to deal with would-be threats as a dragon.
fields.name: Screeching Dragon

fields.description: An ally with <link=keyword.Fury><sprite name=Fury><style=Keyword>Fury</style></link> <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> the two <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemies.
fields.description_raw: An ally with Fury strikes the two weakest enemies.
fields.flavor_text: For centuries, the Demacians only knew of a dragon's fury through legend. Wrenwall changed that.
fields.name: Molten Breath

fields.description: An ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other. Then, if the ally is a Dragon, heal it 2.
fields.description_raw: An ally and an enemy strike each other. Then, if the ally is a Dragon, heal it 2.
fields.flavor_text: When knight and dragon separated, panting and wounded, the latter seemed reinvigorated. It smelled blood, and was eager for more.
fields.name: Strafing Strike

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +1|+1 this round.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Give me +1|+1 this round.
fields.level_up_description: I've seen Dragon allies deal 12+ damage<style=Variable></style>.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I've seen Dragon allies deal 12+ damage.
fields.flavor_text:
"On the one hand, she is, by her very nature, our most hated foe, her kind having historically brought only anguish to Demacia. On the other, she is trusted by the Prince, and seems to have all the makings of a determined soldier and valuable ally. I only hope that she does not betray the trust we have placed in her."
- Page from Lieutenant Jerik's account on Wrenwall
fields.name: Shyvana

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +2|+2 this round and create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Strafing Strike</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Give me +2|+2 this round and create a Fleeting Strafing Strike in hand.
fields.flavor_text:
"The first time I witnessed her transformation, I beheld her with revulsion. There was Yvva, replete in fire and fury! If only I had known then what I know now--that she would become our sister in arms, an exemplary soldier... and my dear, dear friend."
- Page from Lieutenant Jerik's account on Wrenwall
fields.name: Dragon Shyvana

fields.description:
Grant an ally <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
