Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Shyvana</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Grant an ally Challenger.
Create a Shyvana in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "None shall escape us!" - Shyvana
fields.name: Shyvana's Confront

fields.description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> a Dragon, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold a Dragon, Rally.
fields.flavor_text:
"There in the distance! Is that...?"
"Looks like it."
"How can you be sure?"
"Oh, there's no mistaking them. Cover your ears. This will be loud." - Anden and Yessenia
fields.name: Dragonguard Lookout

fields.flavor_text: "Careful, soldiers! If we tread carefully and don't disturb the nest, we can keep the mother dragon on the defensive. If we rile her up any further... Well, you'll want to be ready to run." - Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
fields.name: Stalking Broodmother

fields.description: When I'm summoned, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
fields.flavor_text:
Dragon Egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco Murmurationis) 
Location: Recovered by researcher Anden Mayne on Expedition. 
Notes: Gestation period unknown. Incubation continued. Recent movement observed within shell. Egg responds to heat, light, hammer. Current studies inconclusive. 
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher
fields.name: Egghead Researcher

fields.description: When I'm summoned, grant other Dragon allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant other Dragon allies everywhere +2|+2.
fields.flavor_text: When Demacia underwent a sudden spate of dragon attacks, Shyvana knew that Kadregrin the Infernal was to blame. Other dragons, inspired by his bold nature and powerful flame, drove the Demacians to fear.
fields.name: Kadregrin the Infernal

fields.description:
When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
For each ally that died this round, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguard</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
For each ally that died this round, summon a Dauntless Vanguard.
fields.flavor_text: "If a soldier falls, another must take their place. Our banner must never fall." - Garen
fields.name: For The Fallen

fields.description: Give an ally +2|+2 and "I can block units with <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>" this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +2|+2 and "I can block units with Elusive" this round.
fields.flavor_text: Any who would dare breach Demacia's walls will find a full company awaiting them--forewarned and heavily armed.
fields.name: Sharpsight

fields.description: When an ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When an ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0 and Tough.
fields.flavor_text: There are many places of honor among the Winter's Claw, but one of the greatest is The Scargrounds, where damaged war vessels that have returned from raids are repurposed as gathering halls for warriors and their kin. These ships embody the tribe that built them--resilient and adaptable.
fields.name: The Scargrounds

fields.description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, grant me +3|+0.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant me +3|+0.
fields.flavor_text:
The scout knelt by a tattered edge of cloth hidden in the snow, where the scent of human sweat and fire smoke lingered in the cold air.
He pulled the material free and saw at one end, a talisman dangled, dull under the stormy sky. Avarosan.
fields.name: Troll Scavenger

fields.description:
Pick a unit in your hand to reveal. Heal your Nexus equal to its Power.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Reduce its cost to 0.
fields.description_raw:
Pick a unit in your hand to reveal. Heal your Nexus equal to its Power.
Enlightened: Reduce its cost to 0.
fields.flavor_text: "Fully grown trolls have thick hides and dense bones that heal quickly, making them terrible, tenacious foes. Cut them down quickly, lest they recover to fight again another day." - Avarosan Marksman
fields.name: Revitalizing Roar

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, grant an ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> and <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Play: If you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant an ally Overwhelm and Regeneration.
fields.flavor_text: It is said that very few trolls are taught the chants of the Old Ones, and that those who know them can call on their forebears to imbue their brethren with exceptional strength.
fields.name: Augur of the Old Ones

fields.description: When I'm summoned, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Ice Pillar</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create an Ice Pillar in hand.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I've seen you play Ice Pillar.
fields.flavor_text:
One by one, torches lit along the pass, throwing the scene into sharp relief. There were dozens of trolls, maybe hundreds, each one hulking, massive, and deadly.
"I'll ask one more time," Trundle snarled, hefting Boneshiver over one shoulder. "Are you gonna give up, or am I gonna have to break your skulls?"
fields.name: Trundle

fields.description:
When I'm summoned, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Ice Pillar</style></link> in hand.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +1|+0 for each 8+ cost card you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
When I'm summoned, create an Ice Pillar in hand.
Attack: Grant me +1|+0 for each 8+ cost card you Behold.
fields.flavor_text: The Avarosans refused. Trundle gestured, and, like an avalanche, the trolls descended with such momentum that it carried them on for miles afterward, deep into the Avarosan tribelands, battering and breaking everything in their path without reserve.
fields.name: Trundle

fields.description:
Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Trundle</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
Create a Trundle in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Bury 'em alive!" - Trundle
fields.name: Trundle's Icequake

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Refill 8 mana.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> and <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Give the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw:
Play: Refill 8 mana.
Play and Round Start: Give the Strongest enemy Vulnerable this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Haha! You didn't see that coming!" - Trundle
fields.name: Ice Pillar

fields.description: Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
fields.description_raw: Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
fields.flavor_text: "Bury 'em alive!" - Trundle
fields.name: Icequake

fields.description: Give an ally +0|+2 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +0|+2 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: Troll chants are highly varied. They differ from group to group, and are often incomprehensible. They are all, however, terrifying to witness.
fields.name: Troll Chant

fields.flavor_text:
They felt it before they heard it, the ground trembling beneath their feet, but it quickly became audible, like distant thunder drawing closer.
Meyrick lifted his head, eyes wide, listening.
"What is it?" Anya whispered urgently, drawing her bow, but Meyrick was already sprinting back toward the path. 
"RUN!"
fields.name: Uzgar the Ancient

fields.description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, grant me <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant me Regeneration.
fields.flavor_text: Once they were among the Avarosan huts, they called Hgar forward. With a laugh, she raised Snowsunder, ready to use the weapon to batter the wooden homes into little more than splinters.
fields.name: Troll Ravager

fields.description: For the top 4 cards in your deck, draw each Yeti, Poro, and Elnuk. Then place the rest into your deck.
fields.description_raw: For the top 4 cards in your deck, draw each Yeti, Poro, and Elnuk. Then place the rest into your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "...an' then a BIIIIG HUUUGE ELNUK came FLYIN' out of the trees with a teeny lil' poro on his back an' there was a FRIENDLY YETI as well because he wanted to play with his friends an' they all ran down the mountain goin' RAAAAAWRRRR an' then..." - Ingvar the Younger
fields.name: Call the Wild

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an 8+ cost card, get an extra mana gem this round.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: If you Behold an 8+ cost card, get an extra mana gem this round.
fields.flavor_text:
"Rise, Old Ones, rise,
Rule of ice, break the sky.
Rise, Old Ones, rise,
Bring us strength, them demise."
- Troll chant
fields.name: Faces of the Old Ones

fields.description:
Get 2 empty mana gems.
For the top 4 cards in your deck, draw each card that costs 8+. Then place the rest into your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Get 2 empty mana gems.
For the top 4 cards in your deck, draw each card that costs 8+. Then place the rest into your deck.
fields.flavor_text: For generations, Avarosan settlers heard strange, inexplicable sounds within the tumult of winter storms. Eventually, when they ventured much farther north, they finally discovered the source--ancient troll monoliths whispering in long-lost tongues as the wind swept through their yawning maws.
fields.name: Voices of the Old Ones

fields.description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Regeneration><sprite name=Regeneration><style=Keyword>Regeneration</style></link>. If they already have it, grant them +2|+2 instead.
fields.description_raw: Grant an ally Regeneration. If they already have it, grant them +2|+2 instead.
fields.flavor_text: Pity those who see the promise of victory in a troll's blood.
fields.name: Troll Gifts

fields.description: Summon 2 different, random champions from your hand and deck. Raise their stats up to 10|10.
fields.description_raw: Summon 2 different, random champions from your hand and deck. Raise their stats up to 10|10.
fields.flavor_text:
"We got it all in our hands now
So can you handle what we're all about?"
- Ahri, 'POP/STARS'
fields.name: Feel The Rush

fields.description:
Give an enemy follower <nobr>-4|-0</nobr> this round.
If you have fewer mana gems than your opponent, kill it instead.
fields.description_raw:
Give an enemy follower -4|-0 this round.
If you have fewer mana gems than your opponent, kill it instead.
fields.flavor_text: "The sun will shine again upon Shuriman lands." - Voice of the Risen
fields.name: Unworthy

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an enemy <nobr>-1|-0</nobr> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Play: Grant an enemy -1|-0 and Vulnerable.
fields.flavor_text: Each grain she spills takes a second from their lives, wearing away at them like wind.
fields.name: Baccai Sandspinner

fields.description: Destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
fields.name: Rite of Negation

fields.description: Kill an ally to stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Kill an ally to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
fields.name: Rite of Negation

fields.description: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
fields.description_raw: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
fields.flavor_text: "I saw her speak, long ago." The old soldier smiled, and for an instant, his granddaughter could picture it: Shurima, gold and gleaming, proud Azir standing over the city heralded by the Voice of the Risen. "She stirred in us all a passion we thought long lost."
fields.name: Voice of the Risen

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Play: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
fields.flavor_text:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary
fields.name: Desert Naturalist

fields.description: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
fields.flavor_text:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary
fields.name: Teen Spirit

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "When this here croc was born, the others took bets on how long he'd live, assuming he was the runt of the litter and a freak to boot. Nobody thought to bet on him eatin' all his siblings. Heh."
fields.name: Raz Bloodmane

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
fields.flavor_text: Few are taught the ways of the desert, and even fewer given the ability to command its sands as Azir can. To wield this power and know the secrets of the sands is a gift given only to Azir's most faithful and capable followers.
fields.name: Sandcrafter

fields.description: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Find</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Create a Lucky Find in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Sure, I've had good days and bad days, just like anyone. In this line of work, the bad days can get real bad, and the good days can get real rich." - Sivir
fields.name: Payday

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Clockling</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
Play: Predict.
Countdown 2: Summon a Clockling.
fields.flavor_text: Though they might otherwise be thought of as lost to time, buried underneath years of sand, the automata were precisely placed, simply waiting to be awakened.
fields.name: Ancient Preparations

fields.description: When you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit, grant me +1|+0.
fields.description_raw: When you slay a unit, grant me +1|+0.
fields.flavor_text: "The baccai all fled or were spared following their failed Ascension, and none have seen them since. Who knows how long they have hidden in those dark tombs, bearing the mark of their shame?" - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
fields.name: Baccai Reaper

fields.description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 3</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Countdown 3: Summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
fields.flavor_text:
"MY NAME IS ZAIFA AND I LIKE WRITING STUPID THINGS IN MY STUPID BOOK WHEN I THINK EVERYONE ELSE IS ASLEEP. EVEN SAMI."
- Zaifa's diary
fields.name: Hibernating Rockbear

fields.description: <link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 2. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Reputation: I cost 2.
fields.flavor_text: The soldier struggled as he reached for his spear, but she leaned harder on his chest until he ceased, groaning. "No, no," she admonished, showing her sharpened eyeteeth with a wicked smile. "This is mine, now."
fields.name: Callous Bonecrusher

fields.flavor_text: Before the vaults, Shurima's mercenaries and tomb robbers must learn to survive the desert's more overt threats. First, the unrelenting heat. Second, the multitude of raiders, hellbent on carnage.
fields.name: Ruin Runner

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark.
fields.description_raw: Play: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark.
fields.flavor_text:
"The nomad's step is always light, for it is unburdened by the weight of roots, and their home is forever beyond the horizon."
- The Societies of Shurima
fields.name: Taliyah

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark. 
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=AttackSkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to my blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead. If you have a landmark, do this 2 more times.
fields.description_raw:
Play: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark. 
Attack: Deal 2 to my blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead. If you have a landmark, do this 2 more times.
fields.flavor_text: Taliyah left Ionia after hearing word of monumental change in her homeland. She returned to Shurima to find an emperor reborn, her people fraught, and the xer'sai more active than ever. She had no choice but to grow beyond her years.
fields.name: Taliyah

fields.description: Deal 2 to <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Taliyah</style></link>'s blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
fields.description_raw: Deal 2 to Taliyah's blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
fields.flavor_text: "Throw another rock!" - Taliyah
fields.name: Threaded Volley

fields.description:
Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Taliyah</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
Create a Taliyah in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Come on - there's so much to see!" - Taliyah
fields.name: Taliyah's Stoneweaving

fields.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if you've <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predicted</style></link> this game.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if you've Predicted this game.
fields.flavor_text:
"Remember what we learned," Zilean said, his voice unusually soft - grave, even. "Are you certain you're ready?"
Khahiri gave his mentor a reassuring smile. "I'll be back soon. And besides, I've spent every day for years preparing for this moment. If not now, when?"
fields.name: Khahiri the Student

fields.description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Grumpy Rockbear</style></link>. Then, if you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> ally +2|+2. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Countdown 2: Summon a Grumpy Rockbear. Then, if you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant the Strongest ally +2|+2.
fields.flavor_text: A Shuriman saltworker quickly learns which deposits are suitable for collection, and which are best left alone.
fields.name: Salt Spire

fields.description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
fields.flavor_text: "When Azir took up the mantle as emperor of Shurima, he was arrogant. Blind. He accumulated power and planned his Ascension so that he might stand as ruler over not just Shurima, but the entire world." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
fields.name: Azir

fields.description:
When I level up, replace your deck with the Emperor's Deck, then draw 1.
When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sandstone Charger</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
When I level up, replace your deck with the Emperor's Deck, then draw 1.
When allies attack, summon an attacking Sandstone Charger.
fields.flavor_text:
"The Emperor Azir, though haughty, is generous. Above all, he cares deeply for those who would march alongside him into Shurima's golden future, as the nation rises anew, its people once again united under his rule." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
fields.name: Azir

fields.description:
When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
When you summon an ally, give us both +1|+0 this round.
fields.description_raw:
When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
When you summon an ally, give us both +1|+0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Short of fulfilling his destiny, Azir's lifelong friend - and newly named brother - hatefully cast him off the dais. In that fateful moment Shurima was cursed, doomed to ruin for thousands of years to follow." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
fields.name: Azir

fields.flavor_text: "They appeared out of nowhere, made up of swirling sands! Then, after they had dispatched our forces, their forms simply... disappeared, melted back into the desert." - Desert Survivor
fields.name: Sandstone Charger

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link> and <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link> and grant them +2|+2.
fields.description_raw: Play and Round Start: Summon 2 Sand Soldiers and grant them +2|+2.
fields.flavor_text: Now more powerful than ever, Azir has raised his most loyal soldiers to lead his armies.
fields.name: Golden Herald

fields.description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Arise!</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Azir</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Summon a Sand Soldier.
Create a Fleeting Arise! in hand.
Create a Azir in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "The order is given." - Azir
fields.name: Azir's Arise!

fields.description:
Enemies are <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
Enemies are Vulnerable.
Round Start: Rally.
fields.flavor_text: "Observe our god-emperor! He knows the power of these lands better than any, and his army only grows. Shurima is risen, and it shall never fall again!" - Voice of the Risen
fields.name: General's Palace

fields.description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Nexus Strike: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: Azir's legions were reputed to be unstoppable even before Shurima was reborn, but now they are truly innumerable.
fields.name: Sand Soldier

fields.description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: The <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy and I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
fields.description_raw:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Round End: The Strongest enemy and I strike each other.
fields.flavor_text: "Behold! See how our champion sits astride the lion? Even the king of beasts would yield to his power, for he is the Will of Azir!" - Voice of the Risen
fields.name: Eternal Gladiator

fields.description:
<link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an enemy follower.
Draw 1.
fields.description_raw:
Obliterate an enemy follower.
Draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: "Those who oppose us will be reduced to dust." - Azir
fields.name: Crumbling Sands

fields.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> 3 enemy units or landmarks.
fields.description_raw: Obliterate 3 enemy units or landmarks.
fields.flavor_text: The storm rolls in with a peal like thunder, and when it passes, it leaves nothing behind.
fields.name: Sandstorm

fields.description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: The emperor's golden guard moves as one, a succession of regimented warriors that is as terrifying as it is impressive to behold.
fields.name: Emperor's Guard

fields.description:
Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
Draw 1.
fields.description_raw:
Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's Ephemeral.
Draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: Between the sand, the sun, and the heat, it can be difficult to tell what is real, and what is merely a mirage.
fields.name: Shimmering Mirage

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
Summon <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Renekton</style></link> and <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Nasus</style></link>. Immediately level them up to level 3.
fields.description_raw:
Rally.
Summon Renekton and Nasus. Immediately level them up to level 3.
fields.flavor_text: "They will serve their emperor. My generals will make sure of it." - Azir
fields.name: Ascended's Call

fields.description: Draw 2.
fields.description_raw: Draw 2.
fields.flavor_text: Birds found in the desert climes are all considered symbols of Azir, and Shurimans find their presence a good omen.
fields.name: Emperor's Prosperity

fields.description: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
fields.flavor_text: The Void is full of surprises, growing every day and finding new ways to infiltrate the tower, as intrusive as a thorned blindbrush but infinitely more deadly. Inasmuch, the study of it proves difficult, as it requires similarly clever and resourceful researchers to anticipate and understand the threat.
fields.name: Xenotype Researchers

fields.description:
Grant allied <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+0.
Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
Grant allied Sand Soldiers everywhere +1|+0.
Summon 2 Sand Soldiers.
fields.flavor_text: They do not rest. They do not hesitate. They are uncompromising, unfeeling, unyielding.
fields.name: Desert's Wrath

fields.description: When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
fields.description_raw: When I Challenge an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "It could be easily forgotten that he was once human, for the visage of the crocodile fits his love for bloody battle so well..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
fields.name: Renekton

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword></style></link>When I block or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: When I block or Attack: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "When he finally has a chance at revenge on his brother Nasus, Renekton will stop at nothing. He will destroy all, and Shurima will again be left a ruin." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
fields.name: Renekton

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give me +3|+3 this round.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Give me +3|+3 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "So many long years in the dark with that betrayer filling his head with words of hate and resentment, breeding contempt for his brother. It only fueled his rage, made him stronger." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
fields.name: Renekton

fields.description:
Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Renekton</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
Create a Renekton in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Shred them!" - Renekton
fields.name: Renekton's Ruthless Predator

fields.description: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: "I will spare no one!" - Renekton
fields.name: Dominus Destruction

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 3. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
fields.description_raw:
Reputation: I cost 3. 
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
fields.flavor_text: "This might get a little messy." - Sivir
fields.name: Ricochet

fields.description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +3|+1 instead.
fields.description_raw:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +3|+1 instead.
fields.flavor_text: "With the land's help, we WILL defend ourselves!" - Taliyah
fields.name: Shaped Stone

fields.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon a Roiling Sands.
fields.flavor_text:
"Today, we began our journey to Nashramae! Samir is determined to cross the Great Sai before the next full moon, and is making SUCH a mess of things! I did not know a simple sandboard could collapse a whole dune. Neither did Sami. He's fine."
- Zaifa's diary
fields.name: Rock Hopper

fields.description:
Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Arise!</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw:
Summon a Sand Soldier.
Create a Fleeting Arise! in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "The order is given." - Azir
fields.name: Arise!

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 0. <style=Variable></style>
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lucky Finds</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw:
Reputation: I cost 0. 
Countdown 1: Create 2 Lucky Finds in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Some maps take years to decipher, some traps takes months to disarm, and some vaults take weeks to navigate. But the times you pull it off? They're worth every damned second." - Sivir
fields.name: Inner Sanctum

fields.description: <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>
fields.description_raw: Fearsome
fields.flavor_text: "Yeah, you better be afraid." - Sivir
fields.name: Lucky Find

fields.description: <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>
fields.description_raw: Overwhelm
fields.flavor_text: "If I can't get past you, I'll just go through you." - Sivir
fields.name: Lucky Find

fields.description: <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link>
fields.description_raw: Quick Attack
fields.flavor_text: "Quick as a flash." - Sivir
fields.name: Lucky Find

fields.flavor_text: "The best just got better." - Sivir
fields.name: Lucky Find

fields.description: <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>
fields.description_raw: Challenger
fields.flavor_text: "Try turning me down." - Sivir
fields.name: Lucky Find

fields.description: <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>
fields.description_raw: Tough
fields.flavor_text: "Can't spend your earnings if you're dead." - Sivir
fields.name: Lucky Find

fields.flavor_text: "Let's cut 'em down to size." - Sivir
fields.name: Lucky Find

fields.flavor_text: "Go on. Gimme your best shot. Then it's my turn." - Sivir
fields.name: Lucky Find

fields.description: <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>
fields.description_raw: SpellShield
fields.flavor_text: "Your tricks ain't worth the sand you're standing on, kid." - Sivir
fields.name: Lucky Find

fields.description: Pick a buff from among 3 to grant an ally.
fields.description_raw: Pick a buff from among 3 to grant an ally.
fields.flavor_text: "Nothin' better than a payday." - Sivir
fields.name: Lucky Find

fields.flavor_text: Sivir made her way through life as a mercenary, and burdened herself with all the risks and rewards that came with her choice. One fateful expedition almost cost her everything, but as her blood seeped into Shurima's sands, it awoke an ancient power that would return both her and her homeland to greatness.
fields.name: Sivir

fields.description: When you summon another ally, give it +2|+0 this round.
fields.description_raw: When you summon another ally, give it +2|+0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: To receive the blessing of Azir is a great honor - to give a blessing in his name, an honor greater still.
fields.name: Inspiring Marshal

fields.description: When an enemy is summoned, destroy me to grant it <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When an enemy is summoned, destroy me to grant it Vulnerable.
fields.flavor_text: Centuries of missteps have taught the Shurimans how to read the sands. Only they know which expanses will stand firm, and which give way. It is all the same to the layman observer.
fields.name: Roiling Sands

fields.description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon an exact copy of the <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterated</style></link> unit I replaced.
fields.description_raw: Countdown 1: Summon an exact copy of the Obliterated unit I replaced.
fields.flavor_text:
"I like to think of this as 'capturing a moment'." 
"Ha. Clever."
- Xetsa and Zinsa, Void Researchers
fields.name: Stasis Statue

fields.description:
Draw 1.
If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> a unit this round, <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 2 from the enemy Nexus.
fields.description_raw:
Draw 1.
If you've slain a unit this round, Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
fields.flavor_text: Sandthrashers primarily recruit from their enemy's ranks. Whoever survives their initial assault is invited to join, or die.
fields.name: Ruinous Path

fields.description: Give enemies <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round and summon 6 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Give enemies Vulnerable this round and summon 6 Sand Soldiers.
fields.flavor_text: "My soldiers march on." - Azir
fields.name: Emperor's Divide

fields.description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
fields.description_raw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
fields.flavor_text: "We fight, they bleed!" - Renekton
fields.name: Rite of Dominance

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> 4+ units this game, an enemy and I <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Play: If you've slain 4+ units this game, an enemy and I strike each other.
fields.flavor_text: The bearer of a grudge's resentment only deepens, even if those they bear the grudge against are long dead.
fields.name: Rampaging Baccai

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Exalted Poro</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into Exalted Poro.
fields.flavor_text: She didn't know what she had found, precisely... but it was shiny, and looked like a good snack.
fields.name: Destined Poro

fields.description: I have 3 random keywords.
fields.description_raw: I have 3 random keywords.
fields.flavor_text: As far as divine rulers go, she's awfully fond of snax.
fields.name: Exalted Poro

fields.description: Give an enemy <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> and <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an enemy -2|-0 and Vulnerable this round.
fields.flavor_text: Desert-dwellers know how to avoid the sun's searing and relentless heat, but those unprepared to withstand it will find their strength and energy sapped at remarkable speed.
fields.name: Exhaust

fields.description:
Summon 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Roiling Sands</style></link>.
Draw 1.
fields.description_raw:
Summon 2 Roiling Sands.
Draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: As beautiful as the Great Sai may be, it is not a place for the weak. Many lives have been lost among its rolling dunes, and while the xer'sai claim many, the land itself takes its share.
fields.name: Unraveled Earth

fields.description: Level up all level 1 Ascended allies.
fields.description_raw: Level up all level 1 Ascended allies.
fields.flavor_text: "The future will be written by the Ascended!" - Azir
fields.name: Ascended's Rise

fields.description: I have +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game.
fields.description_raw: I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game.
fields.flavor_text: "Nasus' newly won blessing allowed him countless lifetimes to spend in study and contemplation over the nature of life and death. But this same extended lifespan would, after the fall of Shurima, also prove to be his curse." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
fields.name: Nasus

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Play: If you've slain 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me.
fields.flavor_text: The baccai are tasked with defending the inner sanctum to safeguard the ancient treasures there, and for the sake of mortals that might think themselves clever enough, or mighty enough, to withstand the weight of the Curator's judgment.
fields.name: Sanctum Conservator

fields.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon a Sand Soldier.
fields.flavor_text: "As the emperor commands, both the sand and I obey."
fields.name: Dunekeeper

fields.description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Draw a champion and grant it +2|+2.
fields.description_raw: Allegiance: Draw a champion and grant it +2|+2.
fields.flavor_text: "Our shining future lies just beneath the sands, and it is up to us to pave the way for Azir. The golden empire in the desert will rise again!"
fields.name: Golden Ambassador

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Play: Predict.
fields.flavor_text: Throughout his time as a student of chronomancy, Tai had to reconcile his uncertainty with his determination. It was better to have hope in a potential victory than to dwell on what could possibly go wrong.
fields.name: Aspiring Chronomancer

fields.description: <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Rampaging Baccai</style></link> and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
fields.description_raw: Rampaging Baccai and an enemy strike each other.
fields.flavor_text: The baccai are twisted, warped versions of what they might have been - had they become part of the Ascended Host - and the rage they feel at their failure must be unleashed somewhere.
fields.name: Baccai Rampage

fields.description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Draw 1.
fields.description_raw:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Countdown 2: Draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: Zilean shows those he brings to the tower what, precisely, they are looking to restore. It is The Preservationist is able to show them, if only a glimpse at a time.
fields.name: Preservarium

fields.description:
Start of Game: Draw 1 of me if all your cards are Shuriman.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 25</style></link><style=Variable></style>: <link=vocab.SunDiscRestore><style=Vocab>Restore the Sun Disc</style></link>.
When an Ascended ally levels up, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> me 10 rounds.
fields.description_raw:
Start of Game: Draw 1 of me if all your cards are Shuriman.
Countdown 25: Restore the Sun Disc.
When an Ascended ally levels up, advance me 10 rounds.
fields.flavor_text: When Azir beheld the Shuriman capital's Sun Disc, he saw it not for what it was, but what it could be--the key to returning Shurima to its former glory.
fields.name: Buried Sun Disc

fields.description:
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strikes</style></link> a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
fields.description_raw:
An ally Strikes a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions everywhere +2|+2.
fields.flavor_text: "Your soul will be measured." - Nasus
fields.name: Siphoning Strike

fields.description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> and <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemies.
fields.description_raw: An ally strikes the Strongest and Weakest enemies.
fields.flavor_text: "Better duck." - Sivir
fields.name: Boomerang Blade

fields.flavor_text: The Clocklings were the first to wriggle free - precisely at the time Zilean had set them to wake up. They shook themselves off and went clambering over the ancient walls, seeking others of their kind.
fields.name: Clockling

fields.description:
An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nasus</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
An ally strikes a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions everywhere +2|+2.
Create a Nasus in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Your soul will be measured." - Nasus
fields.name: Nasus' Siphoning Strike

fields.description:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game.
Enemies have <nobr>-3|-0</nobr>.
fields.description_raw:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game.
Enemies have -3|-0.
fields.flavor_text: "His hope revived by Shurima's rise, Nasus finally returned after years spent wandering the desert, eager to make amends with his brother. He never suspected he would find Renekton maddened by years spent suffering at Xerath's hands in the tomb, waiting for him." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
fields.name: Nasus

fields.description:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> this game.
Enemies have <nobr>-1|-0</nobr>.
fields.description_raw:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game.
Enemies have -1|-0.
fields.flavor_text: "For years, Nasus and his brother Renekton served the empire. Nasus was a scholar, Renekton a fierce warrior. It was not until the two were called upon to confront the betrayer, Xerath, that Nasus was forced to make a terrible choice..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
fields.name: Nasus

fields.description: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in your deck. When you see me in a <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Prediction</style></link>, grant all allied copies of me <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in your deck. When you see me in a Prediction, grant all allied copies of me everywhere +2|+2.
fields.flavor_text: Khahiri had only been gone a moment when he suddenly reappeared. Older by nearly a decade and wielding a strange and deadly-looking weapon, he was met with gasps of awe and concern.
fields.name: Khahiri the Returned

fields.description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: If you've leveled a champion, heal your champions and Nexus 2.
fields.description_raw: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, heal your champions and Nexus 2.
fields.flavor_text: "I have sworn myself to Azir, and to Shurima, my home! Will you not do the same?"
fields.name: Devoted Council

fields.description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Buried Sun Disc</style></link> 2 rounds.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, advance your Buried Sun Disc 2 rounds.
fields.flavor_text: "Oh! That's Padjuman, one of the elders of Nashramae! I think everyone has come to our city today, papa!" - Excited onlooker
fields.name: Esteemed Hierophant

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 3. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Sivir</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Reputation: I cost 3. 
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
Create a Sivir in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "This might get a little messy." - Sivir
fields.name: Sivir's Ricochet

fields.description: While I'm attacking, attacking allies have my keywords.
fields.description_raw: While I'm attacking, attacking allies have my keywords.
fields.flavor_text: "If you wanna work with me, I'll give you the same talk I give everyone: work for your share, and you'll get everything you're due. But if you slow me down, or get in my way, I'll kill you myself."
fields.name: Sivir

fields.description: Grant an allied landmark "My <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> completion effect activates twice".
fields.description_raw: Grant an allied landmark "My Countdown completion effect activates twice".
fields.flavor_text: "Mortals spend so much of their time waiting. My fondest hope is that they all should be rewarded for their patience." - Zilean
fields.name: Promising Future

fields.description: Deal 2 to a champion or 7 to a follower.
fields.description_raw: Deal 2 to a champion or 7 to a follower.
fields.flavor_text: "One life in return for so many. One life so that others might thrive." - Nasus
fields.name: Weight of Judgment

fields.description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, and <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
fields.flavor_text: Analysis is a mainstay of chronomancy, as many actions must be halted to consider future solutions.
fields.name: Rite of Negation

fields.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> an ally and summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Stasis Statue</style></link> in its place.
fields.description_raw: Obliterate an ally and summon a Stasis Statue in its place.
fields.flavor_text:
"Oh, Tai! Come here! We could use your help with something."
- Xetsa, Void Researcher
fields.name: Ancient Hourglass

fields.description: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sandstone Charger</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Summon a Sandstone Charger.
fields.flavor_text: "The box might be worth something, but whatever's inside sure as sand isn't. By which I mean, it's not worth opening. Speaking from experience, here." - Sivir
fields.name: Waking Sands

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Forecast><style=Vocab>Predict</style></link>. If you pick a landmark, grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Play: Predict. If you pick a landmark, grant me Elusive.
fields.flavor_text:
"We had trouble earlier! A great storm threatened from the west, and Taliyah passed xer'sai tunnels to the south. I spotted a temple to the north, and we are now safe inside its terracotta walls. The others are all asleep, and my flame, like me, is ebbing. I hope I dream well."
- Zaifa's diary
fields.name: Sai Scout

fields.flavor_text: The Sandthrashers do everything with their companions. Fight, hunt, kill... and eat.
fields.name: Bloodthirsty Marauder

fields.description: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time an ally attacked this game.
fields.description_raw: Reduce my cost by 1 for each time an ally attacked this game.
fields.flavor_text: Upon Azir's return, Shurimans caught sight of ancient beasts of legend, made of sand but no less impressive.
fields.name: Sandstone Chimera

fields.description:
Immediately draw 1 of all your Ascendants.
For the rest of the game, your level 2 Ascendants are level 3.
fields.description_raw:
Immediately draw 1 of all your Ascendants.
For the rest of the game, your level 2 Ascendants are level 3.
fields.flavor_text: "Shurima has known no glory like today. Come, bask in the light of our sun!" - Voice of the Risen
fields.name: Restored Sun Disc

fields.description: Kill an ally to give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
fields.description_raw: Kill an ally to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
fields.name: Rite of Dominance

fields.description: Destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
fields.description_raw: Destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
fields.name: Rite of Dominance

fields.description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sandstone Charger</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sandstone Charger.
fields.flavor_text: As they passed through the ravine, the Sandcrafter spoke the words of magic. A gust of wind echoed through the canyon and turned to the thunder of oncoming hooves.
fields.name: Sandswept Tomb

fields.description: Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Shred them!" - Renekton
fields.name: Ruthless Predator

fields.description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to draw a champion.
fields.description_raw: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to draw a champion.
fields.flavor_text: "A necessary sacrifice." - Nasus
fields.name: Rite of Calling

fields.description: Destroy one of your mana gems to draw a Champion.
fields.description_raw: Destroy one of your mana gems to draw a Champion.
fields.name: Rite of Calling

fields.description: Kill an ally to draw a Champion.
fields.description_raw: Kill an ally to draw a Champion.
fields.name: Rite of Calling

fields.description: If you've <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slain</style></link> 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me.
fields.description_raw: If you've slain 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me.
fields.flavor_text: "We are where both gods and men find their end." - Sanctum Conservator
fields.name: Conservator's Judgment

fields.description: Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
fields.description_raw: Look at 3 random landmarks you can afford. Pick 1 to create in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Come on - there's so much to see!" - Taliyah
fields.name: Stoneweaving

fields.description: When allies attack, summon an attacking <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldier</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
fields.flavor_text: The Sandcrafters lifted their hands, willing the sand into the familiar shape of armored, faceless soldiers, a tireless army ready to fight for their god-emperor.
fields.name: Emperor's Dais

fields.description: Give enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> and "<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Deal 2 to me" this round.
fields.description_raw: Give enemies -2|-0 and "Round End: Deal 2 to me" this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Their spirits will burn." - Nasus
fields.name: Spirit Fire

fields.description: Give an enemy <nobr>-4|-0</nobr> and disable its keywords (excluding any negative keywords) this round.
fields.description_raw: Give an enemy -4|-0 and disable its keywords (excluding any negative keywords) this round.
fields.flavor_text: In parts of the desert, old ruins have sunk into sand, creating hollows where unwary travelers might join them.
fields.name: Quicksand

fields.flavor_text:
"Ogh today was fun! We stopped for lunch (skallashi cheese - BLEUGH!) when Kadira spotted a poor rockdoubb asleep in the shade. Of course, she had to tug on its tail, and of course, it got mad. I hope it likes the cheese we left behind!"
- Zaifa's diary
fields.name: Grumpy Rockbear

fields.description:
When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: If the <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> of any of your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thralls</style></link> is 4 or less, <link=vocab.Advance><style=Vocab>advance</style></link> them to 0.
fields.description_raw:
When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall.
Round End: If the Countdown of any of your Frozen Thralls is 4 or less, advance them to 0.
fields.flavor_text: "My lady appears to me in dreams, her voice near a whisper. 'Follow,' she bids me. This command I dare not disobey."
fields.name: Draklorn Inquisitor

fields.description:
Grant an ally +1|+2.
<link=vocab.Plunder><style=Vocab>Plunder</style></link>: Grant +2|+4 instead.
fields.description_raw:
Grant an ally +1|+2.
Plunder: Grant +2|+4 instead.
fields.flavor_text: "You Avarosans only grow weak and plump in your fertile fields. So rest tonight, you pitiful weaklings, and while you dream of tomorrow's bounty, we will take it." - Scarmother Vrynna
fields.name: Spoils of War

fields.flavor_text: Freed from its icy tomb, the corrupted troll knew one thing, and one thing only - it must do as its dark mistress commanded.
fields.name: Frostguard Thrall

fields.description: Get an empty mana gem and grant an ally +0|+2.
fields.description_raw: Get an empty mana gem and grant an ally +0|+2.
fields.flavor_text: "Beware the ice... and more importantly... beware what lies within!" - Scrawled on a Freljord inn wall
fields.name: Cold Resistance

fields.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall.
fields.level_up_description: You've summoned 2+ allies that cost 8+<style=Variable></style>. When I level up, create a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Watcher</style></link> in hand.
fields.level_up_description_raw: You've summoned 2+ allies that cost 8+. When I level up, create a Watcher in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "The Watchers lurk just beyond these walls, suspended in ice, frozen in time... and while they wait, I have plans that must be set in motion..."
fields.name: Lissandra

fields.description:
I cost 0 if you've summoned 4+ allies that cost 8+ this game. <style=Variable></style>
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> the enemy deck.
fields.description_raw:
I cost 0 if you've summoned 4+ allies that cost 8+ this game. 
Attack: Obliterate the enemy deck.
fields.flavor_text: "This is the end. As it was foretold -- as I promised. Sisters... forgive me." - Lissandra
fields.name: Watcher

fields.description:
Your Nexus is <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Thrall</style></link>.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> 0 cost <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Ice Shard</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw:
Your Nexus is Tough.
When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall.
Round Start: Create a Fleeting 0 cost Ice Shard in hand.
fields.flavor_text: Few know what Lissandra sacrificed in order to gain power, her ambitions too great to be stymied by mortal trappings.
fields.name: Lissandra

fields.description:
<link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> a unit and summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Tomb</style></link> in its place.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Lissandra</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Obliterate a unit and summon a Frozen Tomb in its place.
Create a Lissandra in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "Kneel, or freeze." - Lissandra
fields.name: Lissandra's Entomb

fields.description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 8</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frostguard Thrall</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Countdown 8: Summon a Frostguard Thrall.
fields.flavor_text: Certainly, there were enough half-witted warriors within the ranks of Trundle's disorderly army to use as front-line fodder, but Lissandra desired something much more loyal, something that served her, and her alone...
fields.name: Frozen Thrall

fields.description: <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> a unit and summon an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Frozen Tomb</style></link> in its place.
fields.description_raw: Obliterate a unit and summon an Frozen Tomb in its place.
fields.flavor_text: "Kneel, or freeze." - Lissandra
fields.name: Entomb

fields.description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon an exact copy of the <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterated</style></link> unit I replaced.
fields.description_raw: Countdown 2: Summon an exact copy of the Obliterated unit I replaced.
fields.flavor_text: "Our lady will bury this world and all you know in ice." - Draklorn Inquisitor
fields.name: Frozen Tomb

fields.description:
Grant the top ally in your deck +2|+2.
<link=keyword.Enlightened><style=Keyword>Enlightened</style></link>: Instead, grant all allies in your deck +2|+2.
fields.description_raw:
Grant the top ally in your deck +2|+2.
Enlightened: Instead, grant all allies in your deck +2|+2.
fields.flavor_text: The Freljord's unrelenting cold and punishing storms kill most who enter its barren lands. But those who survive find within themselves an inner strength that spurs them onward through the rest of their lives.
fields.name: Ancestral Boon

fields.description:
When I'm summoned, heal your Nexus 4.
<link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 1</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Deal 2 to EVERYTHING.
fields.description_raw:
When I'm summoned, heal your Nexus 4.
Countdown 1: Deal 2 to EVERYTHING.
fields.flavor_text: Bizarre forms made of dark ice sprout from every surface along the ravine, their outward-facing spikes deterring any would-be intruders.
fields.name: Blighted Ravine

fields.description: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
fields.description_raw: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
fields.flavor_text: "I will bury the world in ice." - Lissandra
fields.name: Ice Shard

fields.description: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Flash Freeze</style></link>, <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Fury of the North</style></link>, or <link=card.create3><style=AssociatedCard>Entomb</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: Create a Fleeting Flash Freeze, Fury of the North, or Entomb in hand.
fields.flavor_text: The Freljordian sisters Avarosa, Serylda, and Lissandra bore tremendous power, though chose to wield it in different ways - each one distinctly merciful, martial, or malicious.
fields.name: Three Sisters

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 2. <style=Variable></style>
Draw 2.
fields.description_raw:
Reputation: I cost 2. 
Draw 2.
fields.flavor_text: Before the news, the rumors. Before the rumors, the play. Before the play, the plot.
fields.name: Whispered Words

fields.description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.guile><style=AssociatedCard>Guile</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, create a Guile in hand.
fields.flavor_text: "Aelana, my dearest friend and colleague! Have you seen Lord Duin about...?  Ah, what a shame. I was very much looking forward to catching up. I do hope he paced himself tonight. I would hate for anything to happen to the old boy..." - Lady Auvray, Black Rose Spy
fields.name: Thorn of the Rose

fields.description: An ally with 5+ Power <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy.
fields.description_raw: An ally with 5+ Power strikes an enemy.
fields.flavor_text: "The greatest threats are the ones that go unseen." - LeBlanc
fields.name: Bloody Business

fields.description: <link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: When I'm summoned, transform me into an exact copy of the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> ally that <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>struck</style></link> this round. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Reputation: When I'm summoned, transform me into an exact copy of the Strongest ally that struck this round.
fields.flavor_text: "A secret is only worth the cost of keeping it."
fields.name: Black Rose Spy

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 1. <style=Variable></style>
Pick a spell in play or in hand and create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy of it in hand.
fields.description_raw:
Reputation: I cost 1. 
Pick a spell in play or in hand and create a Fleeting copy of it in hand.
fields.flavor_text: Imitation is flattery, and flattery can be quite deadly.
fields.name: Mimic

fields.flavor_text: "Now now, no need to squabble amongst ourselves. For the moment, we will refrain from any rash action. Let us reconvene once we've heard from our emissary. After all..."
fields.name: LeBlanc

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 1. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 2 to anything.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>LeBlanc</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Reputation: I cost 1. 
Deal 2 to anything.
Create a LeBlanc in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: Once the battle is won, one must not hesitate, but press on, pursue, and annihilate their foe.
fields.name: LeBlanc's Sigil of Malice

fields.description: Summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of an ally with 5+ Power.
fields.description_raw: Summon an exact Ephemeral copy of an ally with 5+ Power.
fields.flavor_text: "Seeing double?" - LeBlanc
fields.name: Mirror Image

fields.description: Each time I see you deal 15+ damage, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Mirror Image</style></link> in hand. If you already have one, reduce its cost by 1 instead. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Each time I see you deal 15+ damage, create a Mirror Image in hand. If you already have one, reduce its cost by 1 instead.
fields.flavor_text: "...we all want the same thing."
fields.name: LeBlanc

fields.description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant Spider allies +1|+0.
fields.description_raw: Attack: Grant Spider allies +1|+0.
fields.flavor_text: "Go on, my sweet. Let the others hear your call. You know how it excites them. You know it pleases me." - Elise
fields.name: Shrieking Spinner

fields.description: The next time you summon another ally, deal 1 to it and grant me +1|+1.
fields.description_raw: The next time you summon another ally, deal 1 to it and grant me +1|+1.
fields.flavor_text: "They're rarely kept as pets, you know. Just one little scratch from those claws of theirs can open up a vein... but I don't mind." - Clara, Crimson Disciple
fields.name: Crimson Bloodletter

fields.description:
<link=vocab.Aftermath><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 1. <style=Variable></style>
Deal 2 to anything.
fields.description_raw:
Reputation: I cost 1. 
Deal 2 to anything.
fields.flavor_text: Once the battle is won, one must not hesitate, but press on, pursue, and annihilate their foe.
fields.name: Sigil of Malice

fields.description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Legion Marauders</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Summon 2 Legion Marauders.
fields.flavor_text: Though the soldiers of Noxus rarely leave survivors, the marauders leave even fewer.
fields.name: Strength in Numbers

fields.description:
The first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit each round, I mark the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemy. 
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Kill units with my mark.
fields.description_raw:
The first time you slay a unit each round, I mark the Weakest enemy. 
Round End: Kill units with my mark.
fields.level_up_description: I've seen you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> 2 units with my mark<style=Variable></style>.
fields.level_up_description_raw: I've seen you slay 2 units with my mark.
fields.flavor_text:
Once there was a lonely man
Who split himself in twain
From one came two, born anew
Never alone again.
fields.name: Kindred

fields.description:
Kill a unit, then revive it.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kindred</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
Kill a unit, then revive it.
Create a Kindred in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "This is only an interlude." - Lamb
fields.name: Kindred's Spirit Journey

fields.description:
The first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit each round, grant me +2|+2 and I mark the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> enemy. 
<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Kill units with my mark.
fields.description_raw:
The first time you slay a unit each round, grant me +2|+2 and I mark the Weakest enemy. 
Round End: Kill units with my mark.
fields.flavor_text:
Death took the form of hunters 
None escape such as they
One cajoles with arrows and bow
One chases down its prey.
fields.name: Kindred

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to draw 2.
fields.description_raw: Play: Kill an ally to draw 2.
fields.flavor_text: In shadow they lurk, waiting for a weary nod or an absent mind. Then claws, a gaping maw, and finally, darkness.
fields.name: Spirit Leech

fields.description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=PlaySkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
fields.description_raw: Play: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
fields.flavor_text: "As my time on this place comes to a close, I find myself pondering not my first death, but the second. Who will be the last soul to remember my name? And when they, too, fall to this earth... what will become of me?" - Eminent Benefactor
fields.name: The Etherfiend

fields.description:
Draw 1.
<link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link>: Activate an ally's <link=keyword.Nightfall><style=Keyword>Nightfall</style></link> effect, ignoring any targeted portions.
fields.description_raw:
Draw 1.
Nightfall: Activate an ally's Nightfall effect, ignoring any targeted portions.
fields.flavor_text: "Come, child. No need to be afraid." - Mask Mother
fields.name: Unto Dusk

fields.description:
When another ally dies, or <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: <link=vocab.Toss><style=Vocab>Toss</style></link> 1.
<style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: When another ally dies, or Last Breath: Toss 1.
fields.flavor_text: "Alright, you lot--haul them traps up! An' remember: if you see one of 'em sea scarabs, you cut rope an' move on. I ain't riskin' the keel for whatever they've half-eaten, y'hear?" - Bilgewater captain
fields.name: Sea Scarab

fields.description: Grant an ally <link=keyword.Lifesteal><sprite name=Lifesteal><style=Keyword>Lifesteal</style></link>, <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: Grant an ally Lifesteal, Fearsome, and Ephemeral.
fields.flavor_text: "Come, child. See as I see, and feel as I feel. Do not fear the darkness." - The Rekindler
fields.name: Song of the Isles

fields.description: Give the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>Weakest</style></link> ally "I can't take damage or die" this round.
fields.description_raw: Give the Weakest ally "I can't take damage or die" this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Shine once more, before the end." - Lamb
fields.name: Lamb's Respite

fields.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Fearsome><sprite name=Fearsome><style=Keyword>Fearsome</style></link> if an ally died this round.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 and Fearsome if an ally died this round.
fields.flavor_text: "Once there was a hapless young man who thought to court a spider, never once suspecting he would end up in her web..."
fields.name: Soulspinner

fields.description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Kill an ally to grant me its stats and keywords.
fields.description_raw: Play: Kill an ally to grant me its stats and keywords.
fields.flavor_text: They say the Mask Mother created Kindred, just as she created all the incarnations of death. But from whom did she receive her mask, if she didn't craft it herself?
fields.name: Mask Mother

fields.description: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
fields.description_raw: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
fields.flavor_text: "Eventually all will be forgotten." - The Etherfiend
fields.name: The Second Death

fields.description: Kill a unit, then revive it.
fields.description_raw: Kill a unit, then revive it.
fields.flavor_text: "This is only an interlude." - Lamb
fields.name: Spirit Journey

fields.description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Prey</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, summon a Prey.
fields.flavor_text: Who could forget their own god of death, other than those cursed with immortality? And what greater fear can a god of death have, other than being forgotten?
fields.name: Fading Icon

fields.flavor_text: "They flicker through the dark forest, dotting the treeline like stars in the night sky, unaware of their pursuers." - Lamb
fields.name: Prey

fields.description: To play, spend all your mana. Summon random Turrets whose total cost equals the mana spent.
fields.description_raw: To play, spend all your mana. Summon random Turrets whose total cost equals the mana spent.
fields.flavor_text: "Not enough resources?! I built my first mechanized contraption with discarded clockwork parts and a rusted thermal capacitor. One must do what one can with what one has!" - Heimerdinger
fields.name: Production Surge

fields.description: For the rest of the game, the first time you play a follower each round, pick 1 of 3 followers with the same cost to transform it into.
fields.description_raw: For the rest of the game, the first time you play a follower each round, pick 1 of 3 followers with the same cost to transform it into.
fields.flavor_text: "We're playing by MY rules." - Ekko
fields.name: Concurrent Timelines

fields.description: <link=vocab.Buried><style=Vocab>Countdown 2</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Create 2 random Celestial cards that cost 3 or less in hand.
fields.description_raw: Countdown 2: Create 2 random Celestial cards that cost 3 or less in hand.
fields.flavor_text: Those who set off to climb Mount Targon are soon rewarded with some of Runeterra's most glorious views. And as the climb steepens, so do its rewards.
fields.name: Startipped Peak

fields.description: Grant an ally in hand +8|+8.
fields.description_raw: Grant an ally in hand +8|+8.
fields.flavor_text: "Embrace your destiny, and shine more brilliantly than anyone could have ever known." - Taric
fields.name: Destiny's Call

fields.description: When you play a Dragon, it <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> me and you draw 1.
fields.description_raw: When you play a Dragon, it strikes me and you draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: "That shriek you hear from way up high? That's no bird, my boy. That's the cry of a hunting dragon." - Demacian farmer
fields.name: Dragon Chow

fields.description: The first time I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw: The first time I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
fields.flavor_text: After learning of his son's disappearance, King Jarvan III tasked his trusted friend Lord Barrett Buvelle with organizing a search party. The prince returned safe and well. Lord Buvelle, to the king's eternal regret, did not.
fields.name: Honored Lord

fields.description: An ally starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
fields.description_raw: An ally starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
fields.flavor_text: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV
fields.name: Cataclysm

fields.description:
Give an ally <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
<link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
fields.description_raw:
Give an ally Barrier this round.
Rally.
fields.flavor_text: "Once more, soldier of Demacia!" - Jarvan IV
fields.name: Golden Aegis

fields.description: Grant an ally +1|+1.
fields.description_raw: Grant an ally +1|+1.
fields.flavor_text: "I could teach you a thing or two." - Lord Buvelle
fields.name: Battlefield Prowess

fields.description: The next time you summon an ally this round, grant it <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: The next time you summon an ally this round, grant it Challenger.
fields.flavor_text: "Form up, on me!" - Silverwing Vanguard
fields.name: Tattered Banner

fields.description: When you attack, pay my cost to summon me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
fields.description_raw: When you attack, pay my cost to summon me Challenging the Strongest enemy.
fields.level_up_description: Allies have survived 4+ strikes from enemy blockers<style=Variable></style>.
fields.level_up_description_raw: Allies have survived 4+ strikes from enemy blockers.
fields.flavor_text: The Noxians knew where Prince Jarvan's hunt would take him. They knew how many Demacians would be by his side, and they knew that his honor wouldn't permit him to flee. The trap was set.
fields.name: Jarvan IV

fields.description:
When you attack, pay my cost to summon me <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>Strongest</style></link> enemy.
<link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Cataclysm</style></link> in hand.
When I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, give me <link=keyword.Barrier><sprite name=Barrier><style=Keyword>Barrier</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw:
When you attack, pay my cost to summon me Challenging the Strongest enemy.
Round Start: Create a Fleeting Cataclysm in hand.
When I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
fields.flavor_text: But the Noxians did fail to account for the young prince's sheer strength and uncompromising will. They paid for this miscalculation in blood.
fields.name: Jarvan IV

fields.description:
An ally starts a free attack <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenging</style></link> an enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jarvan IV</style></link> in your deck.
fields.description_raw:
An ally starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
Create a Jarvan IV in your deck.
fields.flavor_text: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV
fields.name: Jarvan IV's Cataclysm

fields.description:
When I'm summoned, draw <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Jarvan IV</style></link>. 
If he's already in play, instead give allies <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link> and <link=keyword.Scout><sprite name=Scout><style=Keyword>Scout</style></link> this round.
fields.description_raw:
When I'm summoned, draw Jarvan IV. 
If he's already in play, instead give allies Challenger and Scout this round.
fields.flavor_text: "What, pray tell, would a father sacrifice to save his son? Better yet, what would a king?" - LeBlanc
fields.name: King Jarvan III

fields.description: I don't take damage from enemy spells or skills.
fields.description_raw: I don't take damage from enemy spells or skills.
fields.flavor_text: The great Stonehorns are reputed to have come from the time the petricite forest was young, their spreading antlers made of a material similar to those now-ancient trees.
fields.name: Towering Stonehorn

fields.description: When I'm summoned, if you <link=vocab.Behold><style=Vocab>Behold</style></link> an Elite, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Tattered Banner</style></link> in hand.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an Elite, create a Tattered Banner in hand.
fields.flavor_text: Only when she reached the city's walls did her legs finally give way. The Dauntless Vanguard would carry her message to the king, and the king would save the prince. Thus would her wrong be righted, and her honor preserved.
fields.name: Penitent Squire

fields.description: The first time I <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenge</style></link> an enemy, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Vanguard Cavalry</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: The first time I Challenge an enemy, transform me into Vanguard Cavalry.
fields.flavor_text: Once the call was made, every Demacian soldier was summoned to aid in the search for the prince. Expediency, more than anything, was key.
fields.name: Gallant Rider

fields.description: For the rest of the round, when you damage the enemy Nexus, <link=keyword.Nab><style=Keyword>Nab</style></link> 1.
fields.description_raw: For the rest of the round, when you damage the enemy Nexus, Nab 1.
fields.flavor_text: "So, what are you willin' to wager, friend?" - Tahm Kench
fields.name: Loaded Dice

fields.description: Draw a Treasure. If there aren't any to draw, create 2 Treasures in your deck instead.
fields.description_raw: Draw a Treasure. If there aren't any to draw, create 2 Treasures in your deck instead.
fields.flavor_text: "We're rich!" - Jagged Butcher
fields.name: Lost Riches

fields.description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if an ally has <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
fields.description_raw: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if an ally has Ephemeral.
fields.flavor_text: "You are smoke—a whisper on the wind. Your fists must join with the dark like shade to shadow. Now... again!" - Mistress Shi
fields.name: Shadow Apprentice

fields.description: Each round, once you've summoned 3 other allies, refill your spell mana and draw 1. <style=Variable></style>
fields.description_raw: Each round, once you've summoned 3 other allies, refill your spell mana and draw 1.
fields.flavor_text: For some, music is a shared refuge from hardship and violence. For others, music is resistance.
fields.name: Field Musicians
